title: All of Broadway's theater lights will dim for actor Gavin Creel after an outcry
creator: By MARK KENNEDY - AP Entertainment Writer
content: NEW YORK (AP) — All of Broadway's marquees will dim to honor the life of Gavin Creel following an outcry by theater fans when only a partial dimming was proposed after the 48-year-old Tony Award-winner's death last month. The Committee of Theatre Owners on Wednesday said all 41 Broadway theaters would dim their lights on separate nights for Creel, Adrian Bailey and Maggie Smith. The committee also said it was “reviewing their current dimming policy and procedures.” Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

title: All of Broadway's theater lights will dim for actor Gavin Creel after an outcry
creator: By MARK KENNEDY - AP Entertainment Writer
content: NEW YORK (AP) — All of Broadway's marquees will dim to honor the life of Gavin Creel following an outcry by theater fans when only a partial dimming was proposed after the 48-year-old Tony Award-winner's death last month. The Committee of Theatre Owners on Wednesday said all 41 Broadway theaters would dim their lights on separate nights for Creel, Adrian Bailey and Maggie Smith. The committee also said it was “reviewing their current dimming policy and procedures.” The death of Creel on Sept. 30 put the spotlight on the practice of dimming marquee lights after a notable theater figure has died. While giants in the field get all of Broadway theaters dark for a minute, lesser figures may only have partial dimming. Creel's death prompted the Committee of Theatre Owners to decide that one theater from every theater owner would dim their lights. An online petition demanding all theaters participate was signed by over 23,000 people. Actors' Equity, which represents thousands of performers and stage managers, expressed their concern, saying “everyone who receives the tribute deserves the full tribute." Playwright Paula Vogel said not dimming all the lights was a “travesty to this brilliant actor who put money in pockets and joy in audiences.” Creel was a Broadway musical theater veteran who won a Tony for “Hello, Dolly!” opposite Bette Midler and earned nominations for “Hair” and “Thoroughly Modern Millie.” Partial dimming in the past has been enacted for theater producer Elizabeth...

title: All of Broadway's theater lights will dim for actor Gavin Creel after an outcry
creator: By MARK KENNEDY - AP Entertainment Writer
content: The Committee of Theatre Owners on Wednesday said all 41 Broadway theaters would dim their lights on separate nights for Creel, Adrian Bailey and Maggie Smith. The committee also said it was “reviewing their current dimming policy and procedures.” The death of Creel on Sept. 30 put the spotlight on the practice of dimming marquee lights after a notable theater figure has died. While giants in the field get all of Broadway theaters dark for a minute, lesser figures may only have partial dimming. Creel's death prompted the Committee of Theatre Owners to decide that one theater from every theater owner would dim their lights. An online petition demanding all theaters participate was signed by over 23,000 people. Actors' Equity, which represents thousands of performers and stage managers, expressed their concern, saying “everyone who receives the tribute deserves the full tribute." Playwright Paula Vogel said not dimming all the lights was a “travesty to this brilliant actor who put money in pockets and joy in audiences.” Creel was a Broadway musical theater veteran who won a Tony for “Hello, Dolly!” opposite Bette Midler and earned nominations for “Hair” and “Thoroughly Modern Millie.” Partial dimming in the past has been enacted for theater producer Elizabeth Ireland McCann and Marin Mazzie. The decision on Mazzie was overturned to a full dimming after a similar outcry. The date for the dimming tribute for Creel and Smith has yet to be announced. The tribute for Bailey, who...

title: All of Broadway's theater lights will dim for actor Gavin Creel after an outcry
content: The Committee of Theatre Owners on Wednesday said all 41 Broadway theaters would dim their lights on separate nights for Creel, Adrian Bailey and Maggie Smith. The committee also said it was “reviewing their current dimming policy and procedures.” The death of Creel on Sept. 30 put the spotlight on the practice of dimming marquee lights after a notable theater figure has died. While giants in the field get all of Broadway theaters dark for a minute, lesser figures may only have partial dimming. Creel's death prompted the Committee of Theatre Owners to decide that one theater from every theater owner would dim their lights. An online petition demanding all theaters participate was signed by over 23,000 people. Actors' Equity, which represents thousands of performers and stage managers, expressed their concern, saying “everyone who receives the tribute deserves the full tribute." Playwright Paula Vogel said not dimming all the lights was a “travesty to this brilliant actor who put money in pockets and joy in audiences.” Creel was a Broadway musical theater veteran who won a Tony for “Hello, Dolly!” opposite Bette Midler and earned nominations for “Hair” and “Thoroughly Modern Millie.” Partial dimming in the past has been enacted for theater producer Elizabeth Ireland McCann and Marin Mazzie. The decision on Mazzie was overturned to a full dimming after a similar outcry. The date for the dimming tribute for Creel and Smith has yet to be announced. The tribute for Bailey, who...

title: GSK Options Trading: A Deep Dive into Market Sentiment
creator: Benzinga Insights
content: Investors with a lot of money to spend have taken a bearish stance on GSK GSK . And retail traders should know. We noticed this today when the positions showed up on publicly available options history that we track here at Benzinga. Whether these are institutions or just wealthy individuals, we don't know. But when something this big happens with GSK, it often means somebody knows something is about to happen. Today, Benzinga's options scanner spotted 8 options trades for GSK . This isn't normal. The overall sentiment of these big-money traders is split between 25% bullish and 50%, bearish. Out of all of the options we uncovered, there was 1 put, for a total amount of $67,906, and 7, calls, for a total amount of $382,107. Projected Price Targets After evaluating the trading volumes and Open Interest, it's evident that the major market movers are focusing on a price band between $37.0 and $45.0 for GSK, spanning the last three months. Insights into Volume & Open Interest In terms of liquidity and interest, the mean open interest for GSK options trades today is 2434.8 with a total volume of 6,311.00. In the following chart, we are able to follow the development of volume and open interest of call and put options for GSK's big money trades within a strike price range of $37.0 to $45.0 over the last 30 days. title: Un excompañero de Ricky Martin reabre el caso de los hermanos Menéndez
creator: Marina Ortiz Cortés
content: Los hermanos Menéndez podrían salir de la cárcel después de 35 años encerrados por el asesinato de sus padres José y Kitty Menéndez . La serie de Ryan Murphy ha devuelto este terrorífico caso a la actualidad, con famosos como Kim Kardashian apoyándoles para que sean puestos en libertad lo antes posible. Nuevas pruebas han marcado una fecha en el calendario: el 29 de noviembre el fiscal del distrito George Gascón dará a conocer su decisión sobre si son puestos en libertad o que reciban una nueva sentencia. Si bien la serie Monstruos , de Ryan Murphy para Netflix, y el posterior documental Los hermanos Menéndez , ha echado mucha luz sobre este caso tan mediático, han sido otros los motivos de que se haya reabierto el caso. Dos nuevas pruebas , una carta y un testimonio, abren la posibilidad de que Lyle y Erik, que tenían 21 y 18 años cuando asesinaron a sus padres con 16 tiros , sean puestos en libertad. Ahora tienen 56 y 53 años respectivamente, y cumplen condena de por vida sin posibilidad de libertad condicional. Algo que Kim Kardashian criticaba recientemente en una carta abierta, alegando que el caso de O.J. Simpson -que se desarrolló poco antes y que involucró a su familia- cambió el curso de su juicio . Hay que recordar que el exdeportista no llegó a ser condenado a cárcel, por lo que según la empresaria el juez -que era el mismo- quería resarcirse. Los hermanos Menéndez aseguraban que asesinaron a sus padres en legítima defensa porque su...

title: Göztepe Kampüsü önünde kadın cinayetlerini protesto eyleminde 4 genç gözaltına alındı
content: İkbal Uzuner ile Ayşenur Halil'in katledilmesi üç gündür çok sayıda üniversitede protesto edilirken akşam saatlerinde Marmara Üniversitesi Göztepe Kampüsü önünde de gençler kadın cinayetlerini protesto etmek istedi. Ancak polis eylemci gençleri abluka altına aldı. 4 genç gözaltına alındı. İkbal Uzuner ve Ayşenur Halil'in, Semih Çelik tarafından katledilmesi yurt çapında, özellikle de üniversitelerde protesto ediliyor. Marmara Üniversitesi Göztepe Kampüsü önünde buluşan gençler, cinayetleri protesto etmek istedi. Ancak bölgeden olaganüstü önlem alan polisin ablukası ile karşılaştı. "Kadınlara değil katillere barikat" şeklinde slogan atan öğrencilerden bazıları gözaltına alındı. CHP Kadıköy Gençlik Kolları, gözaltı sayısını 4 kişi olarak açıkladı. Konuyla ilgili sosyal medyadan yapılan açıklamada da, "Marmara Üniversitesi önünde Ayşegül ve İkbal ve diğer kadın cinayetlerini protesto için toplanan arkadaşlarımızdan 4 kişi gözaltına alınarak vatan emniyete götürüldü. CHP Kadıköy Gençlik Örgütü üyesi arkadaşımızın da bulunduğu 4 kişi için Vatan Emniyet’e gidiyoruz. Direniş engellenemez. Polisler öğrenciler için değil katiller için var" ifadelerine yer verildi.

title: La miniserie francesa de tres capítulos que arrasa en Netflix
creator: Napsix
content: Netflix es una de las más grandes plataformas de streaming mundial y se ha consolidado, a través de los años, como una de las que ofrece mayor cantidad de series y películas para ver. En este sentido, podemos encontrar producciones de todas partes del mundo. En esta ocasión, traemos la recomendación de una miniserie francesa que tiene sólo tres capítulos. Hablamos de la miniserie Criminal: Francia . Una producción hecha por George Kay y Jim Field Smith que ha sabido cautivar al público con su innovador formato. Todo ocurre en una sala de interrogatorios de la policía, mientras una cámara fija filma a quienes están allí. En la miniserie conocemos la historia de Jerome, un jefe de ventas es sospechoso de haber cometido un delito de odio con violencia. Foto: Netflix La sinopsis, ofrecida por Netflix narra lo siguiente "una sala de interrogatorios, la policía de París y los sospechosos; nada más. Los secretos y la verdad bailan entre luces y sombras. Una mujer relata lo que vivió durante el atentado en Bataclan, donde murió su novio, y los investigadores empiezan a sospechar que esconde algo". En los tres capítulos de Criminal: Francia , vamos a poder ver diferentes crímenes que van desde asesinatos hasta robos. Además, vamos a poder ver cómo los policías intentan adentrarse en la mente de los culpables, explorando miedos, deseos y las razones que llevaron al sospechoso a cometer el crimen. En la miniserie se interroga a Caroline, la supervisora de una...

title: В США назвали главного противника
content: Самый большой противник Америки — Иран, утверждает вице-президент и кандидат на первый пост США Камала Харрис, однако эксперты утверждают, что ответ Харрис может "не соответствовать" текущей стратегии Пентагона, пишут журналисты американского военного журнала Breaking Defense (BD). Pravda.Ru публикует перевод материала BD, авторы которого рассуждают о "главном противнике США". Хотя Министерство обороны и разведывательное сообщество уже давно считают Китай геополитической проблемой номер один для Америки, когда кандидата в президенты от Демократической партии Камалу Харрис спросили, кто является главным противником Америки, она ответила, что один из "очевидных" ответов прямо сейчас находится в 5600 милях к западу от Пекина. "Я думаю, что на ум приходит очевидный вариант — Иран, — сказала Харрис во время интервью "60 минут, — На руках Ирана кровь американцев, ясно? Это нападение на Израиль, 200 баллистических ракет, то, что нам нужно сделать, чтобы гарантировать, что Иран никогда не сможет стать ядерной державой, — это один из моих главных приоритетов". После того, как вице-президент отказался отвечать на "гипотетический" вопрос о том, как США отреагируют на доказательства того, что Иран стремится к созданию ядерного оружия, корреспондент “60 минут” Билл Уитакер задал следующий вопрос: "А как насчет Китая?" В своем ответе Харрис описала отношения Америки с тихоокеанской державой в экономическом плане, заявив, что США "должны выиграть соревнование с Китаем в 21...

title: Milton live updates: Officials urge evacuations as hurricane looms
content: Steady rain fell and winds began to gust in the Tampa Bay area Wednesday morning as mighty Hurricane Milton churned toward a potentially catastrophic collision with the west coast of Florida, where some residents insisted they would stay even after millions were ordered to evacuate. Stragglers face grim odds of surviving, officials said. Watch live coverage from Orlando sister station WESH in the video player above. The Tampa Bay region, home to more than 3.3 million people, hasn't seen a direct hit from a major hurricane in more than a century. Milton fluctuated between categories 4 and 5 as it approached, but regardless of the distinction in wind speeds, the National Hurricane Center said, it would be a major and extremely dangerous storm when its center makes landfall late Wednesday or early Thursday. Here's the latest on Milton as the storm approaches (all times eastern): 5:10 p.m. More than 5,000 people were in shelters in the storm’s path east of the Tampa-St. Petersburg area but officials urged others not to venture out to one at this point, as storms began bringing down power lines and causing flooding Wednesday afternoon. Several tornadoes were reported in the area but none had touched down. “Unless you really have a good reason to leave at this point, we suggest you just hunker down,” Polk County Emergency Management Director Paul Womble said in a public update. The county had 19 shelters open, including three that were pet-friendly. Already officials were urging...

title: 2 genç kızı kalaşnikof ile tehdit ettiği iddia edilen şüpheli hakkında yeni gelişme
content: İddiaya göre, şüpheli H.S.'nin 2 genç kızı takip ve tehdit ettiği yönünde sosyal medyadaki paylaşımları gören İnegöl İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü ekipleri harekete geçti. Polis ekiplerince gözaltına alınan şüpheli, emniyetteki işlemlerinin ardından adliyeye sevk edildi. Şüpheli, çıkarıldığı hakimlikçe tutuklandı. "KOLUMU ISIRDI, KELEŞLE KAPIMA GELDİ" Sosyal medyaya yansıyan mesajlarsa kan dondurdu. Büyük korku yaşayan genç kızın, " Kaçmaya çalışırken kolumu ısırdı. Peşimde geziyor. Keleşle kapıma geldi. " sözleri tüyler ürpertti. "BU KIZIN ORGANLARINI YAKACAĞIM" Şüphelinin " Bu kızın organlarını yakmayı düşünüyorum, sonra satacağım. " şeklindeki mesajları büyük tepki topladı. Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan'dan sur katiliyle ilgili açıklama Sur canisi Semih Çelik'in annesi olay günü oğluyla ne konuştuklarını anlattı! Sur katili derin tehlikeyi açığa çıkardı: Satanizm terörü!

title: Столтенберг перед тим, як залишити посаду генсека НАТО, заявив, що вторгненню Росії в Україну 2022 року можна було запобігти
content: Єнс Столтенберг (Фото:REUTERS/Yves Herman) Єнс Столтенберг дав інтерв'ю журналу Politico в останній день на посаді генерального секретаря НАТО і заявив, що Захід міг би запобігти повномасштабному вторгненню Росії в Україну, якби поставив більше зброї. Як повідомляє Politico , Столтенберг поділився своїм « великим жалем»: що Захід не підтримав Україну більш рішуче після початку російської агресії у 2014 році. « Якби ми поставили хоча б частину тієї зброї, яку поставили після 2022 року, ми, можливо, фактично запобігли б війні», — сказав він. Журнал зазначає, що загалом Столтенберг уникав критики на адресу будь-кого з членів Північноатлантичного альянсу, хоча він і впевнений, що для підтримки України можна зробити « набагато більше». « Я пам’ятаю, що один із моїх перших візитів [в Україну як генсекретаря НАТО] був у Яворів, навчальний центр НАТО для України у 2015 році. Я наполегливо працював, намагаючись переконати союзників по НАТО зробити більше, надати більше військової підтримки, більше навчання. Деякі союзники зробили це, але все було відносно обмежено, і протягом багатьох років це було дуже складно, тому що політика НАТО виключала летальну підтримку України», — сказав він. Єнс Столтенберг у лютому 2025 року стане головою Мюнхенської конференції з безпеки ( MSC). Він був генсеком Альянсу протягом 10 років. 1 жовтня 57-річний експрем'єр-міністр Нідерландів Марк Рютте став новим генеральним секретарем НАТО . Свій перший візит на посаді генсека...

title: TEŠKA SAOBRAĆAJNA NESREĆA KOD BIHAĆA: U lančanom sudaru poginuo čovek
content: DANAS se u bihaćkom naselju Kostela desila teška saobraćajna nesreća u kojoj je jedan čovek poginuo. U ovoj saobraćajnoj nesreći učestvovala su četiri autmomobila. Prema informacijama MUP-a USK pet osoba je povređeno i oni su prevezeni i Kantonalnu bolnicu u Bihaću ,piše Dijaspora.info. Za vreme trajanja uviđaja saobraćaj je bio potpuno obustavljen.

title: Россия выпустила на рынок конкурента китайским автомобилям
content: Президент России Владимир Путин дал старт серийному производству автомобиля «Лада Аура» на заводе «АвтоВАЗа» в Самарской области. Во время презентации новых инвестпроектов в разных регионах страны глава государства заявил об ускоренном росте отечественной промышленности. Развитие этой отрасли, объяснили URA.RU эксперты, поможет новому российскому седану составить конкуренцию китайским и западным авто. Путин в режиме видеоконференции ознакомился с новыми инвестпроектами в нескольких регионах. В Самарской области президент запустил серийное производство нового седана бизнес-класса «Лада Аура» на предприятии «АвтоВАЗа». Открылся завод по изготовлению систем вентиляции и кондиционирования компании во Владимирской области, глубинной России, в самом хорошем смысле этого слова, отметил президент. Российскому лидеру рассказали о новой фабрике ткацко-отделочного производства полного цикла в Нижегородской области, где впервые в стране начали выпускать водостойкие и огнестойкие ткани. Путин ознакомился с целлюлозно-картонным комбинатом в Иркутской области, а также дал старт новой ТЭС «Ударная» мощностью 560 МВт в Краснодарском крае. Отдельное внимание президент уделил автомобилестроению. Генеральный директор «АвтоВАЗа» Максим Соколов поблагодарил главу государства за поддержку отечественного автопрома. Как отметил Соколов, компания углубляет локализацию, наращивает объемы и обновляет модельный ряд. В свою очередь Путин поздравил коллектив автовазовцев с первым...

title: Ohrfeigen und Drohungen: Eine Lehrerin berichtet von der Gewalt im deutschen Schulalltag
content: Lea Franke heißt in Wahrheit anders. Sie arbeitet seit vier Jahren als Lehrerin an einer Gesamtschule im städtischen Raum in Nordrhein-Westfalen. Zuvor absolvierte sie ihr Referendariat an einer Realschule und arbeitete als Vertretungslehrerin an einer Grundschule, unter anderem auch an einer deutschen Schule im Ausland. Dieser Text erschien zuerst im März 2024. 93.095 Mädchen und Jungen – so viele tatverdächtige Kinder zählte das Bundeskriminalamt 2022. Das entspricht einem Anstieg von 35,5 Prozent im Vergleich zum Vorjahr. Auch bei den Jugendlichen stieg die Zahl: auf 189.000, eine Zunahme um 22 Prozent. Zu den Delikten zählen unter anderem Ladendiebstahl, Beleidigung, Sachbeschädigung und Körperverletzung. Neuere Zahlen gibt es bisher nicht, aber gefühlt häufen sich die Vorfälle: Nachrichten wie die über den Tod der zwölfjährigen Luise in Freudenberg, für den zwei gleichaltrige Mädchen verantwortlich sind, erschütterten ganz Deutschland. Im vergangenen November erlag ein Neuntklässler seinen Schussverletzungen, die ihm ein Mitschüler während des Schulbetriebs zufügte. Wegen des gewaltsamen Mordes an einem Sechsjährigen wurde gegen einen 14-jährigen Tatverdächtigen mittlerweile Anklage erhoben. All dies sind Meldungen aus dem Jahr 2023. Natürlich sind auch wir Lehrer schockiert von diesen Vorfällen. Wirklich überrascht sind wir jedoch nicht. Ich übe diesen Beruf noch kein volles Jahrzehnt aus und kann selbst innerhalb dieser kurzen Zeitspanne...

title: La Llajta reconoce la labor de Sarah Mansilla
content: : "Al Mérito Cultural y Literario en la Categoría Editorial o Asociado"; ” : “ ” ¿ ? Es lo que le preguntan continuamente. Ella responde que no hay ningún sustituto al trabajo duro y que las cosas se logran con pasión, entrega, constancia y perseverancia, sin dejarse vencer por ningún obstáculo. Comenzó bien de abajo y tocó puertas para que le difundan su trabajo literario. “No fue fácil”, aseguró. Destacó, también, el soporte que le da su familia en todo lo que practica y afirmó que aprendió mucho en el camino siendo presidenta de varias instituciones, como la Cámara Departamental del Libro de Santa Cruz y la Asociación Pro Arte y Cultura. Mansilla se emocionó cuando citó a Carlos Revollo, su primer editor de la saga Benjamín, que le ense ó varios secretos de la redacción. Su voz se entrecortó, pero volvió rápidamente a la normalidad, gracias a que fue arropada por los aplausos del público. Mencionó que en 2021 fue invitada por el alcalde cruceño, Jhonny Fernández, para encabezar la secretaría de Cultura y Turismo. “Respondí que ya estaba lista para trabajar en las ligas mayores”, encerró. Al final del acto, recibió un ramo de flores enviado por sus hijos Eduardo, Andrés, Sarah María y Álvaro hasta la capital del valle.

title: US forecasts severe solar storm starting Thursday
content: WASHINGTON - A massive ball of plasma and accompanying magnetic field ejected from the Sun is expected to strike Earth on Thursday morning, potentially triggering auroras as far south as Alabama, according to US forecasters. It comes as the Sun approaches -- or is possibly at -- the peak of its 11-year cycle, when activity is heightened. In May, the planet experienced its most powerful geomagnetic storms in two decades, producing colorful displays across night skies far from the poles. "The current anticipation is that it is going to arrive tomorrow morning to midday, Eastern time, and perhaps continue on into the following day," Shawn Dahl of the Space Weather Prediction Center told reporters at a briefing on Wednesday. As the coronal mass ejection (CME) travels through space at 2.5 million miles (four million kilometers) an hour, the agency has put in place a level 4 geomagnetic storm watch (G4). That is one level below the highest possible G5, seen in May -- but the final outcome could be either below or above G4. Better predictions aren't possible until around 15-30 minutes before impact, when it crosses tracking satellites, a million miles from Earth. Dahl said the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA), already under pressure as it deals with the aftermath of Hurricane Helene and the approaching Hurricane Milton, had been informed, as have companies operating the North American power grid, so they can take mitigation steps if necessary. When CMEs slam into Earth's...

title: جريمة مروعة.. شقيقة تقتل أختها لسبب غريب (صور)
creator: غيث
content: لقيت الطفلة جيسي جين ليبورن، 7 سنوات، مصرعها على يد شقيقتها الكبرى البالغة من العمر 13 عامًا، إثر طعنها أكثر من عشر مرات، بعد شجار نشب بينهما حول ملاحظة تخص تنظيف الحمام. الحادثة وقعت في بلدة تايلور بولاية ميشيغان، تاركة المجتمع المحلي في حالة من الصدمة والحزن. تفاصيل الحادثة في يوم السبت، غادرت والدة الطفلتين المنزل، تاركة الشقيقتين بمفردهما. وخلال هذا الوقت، اشتد الخلاف بينهما على خلفية ملاحظة وضعتها الأم في الحمام، تطلب من الطفلتين الالتزام بالنظافة. ووفقًا لتقارير الشرطة، انتظرت الشقيقة الكبرى في الحمام، وعندما دخلت جيسي، قامت بطعنها باستخدام سكين صيد وسكين مطبخ. محاولات الإنقاذ ومصرع جيسي تم نقل جيسي إلى المستشفى بسرعة، إلا أن الإصابات كانت بالغة، وأُعلن عن وفاتها هناك. المحققون الذين وصلوا إلى مكان الجريمة أشاروا إلى أن الأخت الكبرى لم تظهر أي مشاعر بعد ارتكابها للجريمة، وهو ما زاد من صدمة العائلة. حزن العائلة والمجتمع أعرب والد الطفلتين، جيسون ليبورن، عن حزنه العميق، قائلاً: “لم نتخيل يومًا أن خلافًا بسيطًا قد ينتهي بمأساة كهذه. كانت الخلافات بينهما طبيعية مثل أي أشقاء”. وأضاف أن الشجار بين الأختين لم يكن يُظهر أي علامات سابقة على وجود خطر. تم إنشاء نصب تذكاري أمام منزل العائلة تكريمًا لذكرى جيسي، حيث وضع الأصدقاء والجيران زهورًا ولعبًا. واستذكر والدها ذكريات الطفلة الراحلة، قائلاً إنها كانت تحب اللعب في الخارج، السباحة، وملاحقة الضفادع، وكانت دائمًا تمنح عائلتها أحضانًا دافئة قبل النوم. الإجراءات القانونية من المقرر أن تُقام جنازة خاصة لجيسي يوم السبت، وقد طلبت العائلة من المتبرعين دعم مؤسسة “Crazy Sailor Bicycle” التي...

title: Victoriano, “la conexión” de Instituto en el estreno en la Liga Nacional y la tarea de los nuevos jugadores
creator: Marcelo Chaijale
content: Para Instituto pasó el estreno en la Liga Nacional . El subcampeón debutó con una actuación más que convincente, con un rendimiento alto en defensa y en ataque, superando a Olímpico de La Banda por 99-73. El entrenador de la Gloria Lucas Victoriano analizó con La Voz la tarea de sus dirigidos. “Nos conectamos. Si nosotros en defensa no estamos bien, en ataque empezamos a dudar, necesitamos esa conexión... Nos empujó la defensa. Empezamos, con la primera, la segunda acción de ellos (anotando) muy fácil, y a partir de ahí se enojaron, yo también, y conectamos con defensa más agresiva, que nos impulsó a correr, a que se nos presenten buenos tiros, tiros claros. Tiramos muy buenos porcentajes porque todos los tiros fueron bien hechos, entonces es más fácil tener buenos porcentajes”, explicó el técnico, que comenzó la cuarta temporada al frente de Instituto. “Nos fuimos retroalimentando de atrás hacia adelante, veníamos de una acción positiva adelante y eso te motivaba atrás y esa conexión no desapareció con los cambios. Eso me encantó porque muchas veces los suplentes tienen que entrar en ritmo, y el equipo baja un poquito, y no bajó nunca”, sumó Victoriano. Instituto anotó 60 puntos en la mitad inicial contra Olímpico, acertando 10/15 en dobles y 11/19 triples. “El primer tiempo fue espectacular. Con Oliva también jugamos así y con Barrio Parque también (en el Súper 6 de preparación), es un equipo que está intentando jugar así. Ahora hay...

title: Talleres volvió a entrenar, duplicará turnos y gestiona un amistoso
creator: Hugo García
content: Talleres ya piensa en Argentinos Juniors , pero aprovechará que este fin de semana no habrá competencia por la fecha de eliminatorias sudamericanas para subir sus cargas físicas. title: Во Франции более 64 тыс. домов остались без света из-за циклона "Кирк"
content: ПАРИЖ, 9 октября. /ТАСС/. Свыше 64 тыс. домов по всей Франции остались без электроэнергии из-за циклона "Кирк", из-за которого в части регионов был введен предпоследний, оранжевый, и максимальный, красный уровень погодной опасности. Об этом сообщил телеканал BFMTV со ссылкой на оператора энергосетей. Наиболее серьезные проблемы наблюдаются на юго-западе Франции в департаменте Атлантические Пиренеи, где перебои с подачей электроэнергии зафиксированы в 35 тыс. домохозяйств. Также с проблемами столкнулись по несколько тысяч пользователей в департаментах Ланд, Арьеж, Жер, Рона, Луара и Эн. По состоянию на вечер среды национальная метеорологическая служба Meteo-France сохранила предпоследний, оранжевый уровень погодной опасности в связи с сильным ветром и угрозой подтоплений в 29 департаментах, преимущественно на севере и на востоке страны. Только в департаменте Сена и Марна в столичном регионе Франции, введен максимальный, красный уровень погодной опасности. В этом департаменте ожидается в среду вечером и в ночь на четверг до 70-80 мм осадков, тогда как непосредственно в Париже и его пригородах Meteo-France ожидает 35-40 мм осадков.

title: La voz palestina en Bruselas: "El antisemitismo en Europa no es responsabilidad de Palestina”
creator: Francisco Carrión
content: Nieta de palestinos de la Nakba -el éxodo forzado de 750.000 palestinos por fuerzas sionistas en 1948-, nació apátrida en 1992 y pasó su infancia en el campo de refugiados de Neirab , en las afueras de la ciudad siria de Alepo . Rima Hassan llegó a Francia con diez años y desde junio es eurodiputada. Jurista y activista, Hassan es la voz palestina en un Parlamento Europeo que exhibe con crudeza la fractura que durante el último año han provocado las sucesivas operaciones militares de Israel, entre la censura abierta de algunos países miembro y formaciones políticos y el apoyo cerrado de otros. “Hoy estamos pagando la cobardía de los apoyos a Israel y el cinismo del criminal de guerra Netanyahu”, lamenta Hassan en una entrevista a El Independiente cuando se le pregunta por la posición de la Unión Europea, paralizada por la falta de consenso de los Veintisiete. La joven, representante en Estrasburgo de la Francia Insumisa de Jean-Luc Mélenchon , estudió Derecho. Cursó un máster en Derecho Internacional en la Universidad de la Sorbona de París y centró su tesis en una comparativa entre el apartheid en Sudáfrica e Israel. En 2019, fundó el Observatorio de Campos de Refugiados, una organización dedicada a estudiar los campos de todo el mundo y sensibilizar sobre sus condiciones de vida y las violaciones de los derechos de los refugiados. Suele decir que la kufiya (pañuelo palestino) que luce a menudo es “su capa de superheroína”, en honor a sus abuelos....

title: Kimbys svar efter bilderna i TV4
creator: mikael.ljungberg@expressen.se (Mikael Ljungberg)
content: Det var tidigt i den andra perioden mellan Södertälje och Djurgården som Stockholmarnas tränarbänk ville ta ett snack med huvuddomaren Mikael Nord. När tv-kamerorna fångade huvudtränare Robert Kimby och assisterande tränare Michael Holmqvist på bild sågs den förstnämnde asgarva innan han tog sig för pannan. Förklarar bilderna Det hela föranleddes av att Holmqvist sagt något och pekat på Kimby. Efter matchen ger Kimby sin förklaring, utan att berätta vad som sades exakt. – Det är Honken (Michael Holmqvist) som inte... han är ganska rolig. Det blev en diskussion där han säger en rolig kommentar och det kom väldigt plötsligt, säger Kimby. Vad sa Mikael Nord? – De pratar ju bara. Jag tror Nord tycker det är lika kul bara att han håller masken, säger han och fortsätter: – Så här i efterhand är det jättedumt att man fastnar på bild när man står och asgarvar. Men jag har alltid mycket känslor utanpå och det var kul. Ett skratt kan man väl bjuda på? – Helst vill man ta vinsten på det. Då kan man garva. Förlorar man är det inte lika kul, säger Kimby. Nobbade intervjuer efter matchen Där och då hade Djurgården en 2–0-ledning. Men när matchen var över hade SSK vänt och vunnit med 4-3 i förlängning efter ett zorromål från Egor Polin. Efter matchen kom ingen av Djurgårdsspelarna och mötte pressen, som väntade på intervju. Enligt Södertäljes pressansvarige hade de bett spelarna att dyka upp, men Djurgården menar att så inte...

title: Abhishek Manu Singhvi Calls on CM Revanth
creator: DC Correspondent
content: Newly elected Congress Rajya Sabha member from Telangana and and noted lawyer Abhishek Manu Singhvi arrived in Hyderabad on Wednesday. Singhvi, who was elected unopposed to Rajya Sabha from Telangana under the MLAs' quota on August 29, met with Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy. Party sources revealed that Singhvi and the Chief Minister discussed various issues concerning Telangana, including matters that need to be raised in the Rajya Sabha during the upcoming winter session of Parliament, expected in December. Singhvi also accompanied the Chief Minister to LB Stadium, where he participated in an event organised to distribute appointment letters to newly recruited government school teachers through the DSC teacher recruitment exam. The Telangana Pradesh Congress Committee's (TPCC) legal cell announced a grand felicitation programme in honour of Singhvi, set to take place on Thursday. TPCC chief B. Mahesh Kumar Goud, ministers, and senior Congress leaders will attend the event, according to TPCC legal cell chairman Ponnam Ashok Goud.

title: Ex-boyfriend previously charged over the shooting death of Gold Coast influencer to testify in coronial inquest
content: Ex-boyfriend previously charged over the shooting death of Gold Coast influencer to testify in coronial inquest READ MORE: Sister of woman shot dead at her ex's house while getting ready with friends for a night out says one person knows what REALLY happened By NCA NewsWire Published: 16:46 EDT, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 17:04 EDT, 9 October 2024 e-mail View comments A coroner investigating the death of Gold Coast influencer Ivona Jovanovic has publicly declared the purpose of the coronial inquest is not to 'target' the man previously charged with her manslaughter. Emergency services were called to a Highland Park home in 2019 after reports Ms Jovanovic, 27, had been shot in the chest. She was declared dead by the time she arrived by ambulance to Gold Coast University Hospital. At a pre-inquest conference into her death held in Brisbane on Wednesday, the court was told A 'known associate and friend' of Ms Jovanovic, Christos Panagakos, was previously charged with her manslaughter. The pair had been in a relationship before the shooting. Counsel assisting the coroner, Kim Bryson, told the court that prosecutors ultimately discontinued their case against Mr Panagakos and his charges were dropped. Ms Bryson said Mr Panagakos had initially been questioned by police after he had returned to the home where Ms Jovanovic was shot. Ivona Jovanovic was fatally shot in Highland Park in 2019 Christos Panagakos was previously charged with manslaughter before the prosecution dropped all...

title: Fidan u Dubrovniku: Ne može se isključiti upotreba nuklearnog oružja u rusko-ukajinskom ratu
content: Ministar vanjskih poslova Turkiye Hakan Fidan upozorio je u srijedu da je rizik od širenja rusko-ukrajinskog rata veći nego ikada i da se ne može isključiti upotreba nuklearnog oružja i oružja za masovno uništenje u sukobu, prenosi Anadolu. Fidan je to izjavio na samitu Ukrajina-Jugoistočna Evropa u Dubrovniku u Hrvatskoj. Fidan je ponovio podršku Ankare teritorijalnom integritetu, suverenitetu i nezavisnosti Ukrajine te je istakao da je njegova zemlja od početka ulagala diplomatske napore kako bi se okončao rat, naglašavajući ulogu Ankare u održavanju pregovora između zaraćenih strana te kao posrednika u razmjeni zarobljenika i funkcionisanju Crnomorske inicijative za žito. Istakao je da je sukob u Ukrajini pogoršao globalnu polarizaciju. Što se tiče učešća Rusije u pregovorima, Fidan je podvukao da se održivo rješenje može postići samo uključivanjem svih strana, uključujući i Rusiju, u pregovore. Rekao je da osiguravanje sigurnosti hrane, sloboda plovidbe, zaštita nuklearnih energetskih objekata i zaštita kritične infrastrukture mogu pomoći u ublažavanju razaranja. Samit, koji je prvi put održan u grčkoj prijestonici Atini u augustu 2023, a zatim u Tirani, u Albaniji, u februaru 2024, okupio je lidere Ukrajine i zemalja Jugoistočne Evrope u Dubrovniku. Fidan se tokom posjete Dubrovniku sastao i sa hrvatskim kolegom Gordanom Grlić-Radmanom.

title: Boys golf: Peak to Peak’s Jack Brayman wins the bronze at 3A state tournament
content: Following Om Mathur’s surprise Class 3A individual state championship last season, Peak to Peak’s boys were high on the list of golfers to watch during this year’s final tournament. But nobody was going to beat Evergreen at Walking Stick Golf Course in Pueblo on Monday and Tuesday. Instead, the Pumas unveiled another top talent in junior Jack Brayman who, after two stellar rounds, finished third while shooting a 4-under-par 140. Evergreen’s Tyler Long ran away with the crown, carding 9-under par, as the full Cougars squad combined for 12 under. “I got to admit, that is one talented team. That was impressive,” Peak to Peak coach Bobby Letter said. “But Jack, he was focused. He was laser focused in a way that he hasn’t been all season. All season, Jack comes to the course ready to play and he’s got his mind on it, but he was in a different zone for the state tournament. He was just absolutely on top of every millimeter of his game and then when he got on the greens, he was dropping the putts that were the difference makers.” Peak to Peak's Jack Brayman competes in the Class 3A state golf tournament at Walking Stick Golf Course in Pueblo on Oct. 8, 2024. (Jon Yunt/HFAthletics.com) Peak to Peak's Om Mathur competes in the Class 3A state golf tournament at Walking Stick Golf Course in Pueblo on Oct. 8, 2024. title: AP News Summary at 4:47 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Dire warnings to flee as Hurricane Milton begins to lash Florida: 'This is your last chance' TAMPA, Fla. (AP) — Hurricane Milton is hurling tornadoes and rain at the U.S. coast on its steady, potentially catastrophic march toward Florida’s west coast. Florida officials on Wednesday issued a final plea to residents to evacuate or face grim odds of survival. The National Hurricane Center stressed that it was not certain where Milton’s center would come ashore Wednesday night because the storm’s path might “wobble,” but the entire Tampa Bay region and points south were at grave risk. Tropical storm-force winds were just off the coast around midday. Milton has fluctuated in intensity as it approaches Florida. It was a Category 3 hurricane at midday Wednesday. Israeli defense minister warns an attack on Iran would be 'lethal' and 'surprising' JERUSALEM (AP) — Israel’s defense minister says his country’s retaliation for a recent Iranian missile attack will be “lethal” and “surprising.” The warning on Wednesday came as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and President Joe Biden held their first call in seven weeks. In Gaza, a large-scale Israeli operation in the northern part of the Palestinian territory left dozens of people dead and threatened to shut down three hospitals over a year into the war with Hamas. That's according to Palestinian officials and residents. The continuing cycle of destruction and death in Gaza, unleashed by Hamas’ Oct. 7, 2023, attack on southern Israel,...

title: Premier Schoof wil nadenken over nevenfuncties Oranjes: ’Inherente spanning’
Génova pone el foco en Moncloa para parar el malestar del PP por la cadena de errores sobre la rebaja de penas a etarras
creator: Cristina De la Hoz
content: Hay malestar, desolación, frustración y lo que un alto dirigente de Génova llama "dolor interno" por la cadena de errores que llevó al Partido Popular a respaldar una enmienda a una directiva europea que permitirá convalidar los años de pena cumplidos en Francia para algunos de los más sanguinarios asesinos de ETA, como el que puso fin a la vida de Miguel Ángel Blanco, Francisco Javier García Gaztelu, alias Txapote . Es un asunto especialmente sensible para el primer partido de la oposición, y aunque su voto no hubiera cambiado nada, pues la enmienda y el proyecto de ley salía adelante con el respaldo de PSOE y Sumar y sus socios parlamentarios, nadie vio o no supo evaluar el alcance de dicha enmienda. En todo caso, en el Grupo Popular hay cierre de filas . "Sólo faltaba que el Gobierno vaya a excarcelar a presos etarras y quien tenga que dimitir sea María Jesús Moro ", dice uno de los más veteranos parlamentarios en alusión a una diputada muy valorada por su sólida formación jurídica y su seriedad. Ella fue una de las que puso su escaño a disposición del portavoz del Grupo, Miguel Tellado , que no se le aceptó . Explica, además la misma fuente, que las cuestiones más técnicas se dejan para los asesores, "Y a veces hay errores", en este caso compartidos con Vox y UPN, que tampoco vieron el calado de la enmienda agregada a la trasposición de la directiva europea. Ajustes internos de cuentas Los populares no eluden su error y el primero en asumirlo...

title: Shakira confirmó nueva fecha para su tour: esta es la afortunada ciudad
creator: David Echavez
content: El interés por Shakira en Latinoamérica sigue aumentando a niveles sorprendentes. En todos los países donde la demanda por verla en su «Las mujeres ya no lloran World Tour» ha superado las expectativas, con fechas en ciudades de Chile, México, Argentina, Perú y Colombia, países donde ha tenido un rotundo éxito durante las preventas oficiales. ¿Qué país tendrá segunda fecha en el tour de Shakira? El primer concierto de Shakira en Argentina, programado para el 7 de marzo de 2025 en el Campo Argentino de Polo, vendió todas sus entradas en menos de tres horas. La preventa exclusiva para fanáticos demostró la lealtad del público argentino, con más de 50 mil boletos vendidos en cuestión de horas. Esta situación llevó a los organizadores a confirmar una segunda fecha para el 8 de marzo de 2025, en, el mismo recinto, para dar oportunidad a más fanáticos de disfrutar del esperado regreso de la cantante colombiana. Esta segunda fecha ha sido recibida con entusiasmo por quienes no lograron conseguir entradas en el primer intento. A partir del 10 de octubre, a las 10 a. m., se abrirá una nueva preventa exclusiva que estará disponible por 48 horas o hasta agotar stock. En caso de que las entradas vuelvan a agotarse rápidamente, una nueva preventa será habilitada por otras 48 horas. Si quedaran boletos disponibles después de estas fases, se abrirá la venta general con todos los medios de pago a través de entradauno.com. Tras agotar las entradas para su primer...

title: الجيش الإسرائيلي: 360 صاروخًا أطلقت من لبنان منذ صباح الأربعاء
Τζορζτ Μπάλντοκ: Οι τελευταίες δηλώσεις του μετά το ντέρμπι των «αιωνίων» στο ΟΑΚΑ
content: Απέραντη θλίψη σκέπασε το ελληνικό ποδόσφαιρο. Ο Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ του Παναθηναϊκο ύ βρέθηκε νεκρός στο σπίτι του στην Γλυφάδα. Ο 31χρονος δεξιός μπακ των «πράσινων» ανασύρθηκε νεκρός από την κοινόχρηστη πισίνα στο σπίτι του, που βρίσκεται στη Γλυφάδα, επί της οδού Διαδόχου Παύλου. Παναθηναϊκός-Ολυμπιακός το τελευταίο ματς του Μπάλντοκ Ο Μπάλντοκ αν και έμεινε εκτός αποστολής για το ματς της εθνικής κόντρα στην Αγγλία την Πέμπτη, αγωνίστηκε τελευταία φορά την περασμένη Κυριακή στο ΟΑΚΑ κόντρα στον Ολυμπιακό. Ο 31χρονος δεξιός μπακ μετά το ντέρμπι αιωνίων, όπου ξεκίνησε βασικός και έπιασε πολύ καλή απόδοση, έκανε δηλώσεις στο διαδικτυιακό κανάλι «pao pantou», όπου μίλησε για την εξαιρετική ατμόσφαιρα από τους οπαδούς, αλλά και για το πόσο στενοχωρήθηκε που δεν κέρδισαν το ματς. Δείτε τις τελευταίες δηλώσεις του Μπάλντοκ μετά το ντέρμπι με τον Ολυμπιακό

title: Wagenknecht und Weidel im TV-Duell: «Das sind AfD-Positionen.» – «Frau Weidel, das finde ich jetzt etwas billig!»
content: «TV-Duell extrem» nannte es die «Bild»-Zeitung, «Godzilla vs. King Kong» tauften es Spötter in den sozialen Medien: Das erste Duell von Sahra Wagenknecht und Alice Weidel im deutschen Fernsehen, am Mittwochabend auf dem Nachrichtensender der «Welt» , konnte sich über mangelnde Aufmerksamkeit nicht beklagen. Als erfolgreichste, aber auch umstrittenste Politikerinnen des Landes wurden die beiden Frauen von Sender-Chef Jan Philipp Burgard vorgestellt: Die 55-jährige Wagenknecht pflügt mit ihrer neuen Partei gerade die deutsche Parteienlandschaft um , die 45-jährige Weidel wird die AfD als erste Kanzlerkandidatin ihrer Partei in die nächste Bundestagswahl führen. Beide Politikerinnen hatten gleich zugesagt, als sie für das Streitgespräch angefragt wurden, allerdings aus recht unterschiedlichen Beweggründen, wie in den folgenden 60 Minuten zunehmend deutlich wurde: Weidel war vor allem an politischen Gemeinsamkeiten interessiert, Wagenknecht daran, sich trotz vieler Übereinstimmungen von der AfD abzugrenzen. Höcke wollte Wagenknecht noch für die AfD gewinnen Die schiefe Ausgangslage spiegelte die bisherige Beziehungsgeschichte von AfD und Wagenknecht akkurat wider: Während die Partei am rechten Rand immer wieder um die konservative Linke geworben und Björn Höcke ihr Anfang letzten Jahres sogar eine Art «Komm zu uns, Sahra!» zugerufen hatte, ist Wagenknechts neue Partei im Osten nun faktisch zu jener politischen Kraft geworden, die es den etablierten Parteien...

Sem acordo no OE, houve RTP, Belém e... candidatos? Que disse Pedro Nuno
creator: Teresa Banha
content: P edro Nuno Santos, deu, esta quarta-feira, uma entrevista, na qual falou das negociações para o Orçamento do Estado para 2025, cuja proposta será entregue já na quinta-feira. Para além do documento, houve outros temas - e alguns nomes em cima da mesa. "Como todos sabem, o Governo e o Partido Socialista não chegaram a acordo, o que quer dizer que, neste momento, resta-nos esperar por conhecer o Orçamento do Estado e fazermos a nossa avaliação. No momento certo, apresentei uma proposta à Comissão Política Nacional", afirmou, em entrevista à CNN Portugal. Questionado sobre se já tem uma "vontade" em relação à aprovação ou não, Pedro Nuno Santos reforçou que precisa conhecer o acordo. "A minha vontade depende, desde logo, de conhecer o Orçamento do Estado e depois apresentar à Comissão política Nacional", afirmou, garantindo que ainda há tempo para determinar o sentido de voto. "Não há nenhuma razão para que o façamos já", disse. O líder socialista rejeitou que não saber o sentido de voto do PS neste momento não é um sinal de fragilidade, e apontou que a negociação que aconteceu foi infrutífera. "Não há drama sobre isso, faz parte da nossa democracia", defendeu. Em relação ao IRS Jovem e IRC, onde o Governo cedeu perante a negociação socialista, Pedro Nuno Santos afirmou: "O que nos distancia do Governo é muito mais do que estas medidas que foram discutidas". Dizendo que as 'linhas vermelhas' podiam ter sido noutras áreas, como na...

title: The Latest: Tornado watches in effect as Category 3 storm approaches Florida
content: Hurricane Milton, a Category 3 storm, is churning toward Florida’s west coast . The Tampa Bay area , home to more than 3.3 million people, is facing the possibility of widespread destruction after avoiding direct hits from major hurricanes for more than a century. Follow AP’s coverage of tropical weather at https://apnews.com/hub/hurricanes . Here’s the latest: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. — Space weather forecasters say a severe solar storm is heading to Earth that could stress power grids even more as the U.S. deals with major back-to-back hurricanes. A severe geomagnetic storm watch has been issued for Thursday into Friday. The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration said Wednesday it has notified operators of power plants and orbiting spacecraft to take precautions. It also alerted the Federal Emergency Management Agency about possible power disruptions. Experts do not expect the storm to surpass the extreme solar storm that hit Earth in May. That one was the strongest to strike in more than two decades. ▶ Read more on the solar storm’s expected effects. MIAMI — The U.S. Coast Guard has pre-staged and prepositioned personnel, aircraft and boats in advance of Hurricane Milton. “Our Coast Guard crews are part of the communities where they live and serve. Our homes and families were also impacted by Helene and now, they are threatened by Milton,” said Rear Adm. Douglas Schofield, the commander of the Seventh Coast Guard District in Miami. Coast Guard crews are ready to...

title: The Latest: Tornado watches in effect as Category 3 storm approaches Florida
creator: By The Associated Press
content: Hurricane Milton, a Category 3 storm, is churning toward Florida’s west coast . The Tampa Bay area , home to more than 3.3 million people, is facing the possibility of widespread destruction after avoiding direct hits from major hurricanes for more than a century. Follow AP’s coverage of tropical weather at https://apnews.com/hub/hurricanes . Here’s the latest: TAMPA, Fla. — More than 5,000 people were in shelters in the storm’s path east of the Tampa-St. Petersburg area but officials urged others not to venture out to one at this point, as storms began bringing down power lines and causing flooding Wednesday afternoon. Several tornadoes were reported in the area but none had touched down. “Unless you really have a good reason to leave at this point, we suggest you just hunker down,” Polk County Emergency Management Director Paul Womble said in a public update. The county had 19 shelters open, including three that were pet-friendly. Already officials were urging people to use common sense after the storm. Keep out of flooded areas because it can be hard to tell how deep the water is or what dangers lurk under the surface, Womble said. And be careful using generators: Don’t run them indoors or in garages, don’t spill gasoline on a hot motor and don’t link one to a home circuit if you’re not a professional electrician, he said. title: A BIGGER BANG
creator: Thomas Patier
content: IT WAS A CLEAR DAY , the kind where you can see forever. Especially if you’re standing on the airy terrace of Los Angeles’s Getty Center one mid-September morning. I’m here for the launch of the third iteration of Getty’s “Pacific Standard Time” program, newly rebranded into the far more keyword-searchable PST ART . The 900-foot elevation, with its sweeping god’s-eye view, prompts a little excavation through a few layers of history. I’m here because, within his own lifetime, founding philanthropist J. Paul Getty pulled off some rare alchemy: He worked out how to turn Oil into Art. His first big oil strike was in Muskogee, Oklahoma, in 1916; by 1954, the prospector turned aesthete had opened a part of his Malibu home as a museum to showcase his collection of art and antiquities. Twenty years later, the cliffside Getty Villa—a mirror re-creation of a palace destroyed by the eruption of Vesuvius—had been built to provide a permanent home for his now-immense hoard. Getty died in 1976, never seeing his vision completed, but he’s buried up there, forever overlooking the wide blue Pacific. Getty’s own legacy perhaps provides the ur-narrative behind the powerful, pertinent theme chosen for PST’s 2024–25 edition: “Art & Science Collide.” As the pace of technology races past our abilities to comprehend it, art can communicate scientific ideas more effectively than any academic paper. With the Getty Foundation disbursing $20 million worth of grant funding to more than seventy...

title: Trump Steps Up to House 275 Electrical Linemen as Hurricane Milton Approaches
creator: Michael Schwarz
content: Stories like this always remind me of the lies I once believed. In fact, I imagine many readers could also identify a period of time, or perhaps even a precise moment, when they came to realize, as I did in October 2016, that powerful people in the establishment media and elsewhere had systematically lied to us about now-former President Donald Trump, whom they falsely and hatefully caricatured as selfish, unhinged and power-hungry. Wednesday on the social media platform X, Eric Trump, son of the former president, posted a 24-second clip and a message welcoming 275 linemen from Florida Power & Light Company to the Trump National Doral Miami golf resort in Florida, where the linemen will stay free of charge as they prepare to respond to widespread power outages expected in the wake of Hurricane Milton. “You are amazing and the Trump Family, and entire state of Florida, appreciates you! Enjoy the rooms — they are the best in Florida! Be safe!” wrote. Honored to have 275 incredible linemen from FPL at as they get ready to respond to the aftermath of Hurricane ! title: The Cure explora el lado frágil del amor con su nueva canción “A Fragile Thing”
creator: Andrés Vilchis
content: Lo que necesitas saber: El nuevo disco de The Cure, 'Songs of a Lost World', llegará el 1 de noviembre y tenemos un nuevo sencillo. ¿Una canción de The Cure sobre el amor? Ufff, no la pensamos dos veces para escucharla de inmediato. Y así es como llega este nuevo sencillo titulado “A Fragile Thing” . La rola llega como segundo adelanto del nuevo disco de la banda, esto tras el lanzamiento de “Alone” hace tan solo unas semanas. Y de nuevo, Robert Smith y compañía nos traen un track sólido repleto de esa atmósfera melancólica que tanto nos gusta. The Cure comparte “A Fragile Thing” Ahora bien, ya dijimos que es una canción de amor... ¿Pero en qué sentido? Bueno, pues esta es una exploración de este sentimiento en su lado más dulce, pero también el más vulnerable . Y justamente, es el propio Robert Smith quien habló en un comunicado sobre el significado de la nueva canción de The Cure. “‘A Fragile Thing’ es la canción de amor del álbum, pero en realidad no es una canción de amor en el sentido que ‘Lovesong’ lo es... Trata de cómo el amor es la emoción más duradera, la más poderosa, increíblemente resistente y sin embargo, al mismo tiempo es increíblemente frágil “ . En cuanto a la letra, Smith nos da una narrativa al estilo “Just Like Heaven” donde el protagonista recuerda algunas cosas que habla con su persona amada. “‘Cada vez que me besas podría llorar’, dijo ella. ‘No me digas cuánto me extrañas porque podría dormir esta noche de un corazón...

title: Estudo alerta para consequências 'irreversíveis' com aquecimento acima de 1,5oC
creator: redacao@odia.com.br (AFP)
content: Se o clima no planeta esquentar mais do que 1,5 oC, o limite que os cientistas consideram mais seguro, as consequências serão "irreversíveis" para a humanidade, ainda que o limite seja reduzido temporariamente, concluiu um estudo publicado nesta quarta-feira (9) na revista científica Nature. O estudo, realizado por 30 cientistas durante três anos, responde a uma pergunta cada vez mais recorrente diante do atraso dos países em reduzir suas emissões de gases de efeito estufa. Visto que o limite de 1,5 °C, estabelecido pelo Acordo de Paris, às vezes parece comprometido, não deveríamos nos resignar a ver este limite superado durante algumas décadas? "Não", responderam taxativamente os cientistas que assinam o estudo. Um cenário deste tipo, alertaram, poderia ter consequências "irreversíveis", que se estenderiam por milhares de anos. Se a temperatura média aumentar mais que 1,5 oC, seriam alcançados "pontos de inflexão", como o degelo do permafrost e da turfa, dois imensos depósitos de carbono que, se desaparecerem, liberariam volumes enormes de gases de efeito estufa que, por sua vez, aqueceriam o planeta. Se o limite de 1,5 °C for superado durante um século, o nível do mar também poderia subir outros 40 centímetros, o que representaria uma ameaça para os países insulares, alertaram os autores. "Mesmo que conseguíssemos baixar as temperaturas, o mundo em que vivemos não seria mais o mesmo do que se não tivéssemos superado o limite", explicou...

title: Greg Cote's Thursday night NFL pick
content: GREG COTE’S NFL WEEK 6 THURSDAY PICK 49ERS (2-3) at SEAHAWKS (3-2) Line: SF by 3 1/2. Cote’s pick: SF 27-24. TV: 8:15 p.m. Thursday, Prime Video. Seattle may have a better-than-average home-field edge, but San Fran has won five straight in this NFC West rivalry including the past two in the shadow of the Space Needle. Niners are NFL’s best losing-record team (sorry, Bengals) and due to begin justifying why they are — for now — still second or third depending on the sportsbook in Super Bowl betting odds. The 49ers big problem? A year ago Brock Purdy and the fellas led NFL in red-zone offense with a touchdown percentage of 68. They presently sit 30th at 41%, bogging down late despite being second in league in yards per game. The obvious easy answer is RB Christian McCaffrey’s continuing injury absence with Achilles/calf issues. (He is eligible to return from IR this week but won’t. However he is back practicing on a limited basis, a good sign.) Meantime the Seahawks’ generous D could be at least a temporary antidote after giving up 71 combined points in consecutive losses to the Lions and Giants. Hawks are only 1-4 covering the line this year but I like ‘em at home with that extra half point. (Betting line courtesy ESPNBet as of midday Wednesday.) ©2024 Miami Herald. Visit at miamiherald.com . Distributed by Tribune Content Agency, LLC.

title: ‘Our patients deserve better’: Clinics grapple with uncertainty in Georgia’s abortion law
content: ATLANTA — Feminist Women’s Health Center, one of Georgia’s largest remaining abortion clinics, saw a 20% increase in appointments during the past week, when the state’s law was temporarily stricken from the books. Appointments at the clinic last week began earlier in the morning than they had in a while to allow medical professionals more time to see patients. The parking lot filled up more quickly, too. And while the facility draws protesters year-round, more people came throughout the week to voice their disagreement with abortion. Earlier that week, Fulton County Superior Judge Robert McBurney struck down the state’s abortion law banning most abortions once medical professionals can detect fetal cardiac activity, which is typically about six weeks into a pregnancy and before many know they are pregnant. It wasn’t the first time McBurney had set aside the law, which was passed by the General Assembly in 2019 but took effect in 2022 after the U.S. Supreme Court overturned constitutional protections guaranteeing abortion as a right. Two years ago, he blocked the law on technicalities in the process, but the Georgia Supreme Court overturned that ruling. This time McBurney found the law to be unconstitutional. As in 2022, the state asked the Georgia Supreme Court to put the law back on the books while it appealed the lower court’s decision. And, as in 2022, the Supreme Court obliged. Just as quickly as patients had flocked to the clinic, the ground shifted again. “It is cruel...

title: El comandante Villalba usó a otros guardias civiles para esconder el dinero en efectivo que le daba la red de Koldo
creator: Irene Dorta
content: La trama de empresarios investigados en el 'caso Koldo' dio durante meses 2.000 euros en efectivo al comandante de la Guardia Civil Rubén Villalba a cambio de que éste le proporcionara protección en las comunicaciones de la red corrupta. Villalba utilizó a otros agentes que tenía a su cargo para acudir al despacho de de Víctor de Aldama, uno de los principales imputados, a por los pagos o para ingresarlo en su cuenta corriente sin levantar sospechas. Así lo revela un informe de la Unidad Central Operativa (UCO) de la Benemérita que acaba de ser aportado en la Audiencia Nacional donde se lleva la investigación. En total, los ingresos que le hizo la trama ascendieron supuestamente a 88.119 euros. Según esta información, los pagos en efectivo comenzaron en 2021, si bien la relación triangular entre Koldo García, el que fuera asesor del Ministerio de Transportes, Aldama y Villalba empezó en 2019. De hecho, distintas fuentes relacionadas con la causa confirman que tanto el empresario como el asesor ministerial eran colaboradores de la Unidad Central Especial (UCE) del servicio de Información de la Guardia Civil, cuando Villalba trabajaba en esa unidad. El cruce de mensajes de los teléfonos de los detenidos, la información de las cuentas bancarias del comandante y algunas grabaciones que ha intervenido la UCO componen el puzle de las conclusiones a las que llega este informe: que Villalba era un asalariado más de la red corrupta y que su función consistía en...

القمة الرقمية الإفريقية 2024: التحول الرقمي لوسائل الإعلام في صلب المناقشات
content: تستمر فعاليات اليوم الثاني من القمة الرقمية الإفريقية (ADS) 2024 في تسليط الضوء على أحدث التوجهات في مجال التحول الرقمي والذكاء الاصطناعي، حيث تجمع بين رواد الرأي والخبراء والفاعلين الرئيسيين في القطاع لاستكشاف الفرص والتحديات التي تعيد تشكيل المشهد الاقتصادي الإفريقي. ناقشت جلسات اليوم مواضيع حيوية، مثل الثقافة الرقمية وتجربة المستخدم المحسّنة بالذكاء الاصطناعي، بالإضافة إلى أهمية العلامة الشخصية في عالم يزداد اتصالاً. وقد شاركت شركات رائدة، مثل تيك توك، Salesforce، Microsoft وGoogle، بوجهات نظرها حول تأثير التقدم التكنولوجي على استراتيجيات الأعمال والعلاقات مع المستهلكين. وكانت أحد أبرز اللحظات جلسة حول التحول الرقمي لوسائل الإعلام، بمشاركة فاعلين مؤثرين في المشهد الإعلامي المغربي والدولي. حيث تناولت النقاشات تأثير الرقمنة على وسائل الإعلام التقليدية، والديناميكيات الجديدة للاستهلاك، وأهمية الابتكار لتلبية التوقعات المتزايدة لجمهور دائم الاتصال. صرّح محمد الهيثمي، الرئيس المدير العام لمجموعة لوماتان: "لقد شكل ظهور الرقمنة تحولاً حقيقياً. حيث تم تغيير النموذج الاقتصادي بالكامل، مما استدعى إعادة التفكير في جوهر الوسيلة الإعلامية، وقدرتها على الحفاظ على خطها التحريري مع تطويره لمواكبة التحول الرقمي في القطاع. أصبحت شركة الإعلام اليوم شركة تكنولوجيا، مع وظائف جديدة، وتحديات ثقافية، وضرورة تحقيق أرباح لضمان استمراريتها." وأشارت بيسان كيرات، مديرة التسويق والبرمجة في الشركة الوطنية للإذاعة والتلفزة، إلى أن "التحول الرقمي كان فرصة حقيقية للنمو، مما دفعنا داخل المجموعة إلى إعادة التفكير في جميع الوظائف. حيث كانت التكنولوجيا هي المحرك لهذا...

title: Серия взрывов потрясла Сумы на северо-востоке Украины
content: На фоне объявленной воздушной тревоги в Сумах на северо-востоке Украины произошел повторный взрыв, сообщает украинское издание "Страна.ua". Ранее в этом же городе была зафиксирована серия взрывов, о чем сообщил украинский телеканал "24 канал". По данным издания, взрывы в Сумах произошли в короткий промежуток времени друг от друга, вызвав тревогу среди местного населения. В Telegram-канале издания появилось сообщение о повторном взрыве в Сумах.

title: Dólar sobe pelo 3o pregão consecutivo com atenção a Fed, China e fiscal
creator: admin3
content: O dólar se fortaleceu ainda mais globalmente e ante o real no período da tarde desta quarta-feira, 9, valorizando-se pelo terceiro pregão consecutivo. A maior demanda pela divisa americana ocorre porque as incertezas em relação aos próximos passos do Federal Reserve (Fed, o banco central norte-americano) não se dissiparam após a ata da última reunião de política monetária, enquanto o mercado segue frustrado com a falta de estímulos expressivos por parte da China e também atento a qualquer hipótese que poderia deteriorar o quadro fiscal brasileiro. Nesta quarta, o real teve a 2a pior performance entre as principais moedas de emergentes e exportadores de matéria-prima, ficando atrás apenas do dólar neozelandês. O DXY, que mede a moeda americana ante uma cesta de seis rivais fortes subiu 0,36%, a 102,928 pontos. Já contra o real, o dólar teve valorização mais expressiva: avançou 0,98%, a R$ 5,5871 no contrato à vista. Por volta das 17h22, o contrato para novembro subia 0,93%, a R$ 5,6020. O dólar à vista e para novembro renovou máximas em sintonia com o DXY à tarde, após a ata da última reunião do Fed não ter trazido grande variação nas apostas do mercado para o ciclo de afrouxamento do banco central americano. “Desde o relatório de emprego dos Estados Unidos de setembro payroll, o mercado passou a duvidar se vai haver um corte de juros do Fed de até 25 pontos-base na próxima reunião, e isso machuca todas as moedas. A ata só reforçou que...

title: Düzce'de sis etkili oldu
content: Kentte sabah saatlerinde etkisini gösteren sis, Anadolu Otoyolu'nun Düzce kesimi ile Kalıcı Konutlar Bağlantı Yolu ve Kuzey Çevre Yolu'nda sis ulaşımı olumsuz etkiledi. Polis ekipleri, sürücüleri yolda dikkatli ilerlemeleri konusunda uyardı. Güneyden Abant, Elmacık, Keremali, kuzeyden Orhan ve Kaplandede dağlarının çevrelediği Düzce Ovası'nı kaplayan sis, havadan görüntülendi.

title: „Pólitískur dónaskapur“ af hálfu Svandísar
content: Ásmundur Friðriksson, þingmaður Sjálfstæðisflokksins, segir að það hafi verið pólitískur dónaskapur af hálfu formanns Vinstri grænna að tala um kosningar í vor án samráðs við formenn hinna stjórnarflokkanna. Svandís Svavars­dótt­ir, ný­kjör­inn formaður Vinstri grænna, sagði í sam­tali við mbl.is um helg­ina að það skuli stefnt að kosningum í vor. Ásmundur kveðst finna fyrir mjög mikilli þreytu meðal sjálfstæðismanna sem finnist þeir vera skildir eftir í samstarfinu. Krafa sé uppi um það að verkefnin sem ríkisstjórnin ætlaði sér að klára verði kláruð. Bjarna að ákveða hvenær þing skuli rofið Finnst þér eðli­legt að formaður í rík­is­stjórn skuli stíga fram og segja svona án þess að vera bú­inn að ræða við hina for­menn­ina? „Mér þetta náttúrulega bara pólitískur dónaskapur að ráðherra í ríkisstjórn Bjarna Benediktssonar sé að ákveða hvenær samstarfinu eigi að ljúka vegna þess að þingrofsrétturinn er í höndum forsætisráðherra. Það á auðvitað að koma í hans hlut að tilkynna hvenær kosningar fara fram. Þannig mér fannst það skot vera hátt yfir markið,“ segir Ásmundur í samtali við mbl.is. Ekki á vetur setjandi ef verkefnin verða ekki kláruð Óli Björn Kára­son skrifaði grein í Morg­un­blaðið í dag þar sem hann seg­ir úti­lokað að rétt­læta sam­starf með Vinstri græn­um. „En nú er lang­lund­ar­geð mitt end­an­lega þrotið. Fram­ganga Vinstri grænna er með þeim hætti að úti­lokað er að rétt­læta sam­starf við þá...

title: Polluted waste from Florida's fertilizer industry is in the path of Milton's fury
creator: By MICHAEL BIESECKER and JASON DEAREN - Associated Press

title: Polluted waste from Florida's fertilizer industry is in the path of Milton's fury
content: As Hurricane Milton bears down on Florida’s west coast with powerful winds and flooding rain, environmentalists are worried it could scatter the polluted leftovers of the state’s phosphate fertilizer mining industry and other hazardous waste across the peninsula and into vulnerable waterways. More than 1 billion tons of slightly radioactive phosphogypsum waste is stored in “stacks” that resemble enormous ponds at risk for leaks during major storms. Florida has 25 such stacks, most concentrated around enormous phosphate mines and fertilizer processing plants in the central part of the state , and environmentalists say nearly all of them are in Milton’s projected path. “Placing vulnerable sites so close on major waterways that are at risk of damage from storms is a recipe for disaster,” said Ragan Whitlock, a staff attorney at the environmental group Center for Biological Diversity. “These are ticking time bombs.” Phosphogypsum, a solid waste byproduct from processing phosphate ore to make chemical fertilizer, contains radium, which decays to form radon gas. Both radium and radon are radioactive and can cause cancer. Phosphogypsum may also contain toxic heavy metals and other carcinogens, such as arsenic, cadmium, chromium, lead, mercury and nickel. That waste is even more troublesome because there is no easy way to dispose of it, leaving it to pile up and become an ever-growing target for such storms as the monster Milton, which is expected to slam into central Florida late...

title: No, you shouldn't store valuables in your dishwasher during a hurricane
content: As Hurricane Milton heads toward Florida, people are looking for ways to stay safe and protect their home. A social post circulating online recommends that people put their valuables in their dishwasher ahead of the storm. “When you evacuate, if you can’t take everything important with you then do this...empty your dishwasher and put these things in it, important papers, pictures, keepsakes or anything you want to keep safe from the storm or possible flooding. If you didn’t know...the dishwasher has a tight seal because it has to keep water in and it will keep water out so your stuff should be safe,” the post says. THE QUESTION Should you store valuables in your dishwasher during a hurricane? THE SOURCES General Electric Appliance Doctor An article published by the City of College Station, Texas National Flood Insurance Program Aztec Plumbing & Drains Canyon Hills Plumbing Sears Home Services THE ANSWER No, you should not store valuables in your dishwasher during a hurricane. WHAT WE FOUND Experts recommend against storing valuables in a dishwasher during a hurricane because your belongings could still be damaged if there’s severe flooding. “Many believe that dishwashers are waterproof because water does not get out when washing a load of dishes,” but the appliances are “not meant to stand up to high-pressure situations, such as flooding, and water will get in,” Appliance Doctor says . Appliance manufacturer General Electric also told VERIFY partner station WUSA9 that...

title: Ligue 2 : la famille Arnault va racheter le club du Paris FC, en compagnie de Red Bull
content: Le club parisien du Paris FC, actuel leader la Ligue 2 de football , va changer de propriétaire et être racheté par la famille Arnault (LVMH) et par la marque de boisson énergisante autrichienne Red Bull, ont appris mercredi 9 octobre au soir la direction des sports de radio France et France Bleu Paris auprès de plusieurs sources proches du dossier, confirmant une information du journal L'Équipe . à lire aussi Football : "La Ligue 2 se retrouve un petit peu prise au piège de cette programmation défavorable", estime un économiste du sport La famille Arnault, via une holding, va prendre environ 55% des parts du club. D'ici 2027, cette société holding reprendra 30% supplémentaires appartenant à l'actuel président Pierre Ferracci, pour atteindre 85%. Une officialisation dans les prochaines semaines De son côté, Red Bull, la marque de boisson énergisante autrichienne qui possède déjà les clubs de Leipzig (Allemagne), Salzburg (Autriche) ou encore New York (États-Unis), va également prendre des parts au sein du club, aux alentours de 15%, confirme une seconde source. Les nouveaux propriétaires espèrent "à terme évoluer au stade Jean Bouin", à la place du stade Charléty. L'officialisation aura lieu le 17 octobre prochain. Le président du PFC depuis 2012, l'homme d'affaires Pierre Ferracci (72 ans), actionnaire majoritaire, avait déjà confié son souhait de passer la main.

title: Зеленский попросил хотя бы пригласить Украину в НАТО
creator: Лариса Кочеткова
content: Украинский лидер Владимир Зеленский обратился к союзникам с просьбой хотя бы пригласить Украину в НАТО. Соответствующее заявление он сделал по итогам переговоров с премьер-министром Хорватии Андреем Пленковичем. «Мы хотим получить первый шаг - приглашение. Приглашение в альянс не является членством в НАТО», – подчеркнул Зеленский. Он добавил, что Киев по-прежнему хочет быть принят в альянс, однако понимает, что в ближайшем будущем это не возможно. Однако приглашение в НАТО будет гарантировать Украине усиление ее позиции уже сейчас, что положительно скажется на различных «дипломатических движениях», в том числе в будущих переговорах. Ранее сообщалось, что украинские чиновники сдачу Российской Федерации части территории «в обмен на вступление» в Североатлантический альянс. В Киеве боятся, что украинской стороне не хватит ресурсов и поддержки западных государств, чтобы «выйти на границы 1991 года».

title: Кадыров пообещал отправить правонарушителей из Чечни на СВО или в колонию
content: В Чечне нарушителей закона, в том числе правил дорожного движения, будут направлять в зону спецоперации, заявил глава республики Рамзан Кадыров. В ходе совещания с командирами и начальниками силового блока республики он призвал вести более усиленную работы с проблемной молодежью. Он отметил, что среди молодежи есть те, кто регулярно совершает правонарушения и ведет «праздный, аморальный образ жизни». Среди таких правонарушений господин Кадыров назвал демонстративное нарушение ПДД, неправильную парковку и вождение под влиянием запрещенных препаратов. «Мы много раз предупреждали подобных смутьянов и нарушителей порядка. Отныне разговор с ними будет коротким. Не уважаешь закон — либо за решетку по максимально полагающемуся сроку, либо подписывай контракт и в зону СВО. Там врагу и показывай свою храбрость, дерзость и лихачество»,— сказано в сообщении господина Кадырова в Telegram . Глава Чечни подчеркнул, что такой подходит будет более целесообразным, чем привлечение правонарушителей к административной ответственности. Он добавил, что с учетом формирования в республике нового полка численностью 2,5 тыс. человек — «это будет уместно». Он также поручил депутату Госдумы Адаму Делимханову взять этот вопрос под контроль. В конце сентября Рамзан Кадыров сообщил , что в республике рассматривают возможность создания дополнительных резервных подразделений. По его словам, поручения на эту тему были даны «ответственным лицам на местах». Ольга Семеновых 29 сентября на Красной...

title: Startschuss am Mittwoch: Biemenhorst und Meerbusch feiern Siege
Izraelská armáda v Sýrii zabila tamojšieho operatívca bunky Hizballáhu
creator: tasrautor@mafraslovakia.sk (TASR)
content: Izraelská armáda v stredu pri nálete v južnej Sýrii zabila operatívca bunky proiránskeho militantného hnutia Hizballáh. S odvolaním sa na vyhlásenie izraelskej armády o tom informovala agentúra AFP. Podľa armádneho vyhlásenia o život prišiel Adhám Džahút, ktorý odovzdával informácie od predstaviteľov sýrskeho režimu organizácii Hizballáh. Zdieľal aj správy o dianí pozdĺž hranice Sýrie s Izraelom, pričom sa zameriaval na oblasť Golanských výšin. K náletu izraelskej armády došlo v okolí mesta Kunajtra ležiacom v údolí na Golanských výšinách. Spravodajský web The Times of Israel vo svojej správe podotkol, že citované vyhlásenie predstavuje vzácny prípad, keď izraelská armáda potvrdila svoju bojovú operáciu v Sýrii. Vo všeobecnosti sa totiž izraelská armáda vyhýba tomu, aby verejne priznala, že operuje aj v Sýrii.

title: Heartbroken Singer Exposes Her Brother’s Role In Attempted Kidnapping, Scamming Fans, And More
creator: Koreaboo
content: A heartbroken singer is going public with details about her brother to protect others from his predatory behavior. After many years of struggling, she and her family have decided to cut him out of their lives. A post shared by 爱讲废话的創作歌手|DIOR大颖🇲🇾 (@diorlying) 25-year-old Dior (also known as Da Ying ) is a Malaysian singer-songwriter, who has attracted fans from around the world with her catchy songs and poignant lyrics. On October 5, Dior posted an alarming set of photos on Instagram, along with a lengthy explanation. In the first photo, her younger brother Chen An Sheng (also known as Ansenn Tan ) is crying on his knees. Dior also included screenshots of her brother’s messages and Instagram account. A post shared by 爱讲废话的創作歌手|DIOR大颖🇲🇾 (@diorlying) Dior began her post by directly calling Chen out. “Gambling, stealing, scamming others, borrowing money from loan sharks – you did it all,” she wrote. “The younger brother that I thought had turned over a new leaf – @ansenn_t. Don’t believe him if he wants to borrow money from you, no matter the reason. Don’t believe anything that comes out of his mouth. He’s gone off the deep end. It’s embarrassing and laughable to post this, but I don’t think we can let him continue harming others like this.” Dior explained that she was exposing her brother’s history and behavior for everyone’s safety. His misdeeds, which were all tied to Chen’s ongoing gambling addiction, began when Dior was in her teens. Over the years, Chen repeatedly scammed...

title: PRI presenta acción de inconstitucionalidad contra la Reforma Judicial
creator: internet@elsiglodetorreon.com.mx (EL SIGLO DE TORREÓN )
content: El Partido Revolucionario Institucional (PRI), a través de su presidente Alejandro Moreno Cárdenas y la senadora Carolina Viggiano Austria, ha anunciado la presentación de una acción de inconstitucionalidad ante la Suprema Corte de Justicia de la Nación contra la reciente reforma judicial publicada el 15 de septiembre. En una rueda de prensa, Moreno y Viggiano argumentaron que la reforma, que modifica varios artículos de la Constitución, pone en riesgo la división de poderes y la independencia del poder judicial. La senadora expuso cinco puntos clave que sustentan su acción: Irregularidades en el Proceso Legislativo : La reforma se llevó a cabo sin el debido procedimiento y deliberación pública. Violación del Principio de Representación Política : La falta de discusión política socava la esencia de la democracia. Menoscabo de la División de Poderes : Se busca subordinar al poder judicial a otras instancias del gobierno. Acceso a la Justicia : La reforma entorpece los procedimientos judiciales al sustituir a todos los jueces y magistrados. Inestabilidad Judicial : La elección popular de jueces puede perjudicar a quienes tienen procesos abiertos. El PRI confía en que la Corte declare la reforma como inconstitucional y destaca su compromiso con la defensa del estado de derecho.

title: EVAKUIRALI SE S FLORIDE PRIVATNIM AVIONOM, PA IM SE SRUŠIO: Spašeni su (VIDEO)

Lokalna vatrogasna ekipa i prolaznik izvukli su ljude iz vode. A Air Station aircrew assisted 4 people and reportedly a dog after their aircraft went into the water off Albert Whitted Airport, Tues.
