title: بنك الإستثمار الأوروبي يدعم الـ “ONCF” لإستباق المخاطر المناخية
creator: ع.عياش
content: هبة بريس /. الرباط أعلن كل من بنك الاستثمار الأوروبي والمكتب الوطني للسكك الحديدية عن توقيعهما اتفاقية شراكة للدعم التقني تروم تشجيع بلورة استراتيجية للمرونة والتكيف المناخي لشبكة السكك الحديدية المغربية. وأكد الطرفان، في بلاغ مشترك، أن هذه الاتفاقية تُميز مرحلة جديدة في التعاون طويل الأمد بينهما لتعزيز البنيات التحتية للنقل بالمغرب، مع الحرص على مواجهة التحديات المتزايدة للتغير المناخي. وأفاد المصدر ذاته بأن هذه الشراكة ترمي إلى دعم المكتب الوطني للسكك الحديدية في استباق المخاطر المناخية، وتطوير حلول التكيف للبنيات التحتية للسكك الحديدية، وتحسين مرونة الشبكة في مواجهة الظروف الجوية القاسية. وفي هذا الإطار، ستتجلى الغاية الأولى في تقييم المخاطر المناخية التي تتعرض لها شبكة السكك الحديدية المغربية، مع مراعاة الظواهر الجوية مثل درجات الحرارة القصوى، الأمطار الغزيرة، الرياح العاتية، أو التعرية. بعد ذلك، سيتم تطوير حلول التكيف المخصصة للمناطق والبنيات التحتية الأكثر تأثرا بغرض تقليل مخاطر الضرر. وفي النهاية، سيتم إرساء استراتيجية طويلة الأمد لتعزيز مرونة الشبكة، مما سيمكن من تقليل التكاليف المستقبلية المتعلقة بالأضرار المناخية وانقطاعات التشغيل، مع تحسين استدامة شبكة السكك الحديدية المغربية. كما سيلجأ هذا الدعم التقني لطرق تقييم المخاطر المناخية المعترف بها، على غرار المنهجية التي تسمح بتصنيف البنيات التحتية حسب درجة تأثرها، واقتراح حلول مناسبة لتعزيز مرونتها. وسيمتد هذا التعاون طيلة 24 شهرا، مع عمليات تسليم تشمل خرائط تفصيلية، وتحليلات لنقاط الضعف، وتوصيات تقنية. وبالنسبة لبنك الاستثمار الأوروبي، باعتباره البنك المعني بمجال المناخ في الاتحاد الأوروبي، فإن...

title: Why General Motors Shares Are Trading Higher Wednesday
creator: Vaishali Prayag
content: General Motors Co. GM shares are trading higher on Wednesday. The rise comes after positive analyst notes from Wedbush Securities and RBC Capital, which reiterated their bullish stances on the automaker's future . During the 2024 Investor Day, GM's management also provided crucial updates on its progress and vision, focusing heavily on its ongoing transition to electric vehicles. What To Know: Wedbush Securities analysts Daniel Ives and John Katsingris reaffirmed their Outperform rating for General Motors, with a 12-month price target of $55. They pointed to the automaker’s robust progress in its electric vehicle business as a key driver of the company’s future growth. As of the third quarter of 2024, General Motors produced 120,000 EVs in North America, with plans to hit 200,000 units by year-end. The analysts noted that General Motor's strategic investments over the past few years are starting to pay off. The company has strengthened its internal combustion engine portfolio while scaling its EV production, managing to grow EV deliveries by 60% year-over-year. Looking forward to 2025, Ives and Katsingris expect General Motors to narrow its EV-related losses by as much as $4 billion. The company’s upcoming EV models, such as the Cadillac Escalade IQ, next-gen Chevy Bolt and GMC Sierra EV Denali, are expected to drive further market share gains. RBC Capital's Tom Narayan also reaffirmed an Outperform rating with a price target of $54, positioning General Motors as the legacy...

title: Família perde controle de empresa para megainvestidor e ex-CEO quebra o silêncio
content: Por volta das 10h desta quarta-feira (9), um fato relevante publicado pela Rossi Residencial (RSID3) chamou a atenção. O documento assinado pela recém-empossada CEO e diretora de relações com investidores (DRI), Maria Pia, acusa o antigo DRI e presidente da companhia, Fernando Miziara, de publicar dois comunicados aos acionistas depois de destituído de suas funções na construtora. Miziara foi exonerado dos cargos pelo conselho de administração da Rossi na última segunda-feira (7). No documento protocolado na Comissão de Valores Mobiliários (CVM), Pia alega que o ex-chairman “teria se aproveitado indevidamente das senhas de acesso da companhia” para fazer chegar aos investidores de RSID3 duas informações sensíveis sobre a Rossi, por meio da publicação de dois fatos relevantes às 18h03 e 19h26 daquele dia. Em entrevista ao E-Investidor , o ex-CEO diz que só soube do desligamento às 19h26, quando recebeu um e-mail do conselho de administração da companhia sobre a destituição dos cargos. “Após 9 anos de casa, não fui sequer avisado. Fiquei sabendo por e-mail”, afirma Miziara, que pretende interpelar cível e criminalmente a atual presidente Pia por calúnia e difamação, se não houver retratação. “O que ela fez foi muito sério”, afirma. O E-Investidor procurou a Rossi Residencial e a família Rossi, mas não obteve retorno até a publicação desta reportagem. O espaço segue aberto. O megainvestidor Silvio Tini preferiu não comentar o assunto....

title: Barack Obama to launch get-out-the-vote tour Thursday in Pittsburgh
content: PITTSBURGH — Barack Obama will launch a get-out-the-vote tour for Democratic presidential nominee Vice President Kamala Harris in Pittsburgh on Thursday evening with a speech at the University of Pittsburgh's Fitzgerald Field House. Obama's visit occurs as polls show the race is a statistical tie in the Keystone State, with all results within the margin of error. Both Harris and the Republican nominee, former President Donald Trump — with their running mates and surrogates — have been barnstorming Pennsylvania to court every voter they can in what is considered to be a critical swing state. Harris is expected to visit Erie on Monday for a rally, but no further details on that event were immediately available. Pennsylvania, with 19 Electoral College votes, is the largest of the battleground states. Mail-in voting has already begun in Western Pennsylvania. According to Allegheny County officials, nearly 192,000 mail-in ballot applications have been approved, and almost 189,000 ballots have been mailed out as of this week. Nearly 24,000 completed ballots have already been returned to the elections office. No mail-in ballots will be opened and counted until Election Day. The county began hosting "over-the-counter" voting in the lobby of the County Office Building at 542 Forbes Ave on Sept 30. Over-the-counter voting will be available weekdays 8:30 am — 4:30 pm until the Oct. 29 deadline to request a mail-in ballot. In addition to putting their early ballots in the mail, county...

title: Bill Shaikin: Shohei Ohtani was supposed to fix the Dodgers' postseason woes. So why hasn't he?
content: This year would be different. This year would be about winning a postseason series. This year would be the year the best player in baseball made sure of it. Or not. Shohei Ohtani and the Dodgers are on the verge of elimination from the National League Division Series. The San Diego Padres beat the Dodgers on Tuesday, 6-5, so the Dodgers either win two straight games or lose in their first round for the third straight season. Ten years ago, the best player in baseball led a Southern California team into the playoffs. He would be voted his league's most valuable player, unanimously. He was Mike Trout, and his Angels would be eliminated in the first round. In his postseason debut, Trout had one hit in three games — a home run — in 12 at-bats. He reached base four times. Ohtani should be voted his league's most valuable player, unanimously. However, in his postseason debut, Ohtani has three hits — including one home run — in 13 at-bats. He has reached base three times. He has struck out six times, the most of anyone in the series and twice as often as anyone on the Padres. After stealing 59 bases in the regular season, Ohtani has not stolen a base in the postseason. Performance in the summer guarantees nothing in October. Consider Aaron Judge, the likely American League MVP. Judge is one for seven this October. In his previous postseason series, the 2022 AL Championship Series, he went one for 16. Fair or not, expectations are greater when your team rewards you with a...

title: Los 10 mejores jugadores formados por los equipos de Red Bull
creator: Jorge Cuevas
content: Lo que necesitas saber: Austria es la que más jugadores ha formado para que den el salto a la élite de Europa en la Bundesliga Hace casi 20 años, Red Bull comenzó su plan para tomar por asalto el futbol con varios equipos alrededor del mundo . Empezó en su país natal, Austria; después se expandió a Estados Unidos, Alemania y Brasil. Solo que su plan no se detuvo con estos cuatro equipos, sino que tienen una porcentaje mínimo de la propiedad del Leeds United , o sea, que están invirtiendo en llegar a la Premier League . Para 2025, su plan es que Jurgen Klopp , como Director de Futbol Global , haga todos los equipos de Red Bull den el salto de calidad al siguiente nivel y que la cantera de muchos más frutos. Hablando de cantera, los 10 talentos desarrollados por Red Bull Aunque no lleva tanta trayectoria dentro del futbol mundial, la cantera de Red Bull tiene a grandes graduados y acá presentamos a los 10 mejores. Ojo, que solo el Bragantino no tiene un jugador destacado formado en su cantera . Joshua Kimmich llegó al RB Leipzig cuando el equipo estaba en las divisiones inferiores y se desarrolló en la cantera del equipo alemán, aunque primero estuvo con el Stuttgart. Estuvo con el equipo durante el tiempo en tercera y segunda división. No alcanzó a llegar con el RB Leipzig a la Bundesliga, pero es el futbolista más exitoso que ha salido de la cantera. Llegó al Bayern Munich y los trofeos comenzaron a llega r. Le podemos contar 21 trofeos en su carrera ,...

title: Mes Rosa: acercan a las mujeres servicios de prevención y detección de cáncer de mama
creator: Editor
content: – _A través de MediChihuahua, módulos permanentes y ferias de salud, 16 mil 240 ciudadanas han accedido a consultas, mastografías, tamizajes y tratamientos en lo que va del año_ En el marco del mes de la Sensibilización sobre el Cáncer de Mama, la Secretaría de Salud reafirmó el compromiso para garantizar que todas las chihuahuenses cuenten con acceso a servicios médicos de calidad que les permitan prevenir y detectar oportunamente el padecimiento, sin importar el lugar en el que se encuentren. Gracias a programas como las Ferias de Salud, MediChihuahua, Unidades Médicas Móviles y actividades permanentes, se ha beneficiado a 16 mil 240 ciudadanas en lo que va del año, a través de 6 mil 582 exploración clínicas y 11 mil 571 mastografías de tamizaje. Leticia Ruiz González, directora de Prevención y Control de Enfermedades, dio a conocer que durante el mes de octubre desarrollarán diversas actividades con el fin de concientizar y sensibilizar a la población en general. El calendario de eventos incluirá ferias de salud, jornadas de tamizaje y diversas actividades que se llevarán a cabo en 11 municipios a partir del 11 de octubre y hasta el día 30. La funcionaria exhortó a las chihuahuenses a aprovechar las atenciones y estudios preventivos que se brindan en todas las unidades, como lo son las consultas, tamizajes y acompañamiento, con el fin de disminuir el riesgo de padecer una complicación en el futuro. La dependencia recuerda que la detección...

title: "Tražila mi je 200 €": Zola nikad žešće o Mariji Kulić, ispričao da Miljani uzimaju novac poslednjih 10 godina
creator: Aleksandra Miletić
content: Pre tri nedelje, javnost je ostala šokirana saznanjem da je aktuelna učesnica "Elite 8", Miljana Kulić ponovo u drugom stanju i to ni manje ni više, već sa Lazarom Čolićem Zolom, koji se nakon duge medijske pauze oglasio. Lazar Čolić Zola, bivši učesnik "Elite 8", i možda budući otac drugog Miljaninog deteta progovorio je o glasinama da je on savetovao Miljanu da ode na abortus, ali je i otkrio da li bi voleo da to dete, ukoliko Kulićeva odluči da zadrži trudnoću, odrasta zajedno s njih dvoje. - Jedan dan čujem da je visokorizična, drugi dan da je sve okej, treći dan da opet nešto nije dobro, konstatno se menjaju situacije...Demantovao sam da smo se čuli i da sam rekao da sam za kiretažu, ona je rekla da želi da joj pošaljem 200 evra da ide na kiretažu. Posle tih stvari čujem neke raznorazne priče, čuo sam poslednji put da je sve okej što se tiče bebe, ne želim da ide na abortus ako je sve dobro- rekao je Zola i otkrio da bi voleo da uđe u "Elitu" da razgovara sa Miljanom. - Iskreno, voleo bih da popričam sa njom, da popričamo privatno, da joj kažem da nema potrebe da se brine, da neke stvari izmišlja i da treba da bude svesna da sam ja uz nju... Zašto to sve znači da mene ne bi zanimalo moje dete i da bih ja detetu okrenuo leđa? Nemam ja da poručim Mariji ništa, ona ima neke svoje teorije za raznorazne stvari, kod nje je u pitanju novčanik njene ćerke, pa se ona uzdrmala za njenu egzistenciju. Niti me zanima njen novčanik, ni...

title: “Ramushin e presin ditë të vështira...”/ Analisti ‘godet’ kreun e AAK-së: E nxori urrejtjen e tij patologjike ndaj Kurtit!
content: Kryetari i AAK-së dhe kandidati i kësaj partie për kryeministër Ramush Haradinaj, ka një kohë të gjatë që po shprehet ashpër ndaj kryeministrit të Kosovës, Albin Kurti. Ai së fundmi është shprehur se, nuk do të bashkëpunonte me askënd për të i mundësuar Albin Kurtit edhe një mandat tjetër. “Për Kurtin kryeministër nuk bëj koalicion. Me bashkëqeverisë me opozitën për një kryeministër të opozitës në rastin konkret me mua ose me dikë nga opozita, ne nuk jemi kundër të bashkëpunojmë me Vetëvendosjen. Prandaj ia përmenda edhe Listën Serbe, se ka plot raste që në bazë të kushtetutës jemi detyruar të punojmë me të gjithë, nuk duhet thënë që nuk punojmë me Vetëvendosjen, këtu është një dallim, nuk bashkëpunojmë me askënd me Kurtin kryeministër”. Haradinaj tutje ka thënë se, Kurti nuk do të jetë kryeministër më, ndërsa kur u pyet se a do të mund të ishte president u përgjigj me fjalën “nuk besoj”. “Nuk besoj që ka vullnet politik sot te opozita, kurrkush nga ne për t’ia zgjatur Kurtit edhe një ditë qeverisje, nuk shoh askënd nga opozita që do të bëj koalicion me Kurtin”. Pas këtyre deklaratave të Haradinajt ka reaguar profesori dhe analisti politik Binak Maxharraj Ai shprehet se Haradinaj ka urrejtje patologjike ndaj Kurtit, duke shtuar, se kreu i AAK-së, po shkon shumë larg me këtë. “Ky njeri tash e tri vite e më shumë nuk ndalet duke e sharë e denigru njeriun i cili i mori mbi 50% të...

title: S&P 500 Hits Record High in Run-Up to CPI Report: Markets Wrap
content: (Bloomberg) -- Wall Street traders gearing up for key inflation data sent stocks to fresh all-time highs. Treasuries retreated while the dollar notched its longest winning run in more than two years. On the eve of a report expected to show consumer prices continued to moderate, the S&P 500 approached 5,800. The gauge hit its 44th record in 2024, with tech shares once again leading the charge. Apple Inc. climbed 1.7%. Nvidia Corp. halted a five-day rally. Tesla Inc. edged lower ahead of the Robotaxi launch. Alphabet Inc. fell 1.5% on news the US is weighing a Google breakup in a historic big-tech antitrust case. Major technology stocks have undergone volatility in both directions of late, but weakness represents an attractive buying opportunity, according to Solita Marcelli, chief investment officer Americas at UBS Global Wealth Management. “We remain positive on the tech sector as well as the outlook for artificial intelligence,” and “against this backdrop, we believe volatility should be utilized to build long-term AI exposure,” she said. Markets barely budged after minutes of the latest Federal Reserve gathering, which showed Jerome Powell received some pushback on a half-point rate cut in September, as some officials preferred a smaller reduction. “Today’s Fed minutes were pretty ‘ho-hum,’ which could actually be a good thing for stock investors,” said David Russell at TradeStation. “Policymakers agree inflation is fading and they see potential weakness in job growth....

title: Disney World and Universal closures halt Orlando tourism as Milton approaches
creator: By MIKE SCHNEIDER - Associated Press
content: ORLANDO, Fla. (AP) — Tourism in Orlando rapidly came to a standstill Wednesday with the main airport and at least three theme parks and other businesses set to shut down , leaving Florida residents and visitors fleeing Hurricane Milton to hunker down in area hotels. Milton, which is expected to come ashore late Wednesday as a major storm , threatened to ruin the vacations of tens of thousands of tourists who came to Orlando to visit the likes of Walt Disney World, Universal Orlando and SeaWorld, or partake in October festivities like Universal's Halloween Horror Nights. Disney and Universal were due to close Wednesday afternoon while SeaWorld did not open at all. All are expected to remain closed on Thursday. Orlando International Airport, the nation's seventh busiest and Florida's most trafficked, ceased operations Wednesday morning. The closures tempered expectations for some tourists while the impending storm raised some anxiety in others. Linda and Bob Shaffer from northeast Pennsylvania said they had stocked up on pizza, peanut butter, drinks, flashlights and a deck of cards at their rental condo. They decided to walk around the resort’s entertainment in the hours before they planned to hole up during the hurricane. “We’re just killing time until we have to stare at each other for the next 24 hours,” Linda Shaffer said. Meanwhile, the soggy weather didn’t faze Serena Hedrick or her 16-year-old son, Corey, as they headed into Universal Studios on Wednesday. Corey had...

title: Looming Israeli Strike on Iran Will Offer Fresh Test of US Sway
content: President Joe Biden has warned Israel against attacking Iran’s nuclear sites, and US officials worry a strike on its energy infrastructure could roil energy markets. But with Israeli retaliation against Iran expected at any time, the US is finding it has few assurances against further escalation. Biden’s team is pressing Israel to limit its retaliation against Iran for missile attacks last week to military targets such as air bases and missile sites. Rather than Israel knocking out oil facilities or other economic targets, the US is proposing alternatives such as a fresh round of economic sanctions, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified discussing private deliberations. The US thinking is based on giving Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu an off-ramp that would allow him to resist calls from hard-liners in his coalition who call for far more severe retribution. Whether he takes it is another matter, especially given that the Biden administration has so far declined to enforce its opinions by cutting off weapons sales to Israel. There are political concerns too: Vice President Kamala Harris’s campaign is anxious to keep the conflict from draining support in battleground states, especially Michigan, with its substantial population of Arab and Muslim Americans. Netanyahu, who has openly touted his close relationship with Republican candidate Donald Trump, has shown little interest in doing anything to help her. Netanyahu knows Biden...

title: Eski İlişkisi Toksik Olan Birinin Yeni İlişkisinin Sağlıklı Olduğunu Anlamasının 10 Yolu
content: Hayatınıza giren her insan sonsuza kadar kalmayabilir. Size zorluklar çıkarıp ilerlediğiniz yola engeller koyan birileri ile karşılaşabilirsiniz. Maalesef bazen böyle insanlar ile ilişki sürecine girersiniz... Ama unutmayın, zorlukları ve engelleri aşmanız da sizi geliştirir. Gelişen ve güçlenen sizler, toksikliklerden de arınırsınız. Toksik olanı geride bıraktığınızı ve sağlıklı bir ilişkiye başlayıp başlamadığınızı anlamanızı sağlayacak maddelerle geldim! 1. İçinize yönelip neler hissettiğinize bakın. Dönüp kendinize ne hissettiğinizi sorun. Olumlu olumsuz tüm duygularınızı önünüze alıp inceleyin. Partnerinizin size hissettirdiklerinin nasıl olduğunu bu şekilde görebilirsiniz. Huzur, mutluluk, heyecan gibi olumlu duyguların hakim olduğu bir iç dünyanız var ise toksiklik barındırmadığını anlarsınız. 2. Geçmiş ile şu anı karşılaştırın. Geçmiş geçmişte kalmalı, evet. Ama şu anki ilişkinizin sağlıklı olduğunu anlayabilmeniz için geçmişteki partnerinizin hareketleri ile şimdiki partnerinizin hareketlerini karşılaştırabilirsiniz. Bir sorun karşısındaki tavırlarının, size karşı yaklaşımının nasıl olduğunu daha net bir şekilde görebilir, sağlıklı mı yoksa toksik mi olduğunun ayırdına varabilirsiniz. 3. İletişiminizin açık olup olmadığına bakın. Daha önce zarar görmüş biri olarak nelerden etkilendiğinizi, kırıldığınızı biliyor durumdasınız. Bu yüzden kendinizi ifade ederken zorlanmamanız gerekir. Bir daha...

title: ارتفاع عدد ضحایا العدوان الصهیونی على لبنان إلى 2141 شهیداً و10099 جریحاً
content: ووفقا للوكالة الوطنية اللبنانية للإعلام، قال مركز عمليات طوارئ الصحة العامة التابع لوزارة الصحة اللبنانية في بيان: إنه “تم تسجيل 22 شهيداً و80 جريحاً خلال الساعات الـ 24 الماضية ليرتفع العدد الإجمالي منذ بدء العدوان الإسرائيلي على لبنان إلى 2141 شهيداً، و10099 جريحاً”. وتتواصل اعتداءات العدو الصهيوني الوحشية وانتهاكاته للقانون الدولي الإنساني باستهداف المناطق السكنية المأهولة في مختلف مناطق لبنان بما فيها العاصمة بيروت. انتهى/

title: Abdul Salaam, a member of the Jets' 'New York Sack Exchange' in the 1980s, dies at 71
creator: By DENNIS WASZAK Jr. - AP Pro Football Writer
content: Abdul Salaam, a member of the Jets' famed "New York Sack Exchange" in the 1980s, has died. He was 71. The team announced Salaam's death Wednesday. ESPN reported the former defensive lineman died Tuesday after battling multiple health issues, according to his widow Debbie. Salaam, then known as Larry Faulk, was drafted by the Jets in the seventh round in 1976 out of Kent State. He converted to Islam the following year, taking the name that became familiar to NFL fans — and frustrated quarterbacks — and means “soldier of peace.” Salaam joined future Pro Football Hall of Famer Joe Klecko, the sack dancing Mark Gastineau and the gritty Marty Lyons to form the Jets' formidable defensive line that wreaked havoc on opposing offenses. While Salaam was at times overshadowed by his more popular and flashy teammates, he was a vital and beloved member of the Jets' “Sack Exchange" as a run-stuffing defensive tackle. “It's a sad day when you hear one of your teammates, Abdul Salaam, has passed away,” Lyons said in a video message on X. "Abdul, on behalf of all your teammates, the Jets organization and the fans, thank you for making us better players, thank you for making us better individuals. “We truly loved you, Abdul. You were the 'soldier of peace.' We'll see you on the other side." The Jets set a franchise record with 66 sacks — including a career-high seven by Salaam — during the 1981 season, the year before individual sacks became an official statistic. Salaam, Klecko, Gastineau...

title: 3M's Scotch Magic Tape named the Coolest Thing Made in Minnesota
creator: Sara Guymon
content: ST. PAUL — The Minnesota Chamber of Commerce and BMO’s "Coolest Thing Made in Minnesota" contest has concluded with 3M’s Scotch Magic Tape announced as the winner. The four finalists were announced on Sept. 30, 2024, and Minnesota residents were invited to vote for their favorite products every week until only one remained. The final four products were 3M’s Scotch Magic Tape, Red Wing Shoes’ Beckman Boot, Action Manufacturing’s Action Trackchair and Midwest Floating Island’s Innovative National Aquarium Wet Land. ADVERTISEMENT The winner was announced at the 2024 Manufacturers’ Summit on Oct. 8, at the Mall of America. The 32 original Minnesota-made products each won a head-to-head matchup in the top 64 bracket prior to the contest announcement. Out of the four finalists, one was local to southeast Minnesota. Red Wing Shoes has been a longtime industry leader. The city only has a population of 16,547 but the business has become very beloved in its 119 years of business. Their Beckman Boot is the product nominated for the “Coolest Thing Made in Minnesota” contest. The Beckman was designed in the early 2000s and named in honor of the Red Wing Shoes founder, Charles Beckman. The boot is crafted from full-grain Excalibur leather, it offers comfort with an added heel pad on the leather insole and reliable traction with a full leather and Gro-Cord outsole. Even though the Beckman Boot did not win, Minnesotans thought the product was cool enough to vote into the final round.

title: Banco recomenda compra das ações da Netflix (NFLX), mas isso não é bom para você
2024 NFL Week 6 odds: Giants, Jets underdogs in home primetime matchups
content: Both the New York Giants and Jets enter their 2024 NFL Week 6 matchups as underdogs despite being home in primetime games. Following their 29-20 victory over the Seahawks, the Giants (2-3) return home to take on the Cincinnati Bengals (1-4) on Sunday Night Football. The Giants enter the game as 3.5-point underdogs to the Bengals, a line that many Giants fans would be happy to see at the beginning of the year. Of the Giants five games thus far, four have been one-score games, and the Giants are 2-2 in such games. If they are to either keep it close or even beat Cincinnati, it will be up to the defense to limit the production of their offensive weapons. Personally, I like the Giants +3.5 based on the way their offense has performed over the last few weeks. After falling to 2-3 after a difficult 23-17 loss to the Vikings, the New York Jets will return back home to take on the Buffalo Bills on Monday Night Football. As of Oct. 9, the Jets are two-point underdogs to the Bills, with the game determining sole possession of first place in the AFC East. Just days after the firing of former head coach Robert Saleh, interim head coach Jeff Ulbrich will make his head coaching debut against the Bills, and with a prime opportunity to jump back on the right foot, the Jets seem like a sneaky pick. However, I don’t think this is the day the Jets bounce back.

title: Враг пытается атаковать под прикрытием авиации: произошло 119 боевых столкновений – Генштаб
content: На фронте по состоянию на 22:00, 9 октября, произошло 119 боевых столкновений воинов Сил обороны с российским войском. Защитники Украины истощают врага по всей линии фронта и в тылу, а армия РФ пытается атаковать под прикрытием авиации. Об этом говорится в сводке с передовой, опубликованной в Telegram-канале Генерального штаба ВСУ. Самая сложная ситуация на Кураховском и Покровском направлениях. На Харьковском направлении оккупанты четыре раза атаковали в районе Волчанска и Тихого. Под бомбежку попали населенные пункты Цуповка, Липцы и Слатино. В Купянском направлении 17 раз враг штурмовал позиции Сил обороны вблизи Кучеровки, Петропавловки, Степной Новоселовки, Вишневого, Новоосинового, Зеленого Гая и Кругляковки. Пять боестолкновений продолжаются. На Лиманском направлении 18 раз атаковали районы населенных пунктов Грековка, Андреевка, Макеевка, Невское, Екатериновка и Торское. Отражены 16 атак врага. На Краматорском направлении произошло семь штурмовых действий в районе Миньковки, Часова Яра, Александро-Шультиного, Белой Горы и Ступочек. Ситуация под контролем подразделений Сил обороны. На Торецком направлении оккупанты при поддержке авиации 11 раз атаковали вблизи Торецка, Нелиповки, Щербиновки и Дилиевки. На Покровском направлении произошло 25 боеприкосновений. Захватчики продолжают напор близ Сухой Балки, Новоторецкого, Миролюбовки, Крутого Яра, Луча, Лисовки, Сухого Яра и Селидового. Нашими защитниками на данный момент остановлено 23 атаки....

title: Užas u Ateni, grčki reprezentativac i suigrač Tina Jedvaja pronađen mrtav u bazenu
content: Nogometaš Panathinaikosa i grčke reprezentacije pronađen je mrtav u svom domu u Ateni. Tragedija se dogodila u srijedu navečer, kada je Baldock otkriven bez svijesti u svom bazenu. Iako su grčki mediji izvijestili da su hitne službe odmah reagirale, nažalost, Baldocku nije bilo spasa, a detalji o uzrocima njegove smrti još nisu poznati. Baldock se nedavno preselio u Atenu, nakon što je ovog ljeta postao igrač Panathinaikosa. Rođen u Buckinghamu u Engleskoj, Baldock je za grčku reprezentaciju debitirao 2022. godine, zahvaljujući grčkom podrijetlu njegove bake. U Panathinaikosu mu je suigrač bio i hrvatski nogometaš . Tijekom svoje karijere najpoznatiji je po dugogodišnjem angažmanu u Sheffield Unitedu, za koji je igrao sedam godina i ostvario 83 nastupa u Premier ligi. Za grčku reprezentaciju odigrao je 12 utakmica.

Avion je pao u vodu u blizini aerodroma Albert Vited u gradu St. Petersburgu u zapadnoj Floridi, prema američkoj obalnoj straži. Lokalna vatrogasna ekipa i prolaznik izvukli su ljude iz vode. title: After years of finding the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame cold as ice, Foreigner now knows what love is
creator: Associated Press
content: NEW YORK — This month, the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame rectifies a wrong that many rock fans will celebrate with their lighters up in the air — the band Foreigner will finally be welcomed in. The English-American rockers — with hits like “Cold as Ice,” “Hot Blooded” and “Waiting for a Girl Like You” — topped the charts in the 1970s and ‘80s but never made it into the hall — much less a ballot — until last year, despite being eligible for more than 20 years. “It’s just been a long wait and I know that we’ve done enough in our career to warrant induction,” says Al Greenwood, keyboardist and a founding member. “I’m not bitter about it. I mean, we’re finally getting in and that’s great.” Foreigner, led by singer Lou Gramm and guitarist Mick Jones, recorded nine Top 10 hits on the Billboard Hot 100 and six Top 10 albums on the Billboard 200, including “4,” which spent 10 weeks in the top spot in 1981. Foreigner were nominated for three Grammys and their songs have been heard on everything “Miami Vice” and “The Simpsons” to “Arrested Development” and “Stranger Things.” Tone-Loc sampled “Hot Blooded” to create “Funky Cold Medina.” “We weren’t the best looking band in the world. We weren’t the most dress-conscious band in the world. But Mick and Lou came up with some very, very strong songs and that’s what’s kept it going,” bassist Rick Wills says. “Sixteen top 30 hits isn’t too shabby.” The belated embrace by rock’s establishment has a bittersweet taste, since original bassist Ed...

title: U.S. considers asking court to break up Google as it weighs remedies in the antitrust case
creator: Associated Press
content: The U.S. Department of Justice is considering asking a federal judge to break up Google after its ubiquitous search engine was declared an illegal monopoly, but it is just one of many possible remedies under review, according to a court filing. In court papers filed late Tuesday, government lawyers outlined a series of potential remedies it may pursue, including restrictions on how Google's artificial intelligence mines other websites to deliver search results, and blocking Google from paying companies like Apple billions of dollars annually to ensure that Google is the default search engine presented to consumers on gadgets like iPhones. Tuesday's filing is the first step in a monthslong legal process to come up with remedies that could reshape a company that's long been synonymous with online search. "For more than a decade, Google has controlled the most popular distribution channels, leaving rivals with little-to-no incentive to compete for users," the antitrust enforcers wrote in the filing. "Fully remedying these harms requires not only ending Google's control of distribution today, but also ensuring Google cannot control the distribution of tomorrow." U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta r uled in August that Google's search engine has been illegally exploiting the dominance of its search engine to squash competition and stifle innovation. He has outlined a timeline for a trial on the proposed remedies next spring and plans to issue a decision by August 2025. The court...

title: Ворог намагається атакувати під прикриттям авіації: відбулося 119 бойових зіткнень – Генштаб
content: На фронті станом на 22:00 середи, 9 жовтня, відбулося 119 бойових зіткнень воїнів Сил оборони з російським військом. Захисники України виснажують ворога по всій лінії фронту і в тилу, а армія РФ намагається атакувати під прикриттям авіації. Про це йдеться у зведенні з передової, опублікованій у Telegram-каналі Генерального штабу ЗСУ. Найскладніша ситуація на Курахівському та Покровському напрямках. На Харківському напрямку окупанти чотири рази атакували в районі Вовчанська та Тихого. Під бомбардування потрапили населені пункти Цупівка, Липці та Слатине. На Куп’янському напрямку 17 разів ворог штурмував позиції Сил оборони поблизу Кучерівки, Петропавлівки, Степової Новоселівки, Вишневого, Новоосинового, Зеленого Гаю та Кругляківки. П’ять боєзіткнень тривають. На Лиманському напрямку 18 разів були атаковані райони населених пунктів Греківка, Андріївка, Макіївка, Невське, Катеринівка та Торське. Відбито 16 атак ворога. На Краматорському напрямку відбулося сім штурмових дій в районі Міньківки, Часового Яру, Олександро-Шультиного, Білої Гори та Ступочок. Ситуація під контролем підрозділів Сил оборони. На Торецькому напрямку окупанти за підтримки авіації 11 разів атакували поблизу Торецька, Неліпівки, Щербинівки та Диліївки. На Покровському напрямку відбулося 25 боєзіткнень. Загарбники продовжують натиск поблизу Сухої Балки, Новоторецького, Миролюбівки, Крутого Яру, Променя, Лисівки, Сухого Яру та Селидового. Нашими захисниками на цей час зупинено 23...

title: ZBOG ORGANIZOVANOG KRIMINALA: Akcija Policije FBiH, uhapšeni Armin Ćulum i njegov sin
content: U VELIKOJ akciji Policije Federacije BiH kodnog naziva "Geko" uhapšeno je sedam osoba, koje su privedene nakon saobraćajne kontrole dva vozila "audi". Među uhapšenima je, kako pišu federalni mediji, Armin Ćulum, pripadnik bajkerske organizacije "Junajted tribjuns" i kako navode i njegov sin A. L. Ć. (24). Armin Ćulum je, prema nezvaničnim informacijama, uhapšen u Ljubuškom, a onda je opkoljena i njegova kuća u Sanskom Mostu i pretresena. Iz Federalne policije su potvrdili da se više uhapšenih osoba tereti za krivično delo međunarodna trgovina ljudima, prostitucija i pranje novca. - Policija je u popodnevnim satima, kontrolisala vozila u kojima su se nalazili A. L. Ć. (24), A. Ć. (51) D. Ž. K. (24) E. K. (29) i J. D. (34). Prilikom kontrole saobraćaja oni su zaustavljeni i pozvani su u prostorije PU Ljubuški. Nakon toga su u službene prostorije došli i pripadnici FUP, a svi osim J. D. u 22 časa su lišeni slobode i uz pratnju policijskih službenika FUP napustili policijsku stanicu - saopšteno je iz federalne policije. Federalna uprava policije (FUP) je saopštila i da sprovodi operativnu akciju pod nadzorom Tužilaštva BiH, koja ima za cilj dokumentovanje krivičnog dela organizovanog kriminala u sklopu koje je uhapšeno više osoba, članova međunarodne kriminalne grupe. Prema nepotvrđenim informacijama, FUP bi trebalo da nastavi s plenidbom imovine uhapšenih, stečene na nezakonit način. - U toku su pretresi lica, mesta i druge radnje, koje...

title: 이경규, 닭라면 로열티 얼마? "평생 받아...딸 예림에 상속"
creator: 이재훈 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]이재훈 기자 = 코미디언 이경규가 자신이 개발한 닭 육수 기반 라면 로열티가 자녀에게 상속된다고 밝혔다. 이경규는 9일 방송된 MBC TV 토크 예능물 '라디오스타'에서 이 로열티를 딸인 배우 이예림에게 대물림 할 수 있다며 이렇게 자랑했다. MC 유세윤이 "닭 라면 로열티가 아직도 쏠쏠하다던데"라고 묻자 이경규는 "로열티는 평생이다. 계약서에 로열티가 우리 딸까지 받을 수 있도록 라면 회사에서 배려 해줬다. 내가 해달라고 한 게 아니다"라고 설명했다. 그러면서 "예림이 결혼할 때도 답례로 라면을 준비해서 줬다. LA, 멕시코에서도 그 라면을 좋아한다. 사실 여기 안 나와도 된다. '라스'를 위해서 나온 것"이라고 너스레를 떨었다. 이경규는 지난 2011년 3월 KBS 2TV 예능물 '해피선데이-남자의 자격' 라면요리 대결 편에서 닭 육수, 계란, 청양고추를 넣은 라면을 선보여 인기를 누렸다. 같은 해 한 회사가 상품화해 스테디셀러가 됐다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Drita superiore
content: Në një përballje të fortë të Raiffeisen Superligës A, KV Drita arriti një fitore të rëndësishme ndaj KV Skënderbeut me rezultat 1-3. Ndeshja u zhvillua me intensitet të lartë, ku secili set kishte dinamikën e tij dhe luftën e madhe për pikë. Seti i parë (22:25) KV Skenderbeu dhe KV Drita nisën ndeshjen me shumë energji dhe fokus. Në fillim të setit, Skënderbeu arriti të krijonte një avantazh të lehtë përmes shërbimeve të fuqishme dhe blloqeve të sakta në mes. Megjithatë, KV Drita u tregua më e qetë dhe e organizuar në fund të setit, duke shfrytëzuar gabimet e vendasve dhe duke rikuperuar me disa sulme precize, duke mbyllur setin me 22:25. Seti i dytë (25:21) Skënderbeu reagoi fuqishëm në setin e dytë. Me një mbrojtje të fortë dhe një sulm më agresiv nga krahu, ata arritën të mbajnë epërsinë për shumicën e kohës. Seti përfundoi në favor të tyre 25:21, duke barazuar rezultatin e përgjithshëm. Seti i tretë (22:25) Seti i tretë ishte përsëri i ngushtë, me të dyja skuadrat që luftonin për çdo pikë. KV Drita riktheu kontrollin, duke u mbështetur në sulmet e fuqishme nga lojtarët e tyre të linjës së parë dhe me disa blloqe kyçe që ndaluan sulmet e Skënderbeut. Presioni i vazhdueshëm i Dritës i detyroi ata të bëjnë disa gabime në pikat e fundit, duke e humbur setin me 22:25. Seti i katërt (16:25) Në setin e fundit, KV Drita dominoi plotësisht. Lojtarët e Dritës u treguan të vendosur për ta...

title: Presentan libro “De Fulgencio Batista a la Revolución Cubana: La diplomacia en tiempos de Gilberto Bosques”
creator: Cubadebate
content: Presentación del libro “De Fulgencio Batista a la revolución cubana: La diplomacia en tiempos de Gilberto Bosques”. Foto: Enrique González (Enro)/ Cubadebate. Este miércoles fue presentado el libro durante la clausura del segundo foro dedicado al diplomático mexicano, en la capitalina Casa Benito Juárez. El texto, coordinado por Joaquín Lozano y Laura Moreno, recopila alrededor de 15 ponencias presentadas el año pasado en la primera edición del Foro Gilberto Bosques, que fueron expuestas por intelectuales mexicanos, así como de la Universidad de La Habana, el Instituto de Historia de Cuba, la Biblioteca Nacional y el Centro Fidel Castro Ruz. “La etapa de Gilberto Bosques como embajador en Cuba fue convulsa, pues le tocó el tránsito de la dictadura a la Revolución. El libro nos permite conocer qué ocurrió realmente en estos años, analizando sobre todo las relaciones diplomáticas”, aseguró Lozano, quien también es director general del Acervo Histórico Diplomático de la cancillería mexicana. Los coordinadores del libro, Joaquín Lozano y Laura Moreno. Foto: Enrique González (Enro)/ Cubadebate. Próximamente, el texto estará disponible en su versión digital y en formato impreso. A la edición impresa se podrá acceder desde espacios como la Biblioteca Nacional, el Instituto de Historia de Cuba y el Centro Fidel Castro Ruz. “Estamos ultimando detalles de la obra, pero para nosotros era importante que los asistentes a este II Foro vieran que los esfuerzos...

title: George Baldock dead at 31: Former Sheffield United defender found in the pool of his home in Greece on Wednesday night
content: BREAKING NEWS George Baldock dead aged 31: Former Sheffield United defender found in the pool of his home in Greece Former Sheffield United defender George Baldock has reportedly died aged 31 Reports in Greece claim he was found in the swimming pool at his villa L ISTEN NOW: It's All Kicking Off!, available wherever you get your podcasts. New episodes every Monday and Thursday By Luke Power Published: 21:42, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 22:11, 9 October 2024 e-mail 10 View comments Former Sheffield United defender George Baldock was reportedly found dead in his swimming pool in Greece on Wednesday. The 31-year-old joined Panathinaikos in the summer after spending seven seasons with the Blades in the Premier League and Championship. Baldock, who was capped 12 times by Greece due to having a Greek grandfather, started his career at MK Dons and played in all of England's top five divisions. He also spent time playing on loan at IBV in Iceland. His death was initially reported by Greek outlets including Sport24 and SDNA . Baldock's wife reportedly tried to contact him and after several hours without a response, got in touch with the owner of the villa in which he lived in Glyfada, a suburb south of Athens. title: Kryeministri Kurti përgëzon bashkëorganizimin e evropianit U16 në Kosovë e Shqipëri
content: Kryeministri i Kosovës, Albin Kurti, ka mirëpritur lajmin për organizimin e Kampionatit Evropian CEV U16 në Kosovë dhe Shqipëri. Ai ka theksuar mbështetjen e plotë të institucioneve në të gjitha nivelet. “Urime të sinqerta bashkëorganizatorëve dhe suksese të veçanta për ekipet e vajzave të Kosovës e Shqipërisë” - thuhet mes tjerash në mesazhin e kryeministrit Kurti. FVK e vlerëson këtë mbështetje, duke e parë si garanci për një organizim shembullor në Prishtinë dhe Tiranë.

title: Instagram Tests WhatsApp Sticker to Facilitate DM Connection
creator: Andrew Hutchinson
content: This could be interesting. Instagram’s close to launching a new WhatsApp sticker for Instagram Stories, which will help brands drive DM connection with users in the messaging app. As you can see in this example, shared by Martijn Cales , the new WhatsApp Sticker will aim to help brands prompt a DM conversation. The sticker will be available to businesses that have connected their WhatsApp Business number to their IG account. That could be valuable, because both WhatsApp and DM connection are on the rise in most regions. WhatsApp in particular has seen a big surge in the U.S. of late , as more people look to engage within private chats, as opposed to posting their updates in public. Over time, the divisive and argumentative, and even performative nature of social media has turned more and more people off of sharing their updates with everyone, preferring instead to maintain connections with smaller groups of close friends. That’s led to social platforms becoming more akin to discovery services, in which people find good content in-stream, then share it via DM. Indeed, Instagram chief Adam Mosseri has noted several times that people now share a lot more in their DMs and Stories than they do to the main feed. That’s been a significant paradigm shift for online interaction, and now, brands are working to find new ways to maximize connection in line with these trends. Meta, for example, says that “Click-to-Message” ads have become a big winner , and this new WhatsApp sticker is...

title: Esta es la hora en la que tendrá lugar el esperado salto con la bandera en el Desfile para el Día de la Hispanidad 2024
creator: es
Redacción HuffPost
content: Este sábado, 12 de octubre de 2024, Madrid acogerá el tradicional ' un acto que se espera reúna a cerca de 100.000 personas entre las 11:00 y las 14:00 horas. El evento, que coincide con un día festivo en el calendario laboral, (más conocida como la glorieta de Atocha) y finalizará en la Plaza de Colón. Esta parada militar ocasionará importantes por lo que se aconseja a los ciudadanos y turistas que planifiquen sus desplazamientos con suficiente antelación. El desfile militar del 12 de octubre se desarrollará entre las 11:00 y las 14:00 horas, mientras que El itinerario del desfile comenzará en la glorieta del en Atocha. A continuación, el desfile avanzará por el Paseo del Prado, pasará por la Plaza de Cibeles y seguirá por el Paseo de Recoletos hasta llegar a la Plaza de Colón, donde culminará. La Tribuna Real estará situada en la Plaza Cánovas del Castillo, junto a la Fuente de Neptuno.

title: Šok potresao celu državu: Poznati milioner nekoliko puta angažovao plaćene ubicu da mu ubiju suprugu
creator: Anđelija Grujić
content: Vlasti istražuju navodni višegodišnji plan milionera iz Majamija, Serhija Pina, da ubije svoju suprugu Tatijanu Pino , tako što je angažovao plaćene ubice i pokušao da je otruje fentanilom, saopštila je policija. „U policiji sam već 27 godina i ovakav slučaj... izgledalo je kao nešto iz holivudskog filma, ali, nažalost, ovo je stvarni život,“ rekao je šef policije Pinekresta, Džejson Koen za Fox News Digital. Dana 23. juna, Alesandra Pino (26) pozvala je hitnu službu i rekla da je neko upravo uperio pištolj u njenu majku dok je ulazila u dvorište njihove kuće. „O, Bože. Moja mama je ovde,“ rekla je operateru, prenosi Miami Herald. „Možda su pucali na nju.“ Ovaj oružani napad bio je deo šireg plana za ubistvo , za koji FBI i američko tužilaštvo tvrde da ga je organizovao Alesandrin otac, poznati investitor iz Majamija, Serhio Pino, protiv svoje otuđene supruge Tatijane Pino. „[Tatijana] je stigla kući nakon obavljanja jutarnjih poslova, i kada je ušla u dvorište, muškarac je izašao iz kola sa vatrenim oružjem ,“ rekao je Koen. „Njena ćerka je zapravo izašla iz kuće i suočila se sa napadačem, koji očigledno nije došao zbog nje, jer, koliko razumem, imao je priliku da puca, ali to nije učinio.“ Tatijana je pobegla tako što je autom otišla u zadnje dvorište i svirala kako bi privukla pažnju svoje ćerke. Napadač je zatim uperio pištolj u Alesandru kada je izašla napolje, ali nije pucao i niko nije povređen, navodi se u optužnici....

title: Tare: "Kvaratskhelia poteva arrivare alla Lazio prima del Napoli. Inzaghi? Fra i top5 al mondo"
content: Ai microfoni di TvPlay , l'ex direttore sportivo della Lazio Igli Tare ha rilasciato una lunga intervista raccontando anche alcuni retroscena di mercato: Chi è stato il più difficile da gestire alla Lazio? "Luis Alberto ha un carattere molto forte, ma una volta che trovi le corde giuste è un ragazzo che ti dà l’anima in campo e fuori. A volte servono anche queste figure che vanno controcorrente. Poi quando capiscono l’importanza che hanno, allora possono dare il meglio di loro stessi". In passato poteva andare al Milan? "Ai tempi di Paolo Maldini c’è stato forte interesse di portarmi al Milan e lavorare con lui. Ma per vari motivi non è stato possibile e ho continuato alla Lazio, eravamo nel punto più alto del progetto. E siamo stati i pretendenti per vincere lo Scudetto, prima del Covid". La Lazio di oggi? "Facile salire ora sul carro. Ricordo le prime interviste di Baroni, dove diceva che bisognava prepararsi per partire a mille sin da subito. Questa Lazio ha tanta qualità fisica, tanta esplosività, ha giocatori che fanno le due fasi in modo perfetto. Si vede che l’allenatore ha un’idea di gioco. Credo che sia la squadra che faccia più divertire di tutta la Serie A. Si è creata armonia tra gruppo e staff, e la gente si sta innamorando piano piano. Spero che duri a lungo, perché Baroni è una persona per bene". La crescita di Simone Inzaghi con l'Inter? "L’Inter è uno di quei 10 club al mondo che se alleni hai toccato il massimo della carriera, ma Inzaghi ha...

title: “De una estupidez humana impactante”: Julia Vial relató delicado episodio cuando filtraron su información personal
creator: Martín Toro
content: Por los viejos tiempos, la animadora Julia Vial se reunió junto a su excompañero de La Red, Eduardo de la Iglesia , en el programa de entrevistas de Vía X, “ Todo va a estar bien ”. El comunicado la recibió en su casa con un tierno abrazo y una complicidad única. PUBLICIDAD Una de las primeras preguntas que él le hizo fue qué es lo peor que han inventado de ella que le ha dado risa o rabia. “ A mí me da un poco lo mismo lo que la gente diga , y con el paso de los años me pongo cada vez más ni ahí”, partió aclarando. Sin embargo, la animadora de “Sígueme” recordó un evento que sí la molestó, pero no tiene que ver con una opinión que se emitió sobre ella, sino que una violación a su privacidad . “Lo único que me dio rabia, hace poco, es que un personaje X la emprendió contra mí por algo que pasó en el programa ”, reveló. “Yo ni siquiera hablé (en la tele), pero le dio un tinte político y, perdón la expresión, pero una pelotuda puso la dirección de mi casa en Instagram. Era tan chora ella que puso la dirección de mi casa, pero cuando la llamé yo y la llamó un abogado de parte mía para que bajara eso, se le hizo así y no fue ni siquiera capaz de contestar ”, relató la animadora. “Llegué hasta el teléfono de ella” Por esto, Julia rayó la cancha y dijo que “una cosa puede ser la televisión, una cosa pueden ser los medios, pero yo vivo con dos niños y eso me parece que trasciende todos los niveles de ética, de razonamiento, de inteligencia,...

title: Scarface Opens Up About The Frightening Situation That Almost Killed Him This Summer
creator: Noah A. McGee
content: Too many , so it’s refreshing to see that the legend Scarface survived what could’ve been a fatal situation. Scarface — real name Brad Jordan — shared on Tuesday that, over the summer, he was checked into a hospital after suffering an aortic aneurysm, which are bulges that occur in the aorta and can be fatal. In a post on Instagram, which featured a photo with his surgeon, Dr. Andrea Quarti, the Geto Boys MC wrote, “This is the man, one of the most sought after surgeons in the world, when I was told, ‘this Dr. is hard to get’ he’s one of the best if not THE BEST. When I woke up to have a scheduled aortic aneurysm and leaky valve repaired something crazy happened, when he got me cut open, my aneurysm had torn the entire circumference of my aorta ( certain death ).” “But nope, no surprise to him, I woke 24hrs+ later and I asked him, why me doc, out of all the people you could’ve worked on? He looked up to the heavens and he did this [finger pointing up emoji] wow, and again I say I’m grateful....,” he added. In on Monday, Face wrote, “6wks ago I underwent open heart surgery, to be upright and smiling today shows you that God aint nothing to play with... and again I say, I’m grateful, it could’ve went either way, yet I’m still alive...” This isn’t Scarface’s only recent health scare: He , Christopher Jordan, in 2021 following a COVID-19-triggered organ failure. Although it’s been nearly a decade since the Houston MC released a studio album, he’s continued to stay active,...

title: اعلام العدو: سماع دوي انفجار في منطقة الكرميئيل في الجليل
颶風米爾頓逼近美國佛州西海岸 數百萬人接獲疏散令
content: 颶風米爾頓逼近美國佛羅里達州西海岸,國家颶風中心預計,佛州中部和西南部,部分地區將出現危及生命的風暴潮、破壞性的大風和洪水。 中心說,雖然米爾頓稍為減弱為4 級颶風,體積仍在擴大,仍然是「極度危險的颶風」。米爾頓最大持續風速超過每小時200公里。預計在當地午夜左右在坦帕灣登陸。沿著400多公里海岸線的數百萬人收到疏散命令。國家氣象局說,佛羅里達南州出現至少五個龍捲風。 州長德桑蒂斯呼籲處於危險區的民眾尋找安全的避難所。總統拜登和副總統賀錦麗在白宮簡報會上敦促居民遵從當地官員的建議。拜登形容這是生死攸關的問題。 聯邦緊急事務管理局局長表示,將前往佛羅里達州,並在風暴過後留在當地協助協調復原工作。 聯邦緊急事務管理局已把數百萬公升的水、數百萬份餐點及其他物資和人員運入該地區。

title: Statul a câștigat procesul cu frații Micula. Milionarii au de înapoiat 395 milioane de euro
content: Suma a fost achitată în decembrie 2019, de guvernul condus de Ludovic Orban, după ce oamenii de afaceri au blocat conturile Romatsa, Nuclearelectrica şi Conpet pentru punerea în executare a sentinței inițiale. „În memorandumul pe care l-am aprobat, clar după efectuarea plății, care este obligatorie, indispensabilă, reprezentanții Ministerului Finanțelor, casele de avocatură și reprezentanții din direcțiile juridice imediat întreprind toate demersurile în toate litigiile pe care le avem pentru a comunica faptul că noi am plătit suma de bani pe care o aveam de plătit în conformitate cu titlul executoriu. Un fel de poprire pe conturile Romatsa, adică nu i s-a permis Eurocontrolului să achite contravaloarea serviciilor prestate de Romatsa, serviciilor aeriene prestate de Romatsa și banii au fost ținuți blocați și Romatsa în momentul de față nu are bani. ”, spunea Ludovic Orban în 2019. Ciolacu vrea să își liniștească alegătorii: Nu va fi nicio creştere de cotă de TVA anul viitor La acel moment oamenii de afaceri au avut câştig de cauză la Tribunalul UE care a anulase o decizie a Comisiei Europene din 2015. Aceasta stabilise că România nu era obligată să pună în aplicare decizia Tribunalului Arbitral de la Washington din 2013 privind acordarea de către România de despăgubiri către oamenii de afaceri. Mai exact, în 2013, fraţii Micula câștigaseră la Washington despăgubiri de 84,5 de milioane de euro pe motiv că...

title: Ινδία: Απεβίωσε ο πρώην πρόεδρος του ομίλου Tata, Ράταν Τάτα, σε ηλικία 86 ετών
creator: info@newsbomb.gr (Newsroom)
content: Ο Ράταν Τάτα, ο πρώην πρόεδρος του Tata Group , ο οποίος έφερε στο διεθνές προσκήνιο τον ινδικό όμιλο του, τον οποίο επέκτεινε με μια σειρά εξαγορών υψηλού προφίλ, πέθανε σε ηλικία 86 ετών. Ο Τάτα, που υπήρξε πρόεδρος του ομίλου επί περισσότερα από 20 χρόνια, νοσηλευόταν στην εντατική σε νοσοκομείο του Μουμπάι, ανέφεραν δύο πηγές που γνώριζαν την κατάσταση της υγείας του. Αφού σπούδασε αρχιτεκτονική στο Πανεπιστήμιο Κορνέλ, ο Ράταν Τάτα επέστρεψε στην Ινδία και το 1962 άρχισε να εργάζεται για τον όμιλο που είχε ιδρύσει ο προπάππος του σχεδόν έναν αιώνα νωρίτερα. Εργάστηκε σε πολλές εταιρείες Tata, όπως τις Telco (σήμερα Tata Motors Ltd) και Tata Steel Ltd, αφήνοντας το στίγμα του αφού εξάλειψε τις ζημιές και αύξησε το μερίδιο αγοράς στη National Radio & Electronics Company. Το 1991 πήρε τα ηνία του ομίλου μετά την αποχώρηση του θείου του, του Τζ.Ρ.Ντ. Τάτα. Ήταν ακριβώς η στιγμή που η Ινδία ξεκινούσε ριζοσπαστικές μεταρρυθμίσεις που άνοιξαν την οικονομία της στον κόσμο και οδήγησαν σε μια εποχή υψηλής ανάπτυξης. Στα πρώτα του βήματα, ο Ράταν Τάτα επιχείρησε να ελέγξει ορισμένους επικεφαλής των εταιρειών του ομίλου, επιβάλλοντας υποχρεωτική ηλικία συνταξιοδότησης και προωθώντας νεότερα στελέχη σε ανώτερες θέσεις. Το 1996 ίδρυσε την εταιρεία τηλεπικοινωνιών Tata Teleservices. Αλλά για να αναπτυχθεί σωστά, ο όμιλος αποφάσισε ότι έπρεπε να στραφεί πέρα από...

title: Ecrans : A quel âge les enfants ont-ils leurs propres smartphones, tablettes et consoles ?
creator: L.G. (20 Minutes)
content: Une étude de l’ Observatoire de la parentalité et de l’éducation numérique , réalisée par Ipsos en février 2024 montre que plus de la moitié des enfants de 7 à 17 ans possèdent un smartphone , avec un âge moyen d’acquisition de 11 ans pour ce dernier, et 9 ans pour une tablette . Quant aux consoles de jeux, 56 % des 7-10 ans en possèdent une. Près de 70 % des enfants âgés de 7 à 17 ans se connectent quotidiennement à Internet . Cette utilisation précoce des outils numériques conduit les jeunes à passer en moyenne quatre heures par jour sur Internet, particulièrement pendant les vacances et les week-ends, avec une forte appétence pour les réseaux sociaux comme YouTube , TikTok , Instagram et Snapchat . Ce temps passé devant les écrans n’a de cesse d’augmenter quand les enfants grandissent. Une préoccupation pour les parents Le temps que les enfants passent devant les écrans reste une source de préoccupation pour les parents français, bien que certains signes d’amélioration se dessinent. En effet, l’étude révèle que 53 % des parents se sentent dépassés par l’usage numérique de leurs enfants, notamment en raison de l’usage accru des smartphones. Cependant, 71 % d’entre eux estiment que la situation s’améliore par rapport à 2021. Les effets de cette exposition prolongée aux écrans ne sont pas sans conséquence : troubles du sommeil, exposition à des contenus inappropriés, cyberharcèlement ou encore approches par des inconnus en ligne...

title: The Role of Collagen Supplements in Skin, Hair, and Joint Health
content: Collagen supplements have made quite a name for themselves in recent times, praised as the secret to healthy skin, lustrous hair, and flexible joints. But what’s really going on beneath the surface? Is collagen the ultimate multitasker for your body, or is it just another passing trend? This post dives into the science behind collagen and how it supports key areas of health, especially when it comes to skin, hair, and joints. We’ll also explore why your body needs it and whether collagen supplements live up to the hype. To understand collagen supplements, you first need to understand what collagen actually is. Simply put, it is a type of protein that acts a bit like scaffolding for your body. It provides structure to your skin, hair, nails, and joints, making it essential for maintaining strength and elasticity. Your body naturally produces collagen, but as you age, production slows down. This decrease can lead to visible signs of aging, like wrinkles and sagging skin, as well as joint stiffness and weakened hair. That’s where supplements come in — they’re designed to give your body a collagen boost to support these vital functions. One of the most popular reasons people turn to collagen supplements is to improve their skin. There’s solid science to back up this trend. Collagen is a major component of the dermis, the layer of skin that gives it strength and flexibility. As collagen levels decrease with age, your skin can lose its elasticity, leading to wrinkles and fine...

title: Kalev/Cramo potentsiaalset liidrit tabas järjekordne tagasilöök
creator: Jarmo Jagomägi
content: Kalev/Cramo korvpallimeeskonna mängis üles antud 11 mängijast vaid üks alla 14 minuti. Hooaja eel tiimi liidriks palgatud tagameest Arik Smithi tabas järjekordne tagasilöök. Kohtumises Le Porteli vastu pääses ameeriklane platsile juba avaveerandi hakul, aga ta piirdus vaid 2 minuti ja 28 sekundiga. Kohtumise järel ütles peatreener Heiko Rannula, et Smithi segab järjekordne tervisemure. «Minu arust on biitsepsis rebend. Ei taha veel midagi konkreetset öelda, aga tundus nii. Väga jõhker verevalum oli. Väga õnnetu. Aga ootame ära, mida arstid ütlevad,» selgitas pealik. Tõepoolest nukker, sest kogenud pallur polegi veel rahulikult toimetada saanud. Ta vigastas 31. augustil, esimeses kontrollmängus jalga ning jäi mitmeks nädalaks platsi kõrvale. Smith jooksis küll 20. ja 22. septembril Meistrite liiga kvalifikatsioonimängude väljakule, kuigi polnud veel päris valmis. Euromatšile eelnes ka kaks Eesti-Läti liiga kohtumist, aga sealgi jäi jänki panus pigem kahvatuks. «Tema puhul on ikkagi probleem jalgades. Tagumise reielihase vigastus on selline, mis ei luba peaaegu mitte midagi teha. Ta pole veel vormis,» kirjeldas Rannula teisipäeval mängija olukorda. Nüüd ähvardab Smithi aga taas vähemalt teatav mängu- ja treeningpaus. Olulise lüli puudumisele vaatamata õnnestus Kalevil euroteed edukalt alustada.

title: Kia reincarnates the iconic old school Pride as a powerful electric car restomod we love
creator: Gaurav Sood
content: The gas-powered Kia Pride was a successful subcompact hatchback from the 90s that was a rebatched Ford Festiva. For the 80 anniversary of the brand’s business in the UK, they have restored the 1996 Pride 1.3 LX into an all-electric . This one-off electrified reincarnation of the classic family car gets a stellar EV powertrain conversion courtesy of a British manufacturer. According to Kia, the electric hot hatch is one of the most powerful of its kind, and they playfully call it a “true socket rocket.” All the combustion components have been replaced with a powerful EV powertrain and the only components retained from the original are the five-speed manual transmission and drive shafts. This brings maximum drivable engagement for motorheads who care. Designer: The renewed avatar of the Pride boasts 107 bhp (80kW) and 173 lb-ft of torque, almost double the power of its older counterpart. On the inside, the electric motor, twin 10 kWh battery packs, and a charging port replace the older gas-powered engine, fuel tank and filler neck. All these core modifications lead to an acceleration of 0 to 62 mph in 8 seconds flat. Kia assures that the 20 kWh battery pack can stretch a total mileage of 120 miles on a single full charge in the Evo mode which is good enough for a city commuter like this one. In this drive configuration the engine shifts to producing 60 bhp with a maximum torque of 11 Nm. Talking of which, the Pride EV also has two other modes – Auto and Sport – the latter...

title: Gavin and Stacey star details 'tearful' finale as she shares 'dread' ahead of last episode
creator: web.help@express.co.uk (Jasmine Allday)
content: Get daily celeb exclusives and behind the scenes house tours direct to your inbox We have more newsletters Get daily celeb exclusives and behind the scenes house tours direct to your inbox We have more newsletters Alison Steadman has shared her feelings of 'dread' as Gavin and Stacey wrapped up filming. The show is set to air a final Christmas special later this year, with Ruth Jones and James Corden among others saying goodbye to their characters for the last time. While fans eagerly await the finale, the ending remains under wraps. As the filming concluded, Alison looked back on her journey with the show, revealing that she was moved to tears during the final scenes. She confessed: "We've had a great five weeks. We only finished on Monday night but we were all dreading that final scene when we finished. 90% of us were in tears. Some people braved it but it's been so fantastic. "We had a wrap party. It was very nice, it was lovely. We'll just miss not filming it anymore. It was fabulous." The actress also showered praise on James and Ruth, who play Smithy and Nessa, for their "witty" scripts. She revealed how she was instantly drawn to the role after reading the first script. "James and Ruth together, they are amazing, their scripts. So witty and funny! When I read the first scene, I was like, I've got to do this. I couldn't wait. I was going through the script and they didn't let me down!" she exclaimed. title: Davante Adams trade saga takes bizarre new twist as Raiders coach Antonio Pierce makes huge statement
content: Davante Adams trade saga takes bizarre new twist as Raiders coach Antonio Pierce makes huge statement READ MORE: Davante Adams' cryptic tweet appears to tease his new team By Leocciano Callao Published: 21:43, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 21:57, 9 October 2024 e-mail View comments The trade saga revolving around Davante Adams and the Las Vegas Raiders took a bizarre turn on Wednesday following a bold statement from coach Antonio Pierce. Snoop Dogg’s 1993 Murder Charge Reportedly Sealed
creator: Leena Nasir
content: A court reportedly granted Snoop Dogg permission to have his murder charge record from 1993 sealed. Snoop Dogg made some quiet legal moves in January and recently revealed legal documents say his past troubles were officially put to rest late in February, according to an Oct. 9 report by TMZ . The legendary artist was famously arrested following an emotionally-charged MTV Awards performance of his hit single, “Murder Was The Case,” which was penned amid the flurry of allegations that surrounded the star at the time. Snoop Dogg was a breakthrough artist on the hip hop scene when he and his bodyguard McKinley Lee were accused of shooting and killing rival gang member Philip Woldermariam in a Los Angeles park in August 1993. The murder plot gripped audiences and news outlets and the case quickly became a spectacle. Police alleged that Lee fired the deadly shots at Woldermariam from a car Snoop Dogg was behind the wheel of, and they both faced life behind bars. PARIS, FRANCE – JULY 25: Snoop Dogg attends ‘Prelude to the Olympics’ at Fondation Louis Vuitton on July 25, 2024 in Paris, France. (Photo by Kristy Sparow/Getty Images for LVMH x Vogue x NBC) Snoop Dogg and Lee were charged with murder and both pleaded not guilty. Famous attorney Johnnie Cochran defended the rapper as well as Lee during the tense trial that dominated the headlines. Both men were acquitted of murder in 1996, and Snoop Dogg’s reaction to the verdict became a defining moment in his career. He famously...

title: ''PRED ''DELIJAMA'' ĆEMO UVEK DATI MAKSIMUM!'' Kenan nakon trijumfa crveno-belih u Evroligi
content: Crveno-beli su u Beogradu savladali Baskoniju (78:71), a Ajzea Kenan je bio jedan od najboljih pojedinaca na ovom meču. Prvi utisci nakon meča? - Osećaj je dobar. Prva utakmica kod kuće, morali smo da pokažemo stav. Nikada ih ne uzimamo zdravo za gotovo - rekao je Kenan posle meča. *ADMIRAL BET VAM POKLANjA* --> BONUS KAKAV STE ŽELELI <-- BONUS SADRŽAJ Knjiga o našem asu koja je izazvala veliku pažnju nosi naziv " Novak, pariske priče ". title: “Хляб и зрелища” - римляните са го измислили, ние просто го повтаряме
content: Ако нещо в държавата не върви, дайте на народа хляб и зрелища - под този девиз минават късните векове на Римската империя чак до нейния окончателен залез. Сега, в ХХI век, светът продължава да търси зрелища, особено когато хлябът, метафорично казано, не достига. Защо социалните мрежи врят и кипят с коментари за риалитата по телевизията у нас? И за участниците в тях. Голямо взиране и голямо коментиране пада. Едни хейтят, други “лайкват”, а трети хейтят и едните, и другите. И да - това си е социален експеримент, но нали публиката търси силни емоции - ето, получава ги. Ей така си върви светът и в частност ние, българите - отиваме към нови предсрочни избори. И без да сме потомци на римляните, повтаряме девиза им “Хляб и зрелища”. Забавните формати може и да са обект на силни емоции, но пък от друга страна - нека политиците се замислят как ще привличат избиратели, защото вниманието на публиката е раздвоено. “Биг Брадър” ли да избира, или нови депутати. Повече по темата четете

title: Sześć lat i koniec. Legendarny Raul na skreślony przez Real Madryt
creator: Błażej Winter
content: Raul to bez wątpienia jedna z największych legend Madryt. Do dziś pozostaje rekordzistą pod względem liczby rozegranych dla tego klubu, a było ich a 741. Do tego może pochwalić aż 323 bramkami, trzema pucharami Ligi Mistrzów i sześcioma tytułami mistrza kraju. Mimo olbrzymich zasług Raul w 2010 r. musiał opuścić drużynę i przeniósł się do Schalke. Wśród wielu podejście działaczy Realu wzbudziło wtedy niesmak. Zdaniem "Marki" w najbliższym czasie współpraca na linii Real - Raul znów może się zakończyć. Media: Real Madryt zdecydował ws. Raula. Po sezonie straci posadę. Jest jedno "ale" Były napastnik karierę zakończył w 2015 r. Niedługo później rozpoczął pracę trenera. W 2018 r. trafił do akademii , gdzie trenował zespoły juniorskie. W końcu po roku objął drużynę rezerw RM Castilla, występującą obecnie w trzeciej lidze. W sezonie 2019/20 zdobył z nią młodzieżową . Po sześciu latach ma jednak stracić stanowisko. Jak poinformowała "Marca", Raul rozstanie się z drużyną pod koniec tego sezonu. Decyzja w tej sprawie została już podjęta w klubowych gabinetach. Na jego miejsce wskazano nawet następcę. Ma nim być inna była gwiazda Realu - Alvaro Arbeloa, który obecnie prowadzi drużynę do lat 19. Nie oznacza to jednak, że Raul całkiem opuści Real Madryt. Działacze zamierzają kontynuować z nim współpracę. Miałby jednak otrzymać inną rolę. Według "Marki" rozważane są dwie opcje. Pierwsza zakłada, że dołączy do sztabu...

title: Director from Northwest Indiana to screen film shot in Region at Gary International Black Film Festival
content: It's a homecoming for Anu Valia, who grew up in Schererville and Highland, this weekend. Her debut feature film "We Strangers" will be screened after a red carpet reception at 6 p.m. Friday in the Savannah Center at Indiana University Northwest on the opening night of the Gary International Black Film Festival. The film tells the story of Rayelle Martin, a commercial cleaning woman in Gary who cleans the homes of rich suburban families, including the therapist Dr. Neeraj Patel, and tells a lie about being able to speak to the dead, which lifts her out of being a background character in others' lives and spins out of control. It premiered earlier this year at South by Southwest, the prestigious film, music and interactive media festival in Austin, Texas. Valia, who studied filmmaking at New York University's Tisch School of the Arts, wrote and directed the film. She worked on the indie film for a decade, writing 37 drafts of the script while she worked to line up funding. Last year, she returned home in February to film it in and around Northwest Indiana, filming at businesses, bars and homes. Settings included Hunter's Inn, the oldest continuously operating tavern in Gary. Valia also shadowed domestic workers from a cleaning company on Broadway and brought the owner on as a consultant to ensure authenticity. title: Удар по Сирии: ЦАХАЛ отчиталась об уничтожении боевика Хезболлы на территории САР
content: Армия обороны Израиля сообщила, что в результате удара ее ВВС по территории Сирии был уничтожен Адхам Джахут , член группы ливанского движения "Хезболлах", базирующейся в сирийской Эль-Кунейтре. По данным израильской армии, Джахут был ликвидирован в результате воздушного удара, нанесенного в среду. Ранее газета New York Times сообщала, что целью израильского удара по Дамаску во вторник был высокопоставленный представитель "Хезболлах", который якобы занимался контрабандой оружия. Министерство обороны Сирии сообщило, что в результате удара израильской авиации по району Маззе в Дамаске погибли семеро человек, еще 11 получили ранения. Последние месяцы американские базы на территории Сирии регулярно подвергаются ракетным ударам и атакам беспилотных летательных аппаратов. В ответ на это американские военные усиливают свое присутствие в регионе и укрепляют оборонительные сооружения и системы объективного контроля. Напомним, что вооруженные силы США контролируют территории на востоке и северо-востоке Сирии, где находятся крупнейшие месторождения нефти и газа. Официальный Дамаск неоднократно называл присутствие американских военных на своей территории оккупацией и государственным пиратством с целью кражи нефти. Хезболла́ — военизированная ливанская шиитская организация и политическая партия, выступающая за создание в Ливане исламского государства по образцу Ирана.

title: Bolsas de NY fecham em alta e S&P renova máxima histórica antes de CPI e balanços
creator: admin3
content: As bolsas de Nova York fecharam em alta nesta quarta-feira, 9, enquanto investidores se preparavam para a divulgação do indicador de inflação CPI e para o início de temporada de balanços. Investidores analisavam ainda a ata da última reunião de política monetária do Federal Reserve (Fed, o banco central norte-americano). O índice Dow Jones fechou em alta de 1,03%, aos 42.512,00 pontos. O S&P 500 avançou 0,71%, encerrando em 5.792,04 pontos, renovando sua máxima de fechamento, e o Nasdaq marcou alta de 0,60%, aos 18.291,62 pontos. As bolsas de NY superaram abertura fraca e voltaram a subir nesta quarta, lideradas pelo setor financeiro. Goldman Sachs subiu 1,73% e JPMorgan avançou 1,27% conforme agentes aguardam o balanços de grandes bancos na sexta-feira. A Tesla caiu 1,41%, enquanto os investidores aguardam seu evento Robotaxi, que ocorre amanhã, e falas do presidente-executivo da empresa, Elon Musk. E Boeing cedeu 3,41% depois que as negociações com trabalhadores sindicalizados foram paralisadas. Jonathan Krinsky, da BTIG, acredita que ainda há uma chance razoável de o S&P 500 sofrer um “outubro vermelho”, mas observa que também é difícil encontrar convicção: o índice ainda está sendo negociado confortavelmente acima dos níveis de suporte. Tom Essaye, do Sevens Report, também vê indicadores técnicos negativos. O Índice de Força Relativa (RSI, na sigla em inglês), um indicador de momentum usado para identificar condições de sobrecompra ou...

title: $5M anonymous gift kickstarts revolving loan fund for affordable Missoula housing
content: Two nonprofits, the Missoula Economic Partnership and NeighborWorks Montana, announced on Wednesday morning that they're aiming to raise $10 million for a revolving loan fund to build urgently needed workforce housing in Missoula. At the MEP's annual investor meeting on Wednesday, the organizations broke the news that they've already raised $5 million through an anonymous "philanthropic donation." Also, First Security Bank has committed an investment of $3 million, which will initially be used as part of the financing for the Ravara project, which will bring 89 income-restricted homes to the Northside along with many other market-rate housing units. "We are excited to work with the expert team at NeighborWorks Montana to support those tackling one of the most pressing issues facing our community, the lack of affordable housing for our workforce," said Grant Kier, president and CEO of the MEP. “While the longtime Missoula family that made this historic gift wishes to remain anonymous, they care deeply about our community and the need to make sure that a typical Missoulian can build an economically secure future here. They know that starts with housing.” Anyone wishing to donate to the fund can contact NeighborWorks at 406-604-4540. "This housing fund represents a collaborative effort to create sustainable housing solutions that benefit our entire community," said Kaia Peterson, executive director of NeighborWorks Montana. "With the support of local partners and generous...

title: 지역별 전기요금제 내년 도입...소비자 반발 등 과제 산적
creator: 이승주 기자
content: [세종=뉴시스]이승주 기자 = 내년 6월부터 지역에 따라 전기요금이 차등 부과되는 가운데 요금 산정을 위한 기술시스템의 필요성이 제기된다. 지역에 따라 요금을 더 내야 하는 소비자를 설득해야 하는 과제도 남아있다. 가격 정보의 객관성을 높이기 위한 전기위원회 역할을 강화해야 한다는 목소리도 높다. 국회입법조사처는 지난 8일 발간한 '송전망 투자 재원 마련을 위한 지역별 전기요금 제도' 보고서에서 이같이 밝혔다. 앞서 정부는 전력수요가 일정 지역에 쏠리는 현상을 해소하고, 송전망 투자 재원을 마련하기 위해 '지산지소(地産地消)'형 전력시스템을 추진했다. 지역에서 생산한 에너지는 그 지역에서 소비하자는 취지다. 이에 국회는 지난해 6월 '분산에너지 활성화 특별법(분산에너지법)'을 제정하고, 지난 6월 이를 시행했다. 분산에너지법에 따르면 지역별 전기요금이 내년 6월부터 시행된다. 지역별 전기요금제는 행정구역이 아닌 변전소 위치에 따라 전기요금을 달리 정하는 제도다. 이는 송전망 혼잡 비용을 발생시킨 소비자가 더 많은 요금을 지급하게 유도해, 전력시장의 비효율을 개선하는 것을 목표로 한다. 그렇게 거둔 요금으로 송전사업자는 송전망 건설에 투자하는 방식으로 선순환 구조를 이루겠다는 취지다. 하지만 전력산업 구조 개편이 이뤄지지 않은 상황에서 지역별 전기요금제를 도입하다 보면 자칫 부작용이 나올 수 있다는 지적도 나온다. 아직 기술적인 시스템이 갖춰지지 않은 데다, 요금을 더 내야 하는 소비자...

title: How ‘Terrifier 3’ Is Defending Its Final Girl: ‘Judge My Misogyny on That Character,’ Says Damien Leone
creator: Alison Foreman
content: Art the Clown may be the black-and-white bottom line behind the financial success of Damien Leone ’s “Terrifier” movies, but Sienna Shaw is his favorite character. “I think she’s one of the most multidimensional, powerful, and empowering final girls that we’ve seen ,” the filmmaker told IndieWire. “And a lot of that is because of what Lauren LaVera brings to the role — the humanity she brings to it, the strength she brings to it.” ( Read IndieWire’s review of “Terrifier 3.” ) A traumatized 20-something fighting a killer clown for the second time , Sienna was inspired by several women in Leone’s life. The “ Terrifier 3 ” writer/director was raised by a single mom and older sisters, who stoked his passion for special effects makeup . That childhood obsession is what made the “Terrifier” franchise into a runaway success and is partly why Leone says he can only laugh when denying claims that his movies are sexist. “I don’t think it’s a funny matter, but it’s so not me that I do find it kind of hilarious,” said Leone. “It’s also a trope that I grew up loving. The Final Girl is such a powerful element to these movies, and I don’t think it’s as impactful if it’s a Final Man. Men are just more reprehensible in general, and you’re already used to seeing them die [in other genres].” With his second sequel (also Christmas-themed), Leone ramps up Art’s already-notorious appetite for ultraviolence, putting Sienna through her most hellish encounter yet. It’s a gender-inclusive affair, but...

title: A qué hora juega Ecuador vs. Paraguay por Fecha 9 de las Eliminatorias 2026
creator: Jairo  Rúa
content: jairo.rua@comercio.com.pe La Tri, bajo la dirección técnica de Sebastián Beccacece , llega con la moral en alto tras su reciente victoria ante Perú. Ahora, los ecuatorianos se miden ante Paraguay por la fecha 9 de las Eliminatorias Sudamericanas al Mundial 2026, este jueves 10 de octubre a partir de las 16:00 horas de Quito . En esta nota te explico los horarios en diferentes partes del mundo como México, Estados Unidos y otras regiones de Latinoamérica, que se jugará en el Estadio Rodrigo Paz Delgado de Quito. El partido se disputará desde las 18:00 (ARG, URU). 17:00 (CHI) y 16:00 (COL, PER, ECU). En el resto de los países, lo podrás seguir en los siguientes horarios: El partido Ecuador vs. Paraguay se podrá ver desde los Estados Unidos a partir de las 9:00 p.m. (ET), en lo que será un partido clave para ambas selecciones. Considerando que el país norteamericano cuenta con varios husos horarios, te comparto el tiempo por cada región.
