Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift bite back at 'unfounded speculation' they are engaged after Troy Aikman bizarrely claimed they were
content: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift break silence amid speculation they're engaged Speculation has run rampant in the aftermath of Aikman's gaffe on the broadcast READ MORE: Donna Kelce tight-lipped on Travis and Taylor's Halloween plans By Jake Fenner Published: 16:42 EDT, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 16:57 EDT, 9 October 2024 e-mail 1 View comments Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have hit back at 'unfounded speculation' that they are engaged after rumors started to pile up following a gaffe made by Monday Night Football commentator Troy Aikman. Aikman accidentally referred to Swift as Kelce's 'missus' on the air, leading to speculation that the couple are now engaged after a year of dating. But a source close to the couple spoke to TMZ and threw cold water on the claims. 'It's not true and the recent erratic and unfounded speculation on this couple is just proving that media and overzealous fans do not know what's going on with them and shouldn't make wild assumptions based on zero facts,' the source told the outlet. That source added, 'Two days ago everyone had decided they were broken up, not they're allegedly secretly engaged? It's whiplash inducing.' A source close to Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift told TMZ that the couple are not engaged That follows so-called 'unfounded speculation' that grew after Monday Night Football color commentator Troy Aikman accidentally referred to Swift as Kelce's 'missus' on the broadcast Read More Fans all say the same thing as Taylor Swift poses for...

title: Kardinali shqiptar Ernest Simoni – “martir i gjallë” i diktaturës komuniste viziton Shtetet e Bashkuara
content: Kardinali Ernest Simoni (Troshani) -- i cili vuajti burgimin, persekutimin dhe kërcënimet me vdekje për më shumë se 28 vjet gjatë regjimit sllavo-komunist në Shqipëri -- ishte i pranishëm të djelën që kaloi në kishën katolike shqiptaro-amerikane, “Zoja e Shkodrës”, në Nju Jork. Kardinali shqiptar, ndonëse në moshë të shkuar 95-vjeçare, celebroi dy meshë në kishën shqiptare dhe u prit nga qindra besismtarë që kishin ardhur për të takuar “matirin e gjallë” dhe dëshmitarin e vuajtjeve dhe persekutimeve të regjimit komunist të Enver Hoxhës. Eminenca e tij, Kardinal Simoni u prit me nderime nga famullitari i kishës “Zoja e Shkodrës”, Dom Pjetër Popaj ndërsa është përshëndetur nga shumë besimtarë që kishin ardhur për të takuar klerikun e lartë shqiptar, i cili edhe sot, sipas Papa Françeskut, është simbol i vuajtjeve të burgjeve komuniste, "vazhdon të dëshmojë dhe të punojë për Kishën, pa u shkurajuar". Pas celebrimit të dy meshëve në kishën e parë katolike shqiptare në Amerikë, për nderim të vizitorit të lartë, u shtrua një drekë nga Keshilli i kishës në Qëndrën Nënë Tereza të Kishës Zoja e Shkodrës, në Nju Jork. Kardinali Ernest Simoni shprehu kënaqësinë e tij për mundësinë e takimit me komunitetin katolik shqiptar në Nju Jork, duke bekuar më në fund, besimtarët e mbledhur aty, të cilët i uruan atij ditëlindjen me një tortë të rastit dhe me urimin -- “Zoti e bekoft Kardinalin tonë”...

title: Oregon jurors set to be shown black metal door that creep used 'to imprison two female sex slaves'
content: Oregon jurors set to be shown black metal door that creep used 'to imprison two female sex slaves' By James Cirrone For Dailymail.Com Published: 21:42, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 21:58, 9 October 2024 e-mail 1 View comments Jurors on the kidnapping trial for Negasi Zuberi will be shown a series of horrific pictures, including a black metal door prosecutors say he allegedly used to lock up two women so he could rape them. Zuberi, 30, is accused of forcefully taking two different women back to his Oregon home, one in May 2023 and one in July 2023, and sexually assaulting them for hours at a time. Zuberi was arrested on July 16, 2023, in a retail parking lot in Reno, Nevado, a little over 250 miles away from where he lived in Klamath Falls. Prosecutors allege this was the day after he kidnapped and raped a commercial sex worker from Washington. The defense doesn't dispute the fact that Zuberi had sex with the women, though they argue the encounters were consensual, according to The Oregonian . Prosecutors gave a much different story during their opening statements on Tuesday, saying Zuberi used 'power, control and sexual domination' to carry out a criminal plan he allegedly called 'Operation Take Over' in a note seized by police. Negasi Zuberi, pictured above, has pleaded not guilty to eight criminal charges, including kidnapping and transportation for criminal sexual activity Pictured: The black metal door prosecutor say Zuberi locked his two victims behind. title: Are Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce really engaged?
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce sparked engagement rumours earlier this week but without any substantial evidence. The reports of an engagement without any rock in sight emerged as former Dallas Cowboys quarterback Troy Aikman claimed he’s heard plenty about it. Swift, 34, was cheering on Kelce, 35, during Kansas City Chiefs’ fifth game of the NFL session when an episode of the Pardon My Take p odcast aired with the bombshell claims. In the podcast, Aikman was heard saying he had been told the A-list couple "might" be heading to the altar, People reported. “Someone actually reached out to me today and said they might actually be engaged,” Aikman said on the show. His claims also superceded his earlier slip of tongue just a day prior as he mistakenly referred to Swift as Kelce's "missus" during the Monday Night Football broadcast on October 7. However, the claim of the high-profile engagement has been shot down by a confirmation from People . Kelce and the Chiefs are now on their bye week, and the tight end has revealed that he has plans for the break but refused to reveal them on his podcast New Heights with Jason and Travis Kelce . His brother Jason asked if he is "going to tell anybody" about “the plans,” to which Travis replied, "No, but if any of it comes out I'm sure we'll talk about it on the show."

title: Szczesny: "Il fumo? Voglio essere giudicato come portiere, non per storie che non interessano"
content: Nel corso dell'intervista concessa al Mundo Deportivo , il portiere del Barcellona Wojciech Szczesny ha parlato del vizio del fumo: "Cosa posso dire a riguardo? Assolutamente niente - ha analizzato l'ex estremo difensore della Juventus - sono cose che non cambio nella mia vita personale e non sono affari di nessuno se fumo. Non incide, penso che non influenzi e quello che faccio sul campo di calcio è lavorare il doppio. E non lo faccio davanti ai bambini per non avere una cattiva influenza su di loro. A volte qualcuno mi scatta una foto nascosta dietro gli alberi, dove non riesco a vederli. Non dipende da me. Cerco di nasconderlo e di non mostrarlo alla gente. Ma se qualcuno pensa che cambierò il modo in cui sono nella mia vita personale, può ricredersi perché sono quello che sono. Sono stato così per tutta la vita e queste cose non sono affari di nessuno. Voglio essere giudicato come portiere e - ha concluso Szczesny - non per cercare storie in cui non interessa davvero a nessuno".

title: В клубе КХЛ высмеяли претензии Ротенберга к лиге
creator: Алексей Гусев
content: Игроки челябинского «Трактора» высмеяли претензии главного тренера петербургского СКА Романа Ротенберга к Континентальной хоккейной лиге (КХЛ). Соответствующее видео опубликовано на канале клуба в YouTube . В ролике показана раздевалка команды после домашней победы в регулярном чемпионате над «Адмиралом». Форвард челябинцев Александр Кадейкин подошел к манекену, расстегнул на нем кофту, под которой была футболка с надписью: «Почему никто нас не поздравляет с пятой победой подряд? Дискриминация». Ротенберг раскритиковал КХЛ 7 октября. Специалист возмутился, что лига не поздравила его с двухсотым проведенным матчем. «Трактор» провел встречу с «Адмиралом» ранее 9 октября. Поединок завершился со счетом 2:0 в пользу клуба из Челябинска , который выиграл пятый матч подряд.

title: Camp Fort Blackmore hosts Oct. 12 fundraiser, music
creator: FROM STAFF REPORTS
content: FORT BLACKMORE – With a sunny fall day and the first signs of fall colors on tap for Saturday, Camp Fort Blackmore wants to see you Saturday for an afternoon of food, music and support for the camp’s restoration. The BB&B – Barbecue, Blood Drive and Bluegrass – will be on Saturday, Oct. 12 from 1-6:30 p.m.at the camp, at 434 Methodist Camp Ln. in Fort Blackmore. Visitors can enjoy free hot dogs, barbecues, desert and drinks, said Pastor Ricky Begley, while listening to the music of Carson Peters and Iron Mountain, The Virginia Boys and Oscar Harris. BB&B does ask for a love offering to help support ongoing and future renovation work at the camp Restoration of the the United Methodist Church and Appalachian District-affiliated summer camp has made progress in the past two years, according to Begley. The camp’s swimming pool has been made operational and winterized, and water and electrical service to the poolhouses have been overhauled. The camp kitchen has new appliances. While swimming season is over, Begley said the facility will be ready to open in the summer. Guests will be able to see a future concept for a new camp lodge and dormitory to replace the original lodge that was destroyed about 15 years ago. Oscar Harris will perform from 1-2 p.m., followed by The Virginia Boys from 2:30 – 3:30 p.m. and Carson Peters from 4:30 – 6:30 p.m. Attendees should bring their own camp chairs, Begley added. Information: Facebook - www.facebook.com/ftblackmorecamp

title: Dok su milijuni bježali s Floride, influencerica se pakirala za - Disney World
content: DOK MILIJUNI ljudi bježe s Floride zbog dolaska jedne od najjačih tropskih oluja u posljednjih stotinu godina, uragana Miltona, influencerica i majka Cecily Bauchmann pakirala se za odlazak u Walt Disney World, tematski park smješten na Floridi. Cecily je pokazala kako se ona i njezin suprug pakiraju za planirano putovanje u Disneyland na Floridi sat vremena prije nego što su trebali krenuti u zračnu luku. Nakon što je izazvala burne reakcije, izbrisala je snimku, no tiktokeri su je uspjeli sačuvati i počeli dijeliti na platformi. "Nema šanse da je ovo stvarno" "Nema veze sa stvarnosti", "Ova gospođa se sprema za odlazak u Disney, a zna da je uragan kategorije 5 na putu. Svjetla su upaljena, ali nema nikog kod kuće", "Nema šanse da je ovo stvarno", neki su od komentara. Podsjetimo, zbog dolaska oluje kategorije 5 milijuni ljudi pobjegli su s Floride, a stanovnici koji su ondje ostali primaju upozorenja da ne napuštaju svoje domove osim ako situacija postane opasna po život. Zbog priprema za uragan Milton, koji bi trebao stići do Floride večeras, Walt Disney World najavio je zatvaranje svojih atrakcija i prometnih veza te su objavili da će park najvjerojatnije biti zatvoren sutra.

title: Ważne zmiany w strukturach PiS. Padają znane nazwiska
content: Jarosław Kaczyński chce, by na kongresie PiS 12 września Mariusz Błaszczak został wybrany na nową funkcję – przewodniczącego Komitetu Wykonawczego. We wtorek prezes Prawa i Sprawiedliwości spotkał się z szefami zarządów okręgowych oraz grupą młodych parlamentarzystów, którzy będą członkami nowego organu partyjnego. Nowy Komitet Wykonawczy PiS Jak poinformowała w środę Wirtualna Polska, Komitet Wykonawczy PiS tworzyć będą posłowie najbardziej aktywni w mediach. Wśród nich: Rafał Bochenek, Radosław Fogiel, Marcin Przydacz, Piotr Müller, Paweł Jabłoński, Andrzej Śliwka, Zbigniew Bogucki, Paweł Szefernaker, Krzysztof Szczucki, Adam Andruszkiewicz, Michał Moskal, Anna Gembicka, Olga Semeniuk-Patkowska, Janusz Cieszyński, Janusz Kowalski, Przemysław Czarnek, Kacper Płażyński, Łukasz Schreiber oraz Bartosz Kownacki. Komitet Wykonawczy zostanie podzielony na podzespoły zajmujące się konkretną tematyką: polityką międzynarodową, praworządnością, finansami itd. Jarosław Kaczyński przekazał swoim parlamentarzystom, że dołączenie Suwerennej Polski do PiS jest przesądzone. Wiceprezesem partii zostanie Patryk Jaki. title: 'The Drake featuring Drake': Does the rapper's appearance on the cover of a fly-fishing magazine signal a career pivot?
creator: asahebzada@thestar.ca (Asma Sahebzada)
content: Whether you love him or not, can be attributed to through his music and passion for the city. But, after a recent social media post, it appears that the global star might be dabbling in a new profession. The Drake we know can rap and make music, and even act a little — but apparently he can also fly-fish. The Drake Magazine, a quarterly fly-fishing American magazine publication curated for ‘fly fishing enthusiasts,’ posted a photo on their Instagram account on Wednesday of their fall issue, which features Canadian rapper Drake on the cover. “For those who fish,” reads the front cover of the magazine in which Drake poses in an orange spotted jacket and beige cargo joggers — both from his brand NOCTA’s new fall collection, fans say — while he stands knee-deep in water with a fishing rod in hand. The artist has yet to post the cover on his social media accounts or say anything about his apparent new-found love for fishing, but reaction online to the cover shoot is already polarized. Fans and non-fans alike both took to social media to express their opinion on the magazine cover with a fishing-gear clad Drake. Here’s what they’re saying: “Drake said no to The Super Bowl and yes to a fishing magazine,” said a user on X, referring to allegations that Drake turned down an opportunity to perform at the 2025 Superbowl Halftime Show in which rapper Kendrick Lamar is set as the headliner. title: ایران - ازبکستان: چالش تمرکز برای نبرد صدرنشینی
content: به گزارش ، تیم‌های ملی فوتبال ازبکستان و ایران در چارچوب دیداری از گروه A مرحله سوم انتخابی جام جهانی در منطقه آسیا از ساعت 17:30 امروز (پنجشنبه 19 مهر) به مصاف هم می‌روند. ورزشگاه بنیادکار تاشکند میزبان مسابقه 2 تیم 6 امتیازی گروه A خواهد بود و میزبان به واسطه گل زده بیشتر صدرنشین است. در چنین شرایطی دوئل تیم، نبرد صدرنشینی است. بازیکنان تیم ملی بعد از فرود در کشور ازبکستان، متوجه خبر لغو میزبانی کشور در بازی ایران - قطر و انتقال آن به کشور ثالث شدند. این مسئله بخشی از تمرکز آنها را به خود اختصاص داده است. قلعه‌نویی روی مهارت زوج سردار آزمون- مهدی طارمی برای گلزنی حساب ویژه‌ای باز کرده؛ ولی سرمربی تیم ملی تاکید دارد شاگردانش باید از موقعیت‌های گلزنی خود بهتر بهره بگیرند. در کنار مسائل جاری، علیرضا بیرانوند و سیدحسین حسینی 2 دروازه‌بان ملی‌پوش ایران در آستانه این مسابقه به واسطه اظهارنظرهای‌شان، چالش‌هایی با سرخابی‌ها داشتند. بنابراین مشکل حفظ تمرکز برای کادر فنی از نان شب واجب‌تر است. تیم ملی کشورمان در حالی گام به این مسابقه می‌گذارد که 2 دیدار قبلی برابر امارات و قزاقستان را با نتیجه یک بر صفر پشت سر گذاشته است. ازبکستان در سال‌های اخیر سرمایه‌گذاری و عملکرد خوبی در سطح فوتبال پایه داشته به همین دلیل آنها برای پست‌های مختلف چند گزینه در دسترس دارند. اگر چه به صورت تاریخی سبک بازی ازبک‌ها فیزیکی و درگیرانه‌ بوده؛ اما در سال‌های اخیر برخی بازیکنان تکنیکی همچون ارونوف هم در ترکیب آنها دیده شده که قابلیت کار فردی دارند. ازبکستانی‌ها به واسطه تعدد بازی‌ها و حضور لژیونرهایشان در فوتبال ایران، شناخت مناسبی از فوتبال ایران دارند. سرچکو کاتانتس به دلیل بیماری در این...

title: Nearly 3 Million Americans Have Voted So Far: Here’s What We Know
creator: Jack Phillips
content: Nearly 3 million Americans have cast early ballots either in person or by mail with under four weeks to go before the November election, an election tracking site shows. Over 54.4 percent of people who returned early ballots were female, and 44.6 percent were male, the site found. Another 1.1 percent were marked “unknown,” according to the site. The start of in-person voting in the closely contested state is also drawing the presidential tickets, with both campaigns scheduling visits in the state this week. Wednesday’s voting overlaps with campaign stops by both vice presidential nominees, Democratic Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz and Republican Sen. JD Vance (R-Ohio), who are holding events in Tucson on Wednesday. Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic nominee, is scheduled to host a rally in Phoenix on Thursday, while former President Donald Trump will hold an event on Sunday in Prescott Valley, located north of Phoenix. Early voting, particularly by mail, has long been popular in Arizona, where nearly 80 percent voted before Election Day in 2020, according to the Secretary of State’s Office. Each of Arizona’s 15 counties is required to open at least one site for in-person voting, which runs until the Friday before the Nov. 5 general election. In Maricopa County, a dozen voting centers are scattered around the metro Phoenix area. The rule changes apply to 13 counties that saw infrastructure, voting sites, and mail delivery impacted by Helene, which made landfall in late...

title: O X está de volta após 40 dias: confira os melhores memes do retorno
content: Depois de 39 dias do bloqueio do X no Brasil , o aplicativo está finalmente funcionando no País. Após o pagamento de uma multa de R$ 28,6 milhões e a indicação de um representante legal para a rede social no País, o ministro Alexandre de Moraes suspendeu o bloqueio e autorizou a operação do aplicativo. A decisão veio na terça-feira, 8, e a Agência Nacional de Telecomunicações (Anatel) tinha 24 horas para tomar as medidas necessárias para o retorno da plataforma. Na tarde desta quarta-feira, 9, a rede social voltou a funcionar para a maioria dos usuários. A volta do X - que é berço de diversos memes - foi celebrada pelos usuários com memes. Confira os 10 melhores memes do retorno do antigo Twitter: X [Twitter] Elon Musk Alexandre de Moraes Os comentários são exclusivos para assinantes do Estadão.

title: California Bible college students claim they were confined, surveilled and made to do unpaid labor
content: By Colleen Shalby In 2018, emergency dispatchers received a strange call from a remote valley in Riverside County. The caller was a 22-year-old student who said that she had been unable to leave her rural college campus for months while she was forced to work without compensation. She said she lived there with 300 others, dispatch records show, and that barbed wire surrounded the school. The location she called from matched the address of Olivet University — a Christian Bible school set against the San Jacinto Mountains near the high desert town of Anza. Its entrance is marked by a grove of olive trees, but the more than 900-acre gated campus isn’t visible from the street; visitors must make an appointment to enter. For years, the university — which has an extension campus on the grounds of the former Golden Gate Baptist Seminary in southern Marin — has drawn students from around the world, mostly from east Asia, seeking an academic experience rooted in Christianity. The promise of a U.S. student visa and a scholarship combined to make an unbeatable opportunity. But instead of feeling the sense of freedom they hoped to encounter in America, students described an environment where they were under near-constant surveillance and stripped of their independence. In interviews and in a lawsuit filed this year against the university, its founder, former president and others, several former students and employees from Olivet University and its business described a big brother-like...

title: La problemática de Pemex y retos para el próximo sexenio
content: De los grandes desafíos para el próximo sexenio es lo relativo a lo que suceda con Pemex. Nuestra petrolera no vive sus mejores momentos y el actual gobierno ha tenido que inyectarle millonarios recursos. La problemática de Pemex es añeja pero se agravó por el cambio de política pública para favorecerla. El diagnóstico ha resultado equivocado porque los grandes yacimientos están en aguas profundas y se requiere el concurso de la ip. hacia eso se caminaba con la reforma energética de la época de epn pero en este gobierno hubo un cambio de 180 grados. Además han faltado expertos para mejorar su perfil financiero. Pemex se ha convertido en un barril sin fondo y se ve complicado que el gobierno pueda dejar de inyectarle fondos. Si bien ya comienzan a aparecer nombres de empresas particulares en la explotación de yacimientos, no son los grandes actores que puedan hacer diferencia. Tampoco es muy rentable orientar las baterías a refinar gasolina cuando esa actividad es un “commoditie” en el mundo: dos bocas costó mucho y no hará diferencia. La esperanza es que para el próximo sexenio haya un cambio de enfoque: de lo contrario Pemex se mantendrá como fuente de costo.

title: Los ministros de la Suprema que rindieron cuentas al Congreso y el único que ha caído (hasta ahora)
content: Hernán Cereceda es hasta ahora el único ministro de la Corte Suprema que sucumbió por una acusación constitucional en el Congreso, bajo la Carta Magna de 1980. Fue acusado en diciembre de 1992 y destituido en enero del año siguiente. También fueron acusados entonces los jueces Lionel Beraud y Germán Valenzuela , además del auditor general del Ejército, Fernando Torres. El libelo contra los magistrados apelaba a la causal de “notable abandono de sus deberes” y los responsabilizaba de haber traspasado “arbitraria y precipitadamente” a los tribunales militares el proceso por la detención y desaparición de Alfonso Chanfreau , “incurriendo en denegación de justicia”. Supremos acusados Los ministros de la Corte Suprema son los que más nombres suman a la lista de acusados constitucionalmente desde el retorno a la democracia en 1990. Luego de Cereceda, Beraud y Valenzuela, fueron acusados Eleodordo Ortiz, Guillermo Navas y Hernán Álvarez, en 1996. Ese año también fue acusado Enrique Zurita y el mismo magistrado enfrentó otro proceso en 1997. El 97 Servando Jordán también enfrentó acusaciones en el Congreso en dos oportunidades, una como presidente de la Corte Suprema. Los jueces Marcos Aburto y Osvaldo Faúndez, fueron acusados también ese año. Ya en el nuevo milenio, figuran las acusaciones contra Luis Correa Bulo el 2000, Héctor Carreño el 2014 y el 2018 Hugo Dolmestch , Carlos Künsemüller y Manuel Valderrama. Milei logra victoria política tras respaldo...

title: Mad Sisters: book about schizophrenia released ahead of World Mental Health Awareness Day
creator: Farihanaqvimohamed
content: Thursday is World Mental Health Awareness Day and author Susan Grundy recently published “Mad Sisters.” The story explores the devastating shifts in the family struck by mental illness; the tragedy of an adolescent girl with so much promise; discouraged parents who eventually start a new life elsewhere; and the jarring comparison between a free-spirited little sister and the burdened caregiver she becomes. “Mad Sisters” candidly and with brave honesty describes a caregiver torn between fury at her sister’s resentful and jealous moods as a result of having schizophrenia, and being flooded with a sympathy and guilt of ‘why her and not me.’ Grundy shares an excerpt from her book: “Sorry I’m a bit late. She checked her watch. I’ve been here 73 minutes. “I lean forward. Why do you always insist on arriving so early? “The empty coffee mug jumped from the weight of her fist landing on the table. “Some of us are perpetually punctual. Some of us are perpetually late.” Grundy shares: “My sister was diagnosed with schizophrenia at 13 and honestly I don’t think of her as having schizophrenia. “I’m not even sure if it’s now. “They call it a mood disorder. “There’s a movement going on now, a worldwide global movement calling for a paradigm shift in psychiatric care. “I’m very excited about it and they are not too fond of diagnostic terms.” Grundy shares another excerpt from the book: “Nancy early isn’t being punctual. “She’s thumped a second time, attracting the attention of three white...

title: Huancayo: Decomisan medicamentos vencidos de centro odontológico
creator: Redacción Diario Correo
content: Mediante un trabajo de fiscalización, la Municipalidad Distrital de Chilca, en la provincia de Huancayo, sancionó al centro odontológico “Dental Medic” por tener productos vencidos. Los propietarios fueron notificados y sancionados conforme a las leyes penales y normativas municipales vigentes. MIRA ESTO: Carlos Álvarez llamó la atención al alcalde de Huancayo por el mal estado de la plaza Constitución En dicho establecimiento encontraron gran cantidad de medicamentos entre analgésicos y productos dentales con fecha de vencimiento caducados, los cuales fueron decomisados. El centro tampoco contaba con el Certificado de Inspección Técnica de Seguridad (ITSE). TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Huancayo: capturan a dos con autopartes y cinco placas adulteradas Benigno Pampa Chaccalla, Subgerente de Comercialización de la Municipalidad Distrital de Chilca, destacó la importancia de estas visitas inopinadas, señalando que contribuyen a la formalización de los comercios locales. En el operativo participó el Ministerio Público, Policía Nacional, la Dirección Regional de Salud Junín, y miembros de la municipalidad distrital.

title: Hundreds of Australians spot 'giant fireball' shooting from the sky
content: BREAKING NEWS Hundreds of Australians spot 'giant fireball' shooting from the sky By Antoinette Milienos For Daily Mail Australia Published: 21:29, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 22:10, 9 October 2024 e-mail View comments Hundreds of Australians spotted a 'giant fireball' shooting across the sky on Thursday morning, as a meteor travelled across the country. The meteor's bright flash sparked numerous calls to 2GB's Ben Fordham , as listeners reported the sighting and sought answers about what it could be. Brad Tucker, a space expert from the Australian National University, confirmed that the sighting was likely a meteor. 'It sounds like a meteor based on what everyone is saying, due to the fast nature of it – meteors move across the sky in seconds, if that,' he told Fordham. 'A couple of people noticed the green tinge, and that's the biggest clue because these meteors, which are basically broken-off asteroids, burn a greenish-blue color due to the iron-nickel in them.' He said asteroids travel at speeds between 50,000 and 100,000 km per hour, and this one would likely have been visible across Australia. Hundreds of Australians spotted a 'giant fireball' shooting across the sky Space expert from the Australian National University Brad Tucker confirmed that the sighting was likely a meteor 'It clearly covered a lot of distance in a short amount of time, so definitely a broken chunk of an asteroid that randomly hit the earth's atmosphere,' he explained. Aussies from across the...

title: 'ரத்தன் டாடாவின் மறைவு வேதனையளிக்கிறது' - முதல்-அமைச்சர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் இரங்கல்
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: சென்னை, பிரபல இந்திய தொழில் அதிபரும், டாடா சன்ஸ் குழுமத்தின் முன்னாள் தலைவருமான ரத்தன் டாடா, உடல்நலக்குறைவால் மும்பையில் உள்ள தனியார் மருத்துவமனையில் தீவிர சிகிச்சைப்பிரிவில் அனுமதிக்கப்பட்ட நிலையில் சிகிச்சை பலனின்றி உயிரிழந்தார். அவருக்கு வயது 86. அவரது மறைவுக்கு பல்வேறு அரசியல் தலைவர்கள் இரங்கல் தெரிவித்து வருகின்றனர். அந்த வகையில் தமிழக முதல்-அமைச்சர் மு.க.ஸ்டாலின் 'எக்ஸ்' தளத்தில் வெளியிட்டுள்ள இரங்கல் செய்தியில் கூறியிருப்பதாவது;- "ரத்தன் டாடாவின் மறைவு வேதனையளிக்கிறது. அவர் இந்திய தொழில்துறையின் உண்மையான பலமாகவும், பணிவு மற்றும் இரக்கத்தின் கலங்கரை விளக்கமாகவும் திகழ்ந்தார். அவரது தொலைநோக்கு தலைமை டாடா குழுமத்தை வடிவமைத்தது மட்டுமல்லாமல், வணிக நெறிமுறைகளுக்கான உலகளாவிய அளவுகோலையும் அமைத்தது. தேசத்தைக் கட்டியெழுப்புதல், கண்டுபிடிப்புகள் மற்றும் தொண்டு ஆகியவற்றில் அவரது இடைவிடாத அர்ப்பணிப்பு லட்சக்கணக்கான மக்களின் வாழ்க்கையில் அழியாத முத்திரையை பதித்துள்ளது. இந்தியா ஒரு பிரம்மாண்டத்தை இழந்துவிட்டது. ஆனால் ரத்தன் டாடா விட்டுச்சென்ற மரபுகள் எதிர்வரும் தலைமுறைகளுக்கு ஊக்கமளிக்கும். இந்த தருணத்தில் அவரது குடும்பத்தினருக்கும், சக ஊழியர்களுக்கும், ஒட்டுமொத்த டாடா குழுமத்திற்கும் எனது ஆழ்ந்த இரங்கலை தெரிவித்துக் கொள்கிறேன்." இவ்வாறு அவர் பதிவிட்டுள்ளார். Deeply saddened by the passing away of Thiru. #RatanTata , a true titan of Indian industry and a beacon of humility and compassion. title: A tax-smart plan for RRIF reform that helps the vast majority of retirees
content: Overblown problems in retirement include the Old Age Security clawback and the mandatory RRIF withdrawal rules. OAS benefits are clawed back at a rate of 15 cents for every $1 in taxable income greater than $90,997 for 2024. If your income is at that level or higher, it’s appropriate for the government to start reclaiming some of your benefits. It would not be surprising to see a more aggressive clawback some time in the future to contain the growing cost of OAS. As for registered retirement income fund withdrawals, they are sometimes presented as an unwarranted intrusion in the life of seniors trying to conserve their savings. Registered retirement savings plans must be converted into RRIFs by the end of the year you turn 71, and withdrawals at a prescribed rate must begin the next year. The current RRIF rules are livable, but they could better reflect the financial reality of today’s retirees. A blueprint for making this happen is contained in an article in the Canadian Tax Journal by Amin Mawani, a professor of taxation at York University’s Schulich School of Business. The paper suggests exempting people with RRIFs worth up to $200,000 from mandatory annual withdrawals, a threshold that covers roughly nine of 10 RRIF holders. These people typically withdraw at least the minimum each year because they need money for living costs. Eliminating mandatory withdrawals would give them flexibility in how and when to access their money. While focusing on RRIF rules, Prof. Mawani’s...

title: В Ногинске потушили пожар на рынке
content: МОСКВА, 9 октября. /ТАСС/. Пожар на центральном рынке Ногинска потушен, сообщили ТАСС в пресс-службе МЧС РФ. "Пожар ликвидирован", - сказали в МЧС. Новость дополняется.

title: 以色列再爆恐襲 兇徒哈德拉市持刀斧騎車砍人 釀6傷
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 以色列繼一個多星期前,特拉維夫(Tel Aviv)爆槍擊奪走7條人命後,周三再有城市遭到恐怖襲擊。海法區城市哈德拉警方表示,一名男子持刀斧騎著電單車隨機砍路人,在四個地點共造成6人受傷,其中2人情況危殆。兇徒當場被警員擊斃。 施襲者是來自烏姆法姆的 36 歲以色列公民艾哈邁德 (Ahmed Jabarin)。哈德拉市長尼爾表示:「恐怖分子騎著電單車在不同地點之間移動,在攻擊過程中,他使用斧頭和刀作武器。」 以色列警方其後證實,在4個不同地點共有6人被砍傷,警員接報到場,與兇徒對峙,最後開槍將他擊斃。 希勒爾葉芙醫學中心(Hillel Yaffe Medical Center)表示,6名傷者中,2名傷者傷勢危殆,3名傷者傷勢嚴重,1名傷者傷勢中度。 自去年10月哈馬斯襲擊引發加沙戰爭以來,以色列一直處於高度戒備狀態,而與黎巴嫩真主黨的衝突則持續升級。今次恐襲發生在哈馬斯 10 月 7 日襲擊一周年後不久,標誌著暴力正在持續升級。 相關新聞 有片|以色列特拉維夫遭恐襲槍擊 多人倒街頭釀6死 時值伊朗導彈襲以 新任警察局長丹尼爾在現場接受採訪時暗示,以目前警力無法確保防止恐怖攻擊,「我想強調的是,正如你們所知,如今以色列警方已經不堪重負。我的心與傷者同在,但這似乎是我們在這段時期必須面對的,我們需要堅強應對」。 上週二(1日),以色列南部特拉維夫雅法地區發生槍擊案,2名巴勒斯坦男子分別持突擊步槍及利刀,先登上輕軌並向乘客開槍,然後下車攻擊路上行人,造成7人喪生、至少8人受傷,成為近年來最致命的恐襲事件之一。巴勒斯坦武裝組織哈馬斯下屬武裝派別卡桑旅其後宣布認責。

title: Kristin Chenoweth, Audra McDonald and Kelli O'Hara join livestreamed 'Broadway Rallies for Kamala'
creator: By The Associated Press
content: Stars of stage and screen — including Anne Hathaway, Kelli O’Hara, Kristin Chenoweth and Audra McDonald — are set for a campaign rally for Kamala Harris in New York City next week that will be livestreamed. “Broadway Rallies for Kamala” will be performed in front of a live, invited audience and live streamed nationally for free on Monday via BroadwayWorld at 7:30 p.m. EDT. The event will include appearances and performances by Whoopi Goldberg, Ana Gasteyer, Billy Porter, Wilson Cruz, Arielle Jacobs, Erika Henningsen, Isabelle McCalla, J. Harrison Ghee, Judy Kuhn, Lilli Cooper, Rosie Perez and Shaina Taub. Chasten Buttigieg, the spouse of Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg, will also be on hand. The evening event will be paired with a daytime virtual phone bank, “Kamala Dial-A-Thon,” with volunteers hoping to make 1 million phone calls alongside Broadway and Hollywood talent to help get out the vote. The push is part of an effort by Broadway for Harris , a volunteer coalition of industry professionals and theater enthusiasts hoping to elect Harris and vice presidential candidate Tim Walz as well as down-ballot Democratic candidates this November.

title: США ввели визовые рестрикции против бывших президента и вице-президента Эквадора
content: ВАШИНГТОН, 9 октября. /ТАСС/. Госдепартамент ввел визовые ограничения в отношении бывших президента и вице-президента Эквадора Рафаэля Корреа и Хорхе Давида Гласа Эспинеля за причастность, по мнению Вашингтона, к коррупции. Об этом говорится в письменном заявлении руководителя пресс-службы американского внешнеполитического ведомства Мэттью Миллера. По его словам, Корреа и Эспинель "включены в список лиц, не имеющих права на въезд в Соединенные Штаты, в связи с их причастностью к значительной коррупции во время работы на государственных должностях". Как добавил дипломат, они "получали взятки, в том числе в виде политических взносов, в обмен на предоставление выгодных государственных контрактов". Санкции также введены против ближайших родственников политиков.

title: Organizaciones apoyan postulación de Nurys Paulino como miembro pleno de la JCE
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO.- Diversas organizaciones académicas, representantes de la Iglesia Católica, Colegio Dominicano de Periodistas (CDP), empresarios, sindicatos y organizaciones de la sociedad civil mostraron su respaldo a la postulación de la periodista y catedrática universitaria Nurys Xiomara Paulino Pérez para formar parte del pleno de la Junta Central Electoral (JCE). La especialista en temas político-electorales, con una trayectoria de más de 30 años en el ámbito público, es considerada como la persona idónea para contribuir al fortalecimiento de las instituciones democráticas del país, detalla una nota de prensa enviada este miércoles. El padre Secilio Espinal, rector de la Pontificia Universidad Católica Madre y Maestra (Pucmm), expresó su apoyo incondicional a la postulación de Paulino a través de una carta dirigida a la Comisión Especial Evaluadora del Senado de República. «La licenciada Paulino se ha destacado por su capacidad profesional y su integridad, demostrando ser una educadora ejemplar con un profundo conocimiento y experiencia en comunicación corporativa, relaciones públicas, estrategia de comunicación política y educación electoral», resaltó el reverendo. Señaló que la docente también “ha demostrado ser una persona de alta ética profesional, siempre guiada por principios de equidad y justicia. Su experiencia y conocimientos la posicionan como un candidato ideal para contribuir al fortalecimiento y la mejora de...

title: ¿Por qué la Festividad de San Francisco de Borja es una de las más importantes de Puno?
content: 15:41 | Puno, oct. 9. Por Luis Zuta Dávila La provincia de Yunguyo es el epicentro de una de las celebraciones más emblemáticas del departamento de Puno: la Festividad de San Francisco de Borja, declarada en 2011 Patrimonio Cultural de la Nación. ¿Por qué es una de las solemnidades más importantes del altiplano peruano?, ¿Cómo se celebra y por qué es Patrimonio Cultural de la Nación? Conocida popularmente como la “ Fiesta de Tata Pancho ”, esta celebración en honor a San Francisco de Borja , el santo patrón de la provincia de Yunguyo tiene como fecha central el 10 de octubre de cada año. El nombre de " Tata Pancho " surgió de la unión de las palabras “ Tata ” que en aimara significa “ Padre ” y con la cual las comunidades de esta etnia del altiplano peruano designan a sus santos patrones, así como de “ Pancho ” que es el tratamiento familiar o de cariño con el que se llama a quienes tienen el nombre de Francisco. Lea también: [ ¿Por qué la Fiesta de San Francisco de Asís de Huamachuco es tan icónica en La Libertad? ] Origen del culto en Yunguyo Según la tradición oral, en tiempos de la Colonia, en un lugar de Puno denominado Milagro , cercano a la actual frontera con Bolivia, se apareció el santo Francisco de Borja en forma de cruz de piedra a unos humildes agricultores. La noticia de este suceso se difundió con rapidez y los habitantes decidieron trasladar la cruz hacia el pueblo, para lo cual llamaron a los jóvenes más fornidos que lograron...

title: Hubble and New Horizons offer dual perspectives on Uranus to inform exoplanet research
content: October 9, 2024 This article has been reviewed according to Science X's editorial process and policies . Editors have highlightedthe following attributes while ensuring the content's credibility: fact-checked trusted source proofread by NASA NASA's Hubble Space Telescope and New Horizons spacecraft simultaneously set their sights on Uranus recently, allowing scientists to make a direct comparison of the planet from two very different viewpoints. The results inform future plans to study like types of planets around other stars. Astronomers used Uranus as a proxy for similar planets beyond our solar system , known as exoplanets, comparing high-resolution images from Hubble to the more-distant view from New Horizons. This combined perspective will help scientists learn more about what to expect while imaging planets around other stars with future telescopes. "While we expected Uranus to appear differently in each filter of the observations, we found that Uranus was actually dimmer than predicted in the New Horizons data taken from a different viewpoint," said lead author Samantha Hasler of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology in Cambridge and New Horizons science team collaborator. Direct imaging of exoplanets is a key technique for learning about their potential habitability, and offers new clues to the origin and formation of our own solar system. Astronomers use both direct imaging and spectroscopy to collect light from the observed planet and compare its brightness at...

Калининградская лучница стала лучшей на первенстве России
content: В Краснодарском крае состоялся национальный турнир среди стрелков из блочного и классического лука. Об этом сообщили в пресс-службе правительства Калининградской области. На дистанцию вышли 470 лучников из 39 субъектов Российской Федерации. Из девушек лучшей оказалась калининградка Яна Фельдман из областной комплексной спортивной школы олимпийского резерва. Несмотря на то, что в начале она оказалась на 16-м месте, спортсменка выиграла 5 дуэлей подряд. И в финале ветер не помешал ей сравнять счет, а затем и выиграть итоговую «перестрелку» у Анастасии Кадяшкиной из Москвы. На этом летний сезон стрельбы из лука на открытых лукодромах закрыт. Теперь калининградцы готовятся к турниру «Надежды России», запланированному на ноябрь в Великих Луках. Ранее сообщалось , что калининградские борцы выиграли 11 медалей престижных соревнований.

title: Россия работает над созданием депозитарной системы БРИКС и перестраховочной компании
content: Министр финансов РФ Антон Силуанов рассказал о новых проектах, над которыми работает Россия в рамках БРИКС. Одним из них является создание депозитарной системы стран объединения, которая получила название Brics-Clear. Эта система будет основана на новых технологиях распределенного реестра и позволит создать систему учета ценных бумаг внутри сообщества БРИКС. Это будет аналогично системам, существующим в странах Запада, но с учетом специфических потребностей России и других стран-членов БРИКС. Другим направлением работы является создание перестраховочной компании. Силуанов подчеркнул, что задача минфинов и центральных банков заключается в том, чтобы создать собственную независимую систему, которая бы работала на удовлетворение потребностей экономических агентов и экономик стран-членов БРИКС. Новые страны-участницы БРИКС уже вносят свой вклад в работу объединения. Например, Египет предложил совершенствовать работу международных банков развития, Эфиопия — использовать расчетные механизмы, Иран — использовать собственные финансовые технологии в обеспечении международной торговли, а Арабские Эмираты — развивать искусственный интеллект в сфере финансов. Силуанов отметил, что каждая страна вносит свой вклад, и этот вклад дает основание говорить о том, что в сообщество БРИКС добавлен дополнительный импульс от расширения объединения. БРИКС (англ. BRICS — сокращение от B razil, R ussia, I ndia, C hina, S outh Africa) — объединение девяти государств: Бразилии, России, Индии,...

title: Кличко рассказал о давлении властей на украинские СМИ
creator: Марина Совина
content: Мэр Киева Виталий Кличко заявил, что давление властей на критикующие чиновников СМИ недопустимо. Об этом политик написал в своем Telegram -канале. Он прокомментировал заявления журналистов издания «Украинская правда» об ограничениях свободы слова. Как уточнил Кличко, подобные случаи — тревожный сигнал. Он добавил, что это негативно сказывается на имидже Украины в мире. «Давление власти на СМИ — недопустимо. Именно свобода слова, мнения, прессы — это то, что является основой демократии в обществе», — рассказал Кличко. Ранее украинские журналисты раскрыли масштабные хищения в Минобороны Украины. В плане закупок оптовая цена мяса в два раза превышала розничные цены на рынках и в супермаркетах. Цены на овощи, сообщили СМИ, отличались более чем на 20 процентов.

title: GALERIJA Uragan Milton već uništio brojne kuće na Floridi, upozorili ljude: Idite u skloništa
creator: HINA
content: Uragan Milton stigao je do obale na Floridi, prouzročivši tornada i pogodivši regiju kišom i vjetrovima nekoliko sati prije nego što se očekuje njegov dolazak na kopno blizu zaljeva Tampa, gdje bi mogao izazvati porast razine mora smrtonosan za ljude na obali Michael Tylenda, koji bio u posjetu svom sinu u gradu Tampi, rekao je da se pridržava savjeta dužnosnika o evakuaciji. "Ako itko zna nešto o Floridi (to je da) ako se ne evakuiraš kada ti je to naređeno, možeš umrijeti. Kuća se može zamijeniti. Stvari se mogu zamijeniti. Jednostavno je bolje otići iz grada", kazao je Tylenda. | Foto: Ricardo Arduengo

title: Vulinova moćna poruka obišla svet: Srbija je faktor stabilnosti na Balkanu, učiniće sve da sačuva mir!
content: On je u intervjuu za ruski časopis Nacionalna odbrana tokom nedavne posete Rusiji, istakao da odnosi dve zemlje nikad nisu dostigli tako visok nivo kao što su danas, čemu su najviše doprineli lični i prijateljski odnosi predsednika Aleksandra Vučića i Vladimira Putina. Prema njegovim rečima, između Srbije i Rusije nema nijednog problematičnog pitanja ili različitih pogleda na situaciju u svetu. Ocenio je i da je saradnja ruskih i srpskih službi bezbednosti odlična, kao i da se tom saradnjom štite srpski nacionalni interesi. - Srbija je mala zemlja, ali nije toliko mala da bi se odrekla sebe i svog prava da bira prijatelje - rekao je Vulin. title: Samsun'da köpeğe çarpan otomobil şarampole devrildi
content: Ceyda Sinem Sarı idaresindeki otomobil, Kavak'tan Samsun yönüne ilerlediği sırada Gürgendağı mevkisinde önüne çıkan köpeğe çarptıktan sonra şarampole devrildi. İhbar üzerine kaza yerine sağlık, itfaiye ve jandırma ekipleri sevk edildi. Kazada yaralanan sürücü olay yerine gelen sağlık ekipleriyle Samsun Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi'de tedavi altına alındı.

title: SC exporta 23,1% mais carne de frango e tem o melhor desempenho em 5 anos
creator: admin3
content: São Paulo, 9 – A exportação de carne de frango in natura e industrializada de Santa Catarina em setembro alcançou 105,6 mil toneladas, avanço de 25,3% em relação a agosto e de 23,1% em comparação com setembro de 2023, informou, em nota, o Centro de Socioeconomia e Planejamento Agrícola (Epagri/Cepa) de Santa Catarina. Esse volume é o maior desempenho mensal desde maio de 2019. No total, Santa Catarina exportou 173,6 mil toneladas de carnes em setembro, que compreende frangos, suínos, perus, patos e marrecos e bovinos, entre outras, o que representou aumento de 13,8% na comparação aos embarques do mês anterior e de 17% em relação do registrado em igual mês de 2023. Em receita, o Estado faturou US$ 386,7 milhões em setembro, avanço de 16,9% em relação a agosto e de 26,4% na comparação com setembro de 2023. Os dados são da Secretaria de Comércio Exterior (Secex), do Ministério do Desenvolvimento, Indústria, Comércio e Serviços (MDIC). Ainda conforme o relatório, Santa Catarina foi responsável por 23,4% da receita gerada pelas exportações brasileiras de carne de frango de janeiro a setembro de 2024. Em relação à carne suína, o Estado exportou 61,4 mil toneladas em setembro, entre proteína in natura, industrializada e miúdos, queda de 0,7% ante agosto e alta de 10,1% ante setembro/2023. A receita no mês passado alcançou US$ 150,4 milhões, alta de 0,1% ante agosto e de 18% ante setembro/2023. Segundo o analista da Epagri/Cepa, Alexandre...

title: Lawyer for killer Kentucky sheriff reveals the real reason why he shot judge dead
content: BREAKING NEWS Lawyer for killer Kentucky sheriff reveals the real reason why he shot judge dead By Rachel Bowman For Dailymail.Com Published: 16:40 EDT, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 16:59 EDT, 9 October 2024 e-mail 21 View comments The small-town Kentucky sheriff who allegedly gunned down a judge inside his chambers was acting 'in the heat of passion,' his defense attorney claimed. Sheriff Shawn 'Mickey' Stines, 43, is accused of pumping eight bullets into his friend Judge Kevin Mullins, 54, after entering the judge's chambers at Lechter County Courthouse on September 19. He pleaded not guilty to the murder - which has stunned the small town of Whitesburg - and resigned as sheriff. Video shows Stines pointing his weapon at Mullins as his hands are raised cowering behind his desk - but the sheriff's lawyers insist the killing was not planned. 'It was not something that was planned and occurred in the heat of passion. For us, the highest level of culpability should be manslaughter based on the partial defense of extreme emotional disturbance,' defense attorney Jeremy Bartley told PEOPLE . Sheriff Shawn 'Mickey' Stines (pictured), 43, is accused of pumping eight bullets into his close friend judge inside his chambers Stines lawyers claim the sheriff was acting 'in the heat of passion' and the killing was not planned 'We believe there had to be a compelling reason for Sheriff Stines to feel like he had to take action. We are looking forward to obtaining additional information and...

title: Σοκ με τον θάνατο του Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ - Ποιος ήταν ο Ελληνοάγγλος άσος του Παναθηναϊκού
creator: info@newsbomb.gr (Newsroom)
content: Σοκ έχει προκαλέσει στο ελληνικό ποδόσφαιρο και όχι μόνο η είδηση του θανάτου του Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ . Ο διεθνής μπακ του Παναθηναϊκού βρέθηκε νεκρός το βράδυ της Τετάρτης (9/10) στην πισίνα του σπιτιού του, με τις πρώτες πληροφορίες να αναφέρουν πως η σύζυγός του τον αναζητούσε για πολλές ώρες και δεν τον έβρισκε, με αποτέλεσμα να κληθεί η αστυνομία. Ο Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ γεννήθηκε στο Μπάκινγκχαμ της Αγγλίας και ξεκίνησε να παίζει ποδόσφαιρο στις ακαδημίες της Μίλτον Κέινς Ντονς μαζί με τον μεγαλύτερο αδερφό του, Σαμ. Είχε ελληνικές ρίζες από την γιαγιά του (τη μητέρα του πατέρα του) , η οποία ήταν Ελληνίδα και πήρε την υπηκοότητα, κάνοντας ντεμπούτο με την εθνική ομάδα στις 2 Ιουνίου του 2022 (κατέγραψε συνολικά 12 συμμετοχές). Ο ίδιος είχε πει σε συνέντευξή του πως θυμόταν τον μπαμπά του στο Euro του 2004 να πανηγυρίζει έξαλλα την τότε ιστορική επιτυχία της Εθνικής ομάδας. «Ο πατέρας μου χοροπηδούσε στην κουζίνα για το Euro του 2004 και ήταν η χρονιά που έβαλε την Εθνική ομάδα στον χάρτη». Όταν βρέθηκε για πρώτη φορά στην Εθνική Ελλάδας είχε δηλώσει περήφανος: «Μου συμπεριφέρονται ευγενικά και είμαι ενθουσιασμένος που είμαι εδώ ύστερα από τόση αναμονή και τόσο καιρό. Είναι μεγάλη τιμή για μένα και την οικογένειά μου η παρουσία μου στην Εθνική. Όσοι ξέρουν γνωρίζουν πόσο δύσκολο ήταν με τη γραφειοκρατία, τον Covid-19 και το Brexit», τόνισε και πρόσθεσε: « Η...

title: CNN Contributor Mocks Kamala Harris for Being 'Outsmarted' as Biden Puts 'Handcuffs on Her'
creator: Samuel Short
content: Vice President Kamala Harris’s recent media tour has been so bad, even CNN is taking notice. In a clip from Tuesday night posted to contributor Scott Jennings’ account on social media platform X, Jennings spoke about Harris, framing her relationship with the outgoing administration as President putting “handcuffs on her.” He elaborated, saying, “He [Biden] has gone out and said last week ... ‘She helped me pass every law, she was part of every decision.’ He’s making it difficult for her to get any separation.” Biden said as much in September during an interview with “The View,” where he told the hosts she’s been involved, “on everything from to domestic policy.” Kamala Harris says she wouldn’t change a thing that Biden has done, and Biden says she’s been integral to all of it. A “new way forward?” Hardly. Last night’s discussion of Harris somehow getting outsmarted (!!!) on The View on — Scott Jennings (@ScottJenningsKY) Jennings also brought up Harris’s own appearance on “The View” from earlier Tuesday, mockingly asking, “Who goes on ‘The View’ and gets outsmarted, by the way?” was not great for Harris, despite how much of a layup it was for her. If any TV show is going to be sympathetic toward a Democrat candidate for president running against former President , it’s “The View.” Harris made headlines for that appearance after host Sunny Hostin gave her a chance to define her platform and identity beyond Biden, asking whether she would have done anything differently while...
