Suspicious target intercepted over Eilat
Inde : le magnat Ratan Tata, créateur d’un immense conglomérat industriel, est décédé à 86 ans
creator: la rédaction et AFP
content: Economie © AFP L’entrepreneur indien Ratan Tata, qui a transformé le groupe qui porte son nom en un conglomérat de taille mondiale , est décédé à l’âge de 86 ans, a annoncé mercredi ce dernier. " C’est avec beaucoup de regrets que nous disons adieu à M. Ratan Navel Tata, un patron vraiment hors du commun ", a écrit le groupe Tata sur X. Deux sources informées avaient déclaré plus tôt dans la journée que Ratan Tata recevait des soins intensifs dans un hôpital de Bombay. A la tête de Tata pendant plus de 20 ans, il a "façonné" l e groupe "mais aussi le tissu même de notre nation" , est-il écrit dans le communiqué. Via le réseau social X, le Premier ministre indien Narendra Modi a décrit Ratan Tata comme un "visionnaire, une âme compatissante et un être humain extraordinaire" . Narendra Modi lui a rendu hommage pour avoir fourni "un leadership stable à l’une des compagnies les plus anciennes et les plus prestigieuses de l’Inde" , devenue sous sa direction une entreprise internationale tentaculaire allant des logiciels aux voitures de sport. Né en 1937 à Bombay, Ratan Tata voulait devenir architecte et travaillait aux Etats-Unis lorsque sa grand-mère, qui l’a élevé, lui a demandé de rentrer au pays pour rejoindre l’entreprise familiale, fondée en 1868. Il a fait ses premières armes dans un atelier de Tisco (aujourd’hui Tata Steel), près des hauts fourneaux, logeant dans un foyer d’apprentis. Il a pris la tête de l’empire familial en 1991,...

title: What the 5 stages of grief are, and how to get through them
creator: CNN
content: When someone you love dies , the world as you’ve known it is totally upended . One way people cope , psychologist Sherry Cormier said, is by trying to find some sort of certainty. This need for structure is probably one factor behind the popularity that latched onto the “five stages of grief” over 50 years ago and hasn’t yet let up, said David Kessler, who founded grief.com , a resource aiming to help people deal with uncharted territory related to grief. Kessler coauthored “ On Grief and Grieving ” with the late Dr. Elisabeth Kübler-Ross. A Swiss American psychiatrist and pioneer of studies on dying people, Kübler-Ross wrote “ On Death and Dying ,” the 1969 book in which she proposed the patient-focused, death-adjustment pattern, the “ Five Stages of Grief .” Those stages are denial, anger , bargaining, depression and acceptance. “In the actual book, she talked about more than five stages,” Kessler said. “Think about the context of 1969 — doctors and hospital personnel were not talking about the end-of-life process. ... Elisabeth really hoped ‘On Death and Dying’ would start the conversation.” Since then, there has been extensive media coverage of the five stages; use in television shows including “ Grey’s Anatomy ” and “ House ”; clinician support; and criticism. Those five stages are what people clung to, Kessler said. Grief and psychology experts and academics have criticized the framework for not being thoroughly supported by research, suggesting that the bereaved...

title: Dépression Kirk : intervention des pompiers en cours après une inondation dans les locaux de l'Assemblée nationale
content: Une intervention des pompiers de Paris est en cours, mercredi 9 octobre à 22 heures, rue de l'Université, après une inondation dans les locaux de l'Assemblée nationale à Paris, a appris franceinfo auprès des pompiers de la capitale. à lire aussi DIRECT. Dépression Kirk : plus de 64 000 foyers sont privés d'électricité, principalement dans le Sud, selon Enedis Selon les pompiers de Paris, alors que de fortes pluies tombaient sur la capitale mercredi soir en raison de la dépression Kirk, une canalisation située au premier sous-sol de l'Assemblée nationale, là où se situent des salles d'audience et des bureaux de députés, a explosé. C'est un bouchon de cette canalisation qui a explosé, ajoutent les pompiers. Le deuxième sous-sol est lui aussi inondé. Les pompiers de Paris ont pu identifier la canalisation en question et la fuite est sur le point d'être réparée. Sur des vidéos partagées par des députés sur les réseaux sociaux, notamment par le député de la Somme François Ruffin, on voit des trombes d'eau tomber du plafond, ainsi qu'une salle d'audience totalement inondée. Après le gouvernement, c'est l'Assemblée qui prend l'eau ! pic.twitter.com/ecySwZCByZ — François Ruffin (@Francois_Ruffin) October 9, 2024

title: Snimke iz svemira otkrivaju jezivu snagu uragana. Lovci na oluje uletjeli ravno u njegovo oko
content: Međunarodna svemirska postaja objavila je najnovije fotografije uragana Milton u Zaljevu Meksiko, kraj obale poluotoka Jukatan. Prizori iz svemira su zastrašujući i zadivljujući u isto vrijeme. Iz svemira se jasno vidi formirano oko uragana, koji već sada nazivaju uraganom stoljeća. Duž više stotina kilometara obale Floride naređena je obavezna evakuacija, a riječ je o milijunima ljudi. Tijekom cijelog dana stižu vrlo ozbiljna upozorenja o opasnostima, stanovnike su čak otvoreno upozorili da bi mogli umrijeti ako se ne evakuiraju. Tijekom večeri po srednjoeuropskom vremenu, prvi krakovi uragana počeli su zahvaćati kopno. Tako je objavljen video mjesta Matlacha, koje je sablasno pusto. Jak vjetar već je srušio mnogobrojne električne stupove, palme se savijaju pod udarima jakog vjetra, a pogužvani limovi razbacani su naokolo. Gotovo nitko ne vozi ulicama, a mnogi vlasnici su jednostavno ostavili svoja vozila kraj prometnica. Na prometnim znakovima duž cesta objavljuju se obavijesti o obaveznoj evakuaciji. Na društvenoj platformi 'X' lovci na uragane objavili su video propelerca koji se probija kroz oblake prema uraganu. U objavi su napisali: "Slušajte svoje lokalne vlasti, evakuirajte se ako su vam tako rekli i pazite se nevremena."

title: Москвичи не откажутся от такси, даже если оно подорожает
content: По ее словам, из-за инфляции и высокой ставки Центробанка для таксопарков все менее доступны кредиты, лизинги, ГСМ, страховые полисы и пр. Издержки, которые несет бизнес такси, накладываются на потребителя - отсюда и подорожание. Влияет и сезонный фактор: пик роста цен придется на ноябрь - декабрь, когда жители Москвы начнут больше перемещаться по городу, с учетом своих предновогодних планов. "Стоимость услуг такси к концу 2024 года возрастет из-за увеличения трафика и движения потоков людей, - подтвердил "РГ" Роман Ломакин, начальник автоколонны таксопарка NEXT. - Другая причина - из-за санкций подскочила стоимость иномарок и комплектующих к ним, а импортозамещение у отечественных производителей не всегда на высоте. Пока цены таксопарка особо не отпугивают пассажиров. Средний чек на поездку в нем - 980 рублей. Но, как ожидается, к концу года сумма увеличится до 1100-1300 рублей". Такси уже стало неотъемлемой частью жизни москвичей, они не готовы отказаться от него, даже если поездки будут дорожать дальше. Люди привыкли, считают эксперты. Но пока рост цен не настолько велик, чтобы жители и гости столицы стали массово отказываться от машин с шашечками. Не исключено, однако, что слишком пессимистичный прогноз на стоимость услуг такси в Москве не оправдается, ведь таксисты и агрегаторы не заинтересованы даже в небольшом падении спроса. Поэтому слишком задирать ценник и не в их интересах. Учредитель ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты» Главный редактор В.А. Фронин...

title: Fer Volley i jep leksion Skenderajt
content: Fer Volley shënoi një fitore të pastër 3-0 kundër Skenderajt në ndeshjen e vlefshme për xhiron e tretë të Raiffeisen Superligës A për femra. Skuadra vendase dominoi gjatë gjithë ndeshjes, duke treguar një performancë të fortë dhe të qëndrueshme në çdo set. Seti i parë (25:18) Fer Volley e filloi ndeshjen me një ritëm të lartë, duke marrë kontrollin që në fillim. Skenderaj u përpoq të qëndronte në lojë me disa ndërhyrje të suksesshme, por vendaset e Fer Volley arritën ta përfundojnë setin me rezultat 25:18. Seti i dytë (25:20) Seti i dytë ishte më i balancuar, me Skenderajn që luftonte për të mbajtur hapin. Megjithatë, Fer Volley vazhdoi të dominonte në momente kyçe, duke treguar qetësi dhe loja e bashkërenduar i çoi vendaset në fitimin e setit me 25:20, duke e çuar rezultatin e përgjithshëm në 2-0. Seti i tretë (25:14) Në setin e tretë, Fer Volley ishte e pandalshme. Ato morën një epërsi të hershme dhe e mbajtën deri në fund, duke mos i lënë shumë hapësirë kundërshtareve të Skenderajt të rikuperojnë. Loja efikase në sulm dhe mbrojtja solide e skuadrës vendase bënë që seti të mbyllej me rezultatin bindës 25:14, duke siguruar një fitore të pastër 3-0.

title: Los Angeles receberá próximas duas finais da Liga das Nações da Concacaf
creator: AFP
content: As finais da Liga das Nações da Concacaf de 2025 e 2027 serão disputadas no SoFi Stadium, nos arredores de Los Angeles. Até agora, o torneio decidiu três edições nas cidades americanas de Denver (2021), Las Vegas (2023) e Dallas (2024), todas elas com vitória da seleção anfitriã. Em um comunicado publicado nesta quarta-feira (9), a Concacaf anunciou que o SoFi Stadium será palco das próximas finais entre 20 e 23 de março de 2025 e também da edição seguinte, prevista para março de 2027. Casa do Los Angeles Rams e do Los Angeles Chargers da NFL, o SoFi Stadium também será uma das sedes da Copa do Mundo de 2026. "Estes eventos, junto com a Copa Ouro 2025 e as competições de clubes masculinas e femininas, serão realizados em um momento crucial para o crescimento do futebol na região", destacou o presidente da Concacaf, Victor Montagliani, em nota. O SoFi Stadium, com capacidade para 70 mil espectadores, é considerado o complexo esportivo mais caro do mundo, com orçamento de cerca de US$ 5,5 bilhões (R$ 30,6 bilhões pela cotação atual) e será palco das cerimônias de abertura e encerramento dos Jogos Olímpicos de Los Angeles-2028.

title: У НХЛ уперше в історії з'явилася жінка-тренерка. Відео того, що вона робить на матчі, зібрало 8 млн переглядів за добу
content: Асистентка головного тренера "Сіетл Кракен" Джесіка Кемпбелл провела дебютний матч регулярного чемпіонату на своїй посаді, ставши першою жінкою-тренеркою у НХЛ. 32-річна Кемпбелл увійшла до тренерського штабу "Кракен" у липні 2024 року. Відео її роботи справило справжній фурор у мережі. Менш ніж за добу ролик, у якому Джесіка стоїть за хокеїстами і стежить за тим, що відбувається на льоду, переглянуло близько 8 млн людей. Дебютний матч регулярки сезону-2024/2025 "Сіетл" програв команді "Сент-Луїс Блюз" з рахунком 2:3. У коментарях хокейні вболівальники "Сіетла" неоднозначно сприйняли нову наставницю. Деякі вважають, що головне, це результати і тренер мож бути будь-якої статі. Інші припускають, що їй дискомфортно керуватиме гравцями, особливо коли після матчу вони в роздягальні без одягу. Раніше 32-річна канадка відпрацювала два сезони в АХЛ як помічник головного тренера "Коачелла Веллі Файрбердс" Дена Байлсми, який нині очолює "Сіетл". У 2022 році Кемпбелл працювала у тренерському штабі збірної Німеччини на чоловічому чемпіонаті світу з хокею. Кемпбелл починала кар'єру як гравець. У 2010 році на чемпіонаті світу з хокею серед юніорок вона принесла перемогу збірній Канаді у фіналі турніру, закинувши переможну шайбу в овертаймі у ворота збірної США, а матч завершився з рахунком 5:4 на користь кленових. Вона на тому турнірі заробила 15 очок, ставши найкращим бомбардиром серед хокеїсток і була визнана MVP турніру. Впродовж чотирьох сезонів Джесіка...

title: В НХЛ впервые в истории появилась женщина-тренер. Видео того, что она делает на матче, собрало 8 млн просмотров за сутки
content: Ассистент главного тренера "Сиэтл Кракен" Джессика Кэмпбелл провела дебютный матч регулярного чемпионата в своей должности, став первой женщиной-тренером в НХЛ. 32-летняя Кэмпбелл вошла в тренерский штаб "Кракен" в июле 2024 года. Видео ее работы произвело настоящий фурор в сети. Менее чем за сутки ролик, в котором Джессика стоит за хоккеистами и следит за происходящим на льду, посмотрело порядка 8 млн человек. Дебютный матч регулярки сезона-2024/2025 "Сиэтл" проиграл команде "Сент-Луис Блюз" со счетом 2:3. В комментариях хоккейные болельщики "Сиэтла" неоднозначно восприняли новую наставницу. Некоторые считают, что главное, это результаты и неважно какого пола тренер. Другие предполагают, что ей будет дискомфортно управлять игроками, особенно когда после матча они в раздевалке раздетые. Ранее 32-летняя канадка отработала два сезона в АХЛ в качестве помощника главного тренера "Коачелла Вэлли Файрбердс" Дэна Байлсмы, ныне возглавляющего "Сиэтл". В 2022 году Кэмпбелл работала в тренерском штабе сборной Германии на мужском чемпионате мира по хоккею. В 2010 году на чемпионате мира по хоккею среди юниорок Кэмпбелл принесла победу сборной Канаде в финале турнира, забросив победную шайбу в овертайме в ворота сборной США, а матч завершился со счетом 5:4 в пользу "кленовых". Она на том турнире заработала 15 очков, став лучшим бомбардиром среди хоккеисток и была признана MVP турнира. В течение четырех сезонов Джессика играла за "Корнелл Биг Ред", команду представляющую...

title: NIPOST unveils single postage stamp
content: By Emmanuel Elebeke As part of the activities to mark this year’s World Postal Day, the Nigerian Postal Service, NIPOST on Wednesday unveiled an Agency Banking Solution (POTMONI) -aimed at bringing accessible, convenient and affordable financial services to Nigerians nationwide and from any location across the globe. POSTMONI, is an Electronic Money Order Solution- Customized for NIPOST to connect for the greatness of the Federal Republic of Nigeria and the advancement of the Nigerian Postal Service. This is even as the agency also launched and issued a single N250 postage stamp to commemorate the 150TH anniversary of the establishment of the Universal Postal Union (UPU 150th Anniversary Commemorative Postage Stamp (1874-2024)) and Post for Planet. The stamp is in Two Hundred and Fifty Naira (N250.00K) denomination depicting the Logo of 2023 World Post Day. The Post Master General of the Federation, Tola Odeyemi, who unveiled the banking solution said, “In celebrating we are also proud to celebrate every milestone that we have been able to achieve so far.” In addition, she said the NIPOST and Small and Medium Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria (SMEDAN) recently formalized a partnership through a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) aimed at supporting Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs). The implementation of this partnership, MSMEs, she said can anticipate a 15% reduction in courier service costs, improved market access and enhanced last-mile delivery...

title: Hernández Alberto destaca Ley de reforma fiscal impulsará el desarrollo del país
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO.- El ingeniero Tomás Hernández Alberto destacó la urgencia de la Ley de Modernización Fiscal, al considerarla como una necesidad apremiante para el desarrollo del país. Hernández enfatizó que esta reforma fiscal traerá beneficios significativos para el pueblo dominicano, debido a que la ley no solo busca optimizar el sistema fiscal, sino también garantizar un futuro más sostenible y menos endeudado para la nación. “Los dominicanos pronto cosecharán los frutos de esta ley, que es clave para el progreso de nuestra economía”, afirmó. Asimismo, explicó que la implementación de la Ley de Modernización Fiscal permitirá un mayor desarrollo en diversas áreas, contribuyendo así al bienestar general de la población. “Este no es solo un cambio en la política fiscal, es una oportunidad para transformar nuestra realidad económica”, añadió. El dirigente político también mencionó que la reforma está diseñada para aumentar la recaudación de impuestos de manera equitativa, lo que permitirá al Estado financiar proyectos esenciales en educación, salud e infraestructura. “Es vital que todos los sectores de la sociedad se beneficien de este nuevo enfoque fiscal”, comentó el dirigente del Partido Revolucionario Moderno en el programa de televisión Súper 7 FM. En ese orden, Hernández Alberto hizo hincapié en la necesidad de un compromiso conjunto entre el gobierno y la ciudadanía para asegurar el éxito de esta reforma. “La...

title: Desde hace 15 días ya no han llegado familias desplazadas por la violencia a Mazatlán: Sistema DIF
creator: Ruben Lezama
content: Mazatlán, Sinaloa . Luego de las 125 familias de El Rosario y Concordia que huyeron de la violencia y arribaron a Mazatlán , desde hace 15 días el Sistema DIF Municipal no ha tenido reportes de más personas que estén buscando refugio en esta ciudad, aseguró María Teresa Apodaca Muñoz. Te podría interesar: ¡Continua el apoyo! Sebides entrega apoyos a familias movilizadas de manera preventiva a Mazatlán La presidenta de DIF Mazatlán dijo que fueron el primer contacto con estas familias que llegaron en septiembre pasado, desde las comunidades de La Rastra, El Rosario y de El Palmito, Concordia, pero que ahora es la Secretaría de Bienestar y Desarrollo Sustentable (Sebides) de Sinaloa la que les da seguimiento. “El padrón que hemos atendido, que nos han pedido apoyar, algunos han permanecido, algunos han retornado, pues el seguimiento de nuestra parte es en el momento de contacto, cuando ya tienen un padrón, el seguimiento ya se le da a través de otra dependencia, pero hasta ahorita no nos han dado... no hemos dado atención a nuevas familias”. Apodaca Muñoz mencionó que en septiembre pasado, cuando comenzaron a registrarse los enfrentamientos armados entre civiles en la zona serrana de El Rosario y de Concordia, el DIF Mazatlán atendió tres grupos de familias que llegaron a la ciudad en diferentes tiempos. Sigue toda la información del sur de Sinaloa en la sección especial de Línea Directa Destacó que los apoyos que les brindaron a su arribo fueron...

title: Μπάλντοκ: Τον έψαχνε η σύζυγός του από το πρωί στο τηλέφωνο -Ανησύχησε και ειδοποίησε τον ιδιοκτήτη του σπιτιού
content: Σοκ επικρατεί στον ελληνικό αθλητισμό μετά την είδηση του θανάτου του ποδοσφαιριστή του Παναθηναϊκού , Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ. Σύμφωνα με τις πρώτες πληροφορίες, η σορός του Μπάλντοκ βρέθηκε στην πισίνα του σπιτιού του, στη Γλυφάδα. Οι λεπτομέρειες συγκλονίζουν, καθώς η σύζυγός του, η οποία βρίσκεται στην Αγγλία με τα παιδιά, δεν μπορούσε να τον βρει στο τηλέφωνο. Αφού οι προσπάθειες επικοινωνίας αποδείχθηκαν άκαρπες, ειδοποίησε τον σπιτονοικοκύρη, ο οποίος εντόπισε τον Μπάλντοκ στον πάτο της πισίνας. Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ: Δίπλα του εντοπίστηκε ένα μπουκάλι βότκα Σύμφωνα με πληροφορίες, ο θάνατός του φέρεται να ήταν αιφνίδιος από ανακοπή. Κατά τις ίδιες πληροφορίες, δίπλα του εντοπίστηκε ένα άδειο μπουκάλι βότκα, αλλά προς το παρόν δεν είναι γνωστό ποτέ έγινε η κατανάλωσή του. Οι Αρχές ερευνούν τους χώρους για τυχόν ουσίες. Η νεκροψία-νεκροτομή και οι τοξικολογικές εξετάσεις αναμένεται να ρίξουν φως στην υπόθεση του θανάτου του διεθνούς ποδοσφαιριστή του Παναθηναϊκού.

title: Sylwia Bomba chwali się, ile schudła od wakacji. Pokazała się też BEZ MAKIJAŻU: "Chodzę tak cały dzień i nawet nie czuję się źle"
content: Sylwia Bomba wciąż kontynuuje swoją walkę z "nadprogramowymi" kilogramami, zaciekle walcząc o idealną - w jej mniemaniu - wagę. W najnowszej relacji 36-latka pochwaliła się postępami w odchudzaniu i pokazała się w wersji saute. Na osobliwy sukces złożyło się kilka czynników: wyróżniająca się na tle innych uczestników "Gogglebox. Przed telewizorem" charyzma, spektakularna utrata wagi oraz godne podziwu parcie na szkło. Do tego wszystkiego doszedł jeszcze medialny związek influencerki z Obecnie 36-latka cieszy się funkcją etatowej celebrytki, a w podtrzymaniu zainteresowania mediów swoją osobą pomagają jej kolejne wyznania dotyczące sposobów na schudnięcie oraz ich imponujące efekty prezentowane na śmiałych fotkach. Trzeba przyznać, że Bomba świetnie odnalazła się w odmienionej rzeczywistości: wprawiona celebrytka z uporem maniaka katuje się morderczymi treningami i wyrzeczeniami, aby prezentować się niczym milion dolarów. Dzięki narzuconej sobie musztrze influencerki Okazuje się, że Sylwia nie zamierza spoczywać na laurach i dalej kontynuuje swoją walkę o idealną sylwetkę. W środę mama małej Antosi zapragnęła pochwalić się przed instagramową publicznością postępami w odchudzaniu, a przy okazji pokazać też swoje oblicze w wersji saute. - widzicie dużą różnicę? Dobrze jej w takiej wersji?

title: कैंसर अस्पताल खोल मरीजों के रक्षक बने रतन टाटा:5 साल पहले पीएम मोदी के साथ आए थे काशी,बाबा विश्वनाथ का किया था दर्शन-पूजन
content: दिग्गज उद्योगपति रतन टाटा ने 86 साल की आयु में अंतिम सांस ली। उनका निधन मुंबई के अस्पताल में हुआ। भारतीय उद्योगपति और टाटा संस के चेयरमैन रतन टाटा का जन्म 1937 में मुंबई में हुआ था। रतन टाटा की काशी से भी यादें जुड़ी हुईं हैं। पांच साल पहले अपनी पहली काशी विश्वनाथ मंदिर में किया था दर्शन पूजन उस दौरान,प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी के साथ उन्होंने वाराणसी के सुंदरपुर स्थित होमी भाभा कैंसर हॉस्पिटल और मदन मोहन मालवीय कैंसर सेंटर का उद्घाटन किया था। अस्पताल के अंदर करीब एक घंटे तक उनके साथ में थे। उनके साथ मुख्यमंत्री योगी आदित्यनाथ भी थे। जानकारी के मुताबिक कार्यक्रम खत्म होने के बाद वह बाबा विश्वनाथ मंदिर में दर्शन करने गए थे। मंदिर जाने के दौरान स्थानीय लोगों ने उनका अभिवादन हर-हर महादेव के जयघोष से किया था। उन्होंने वहां कुछ लोगों से मुलाकात भी की थी। कैंसर मरीजों को मिल रहा लाभ कैंसर अस्पताल खुलने पर पूरे काशीवासियों ने काफी खुशी व्यक्त की थी। जब रतन टाटा लोगों से मिलने पहुंचे तो उनका लोगों ने अभिवादन किया था। लोगों ने इस प्रोजेक्ट को लेकर रतन टाटा की जमकर तारीफ की थी। कैंसर अस्पताल 580 करोड़ की लागत वाला 350 बेड का महामना कैंसर संस्‍थान पूर्वोत्तर भारत में अपने ढंग का इकलौता हॉस्पिटल है। 10 महीने के रेकॉर्ड समय में बनकर तैयार हुए संस्‍थान को इलाज के लिए खोलने के क्रम में इसके निर्माण में लगे 1800 श्रमिकों का सम्‍मान समारोह आयोजित किया गया था। इन्‍हें टाटा अस्‍पताल में मुफ्त उपचार के लिए ‘काशी कवच कार्ड’ भी दिया गया था।

title: В Бангкоке выступили артисты Новосибирского театра оперы и балета
content: БАНГКОК, 9 октября. /Корр. ТАСС Игорь Броварник/. Балетная труппа Новосибирского государственного академического театра оперы и балета (НОВАТ) открыла гастроли в Таиланде спектаклем "Спартак". На сцене столичного Культурного центра Таиланда артисты театра выступили в рамках ежегодного Бангкокского международного фестиваля музыки и танца, впервые показав здесь знаменитую балетную постановку Юрия Григоровича на музыку Арама Хачатуряна. Спектакль прошел в сопровождении Бангкокского королевского симфонического оркестра под руководством российского дирижера Евгения Волынского. Заглавную партию станцевал премьер Роман Полковников, которого в России считают одним из лучших Спартаков за его физические данные, технику исполнения танца и актерское мастерство. Партию антагониста Красса исполнил Михаил Лифенцев. Местная публика тепло встретила российских артистов, особо сопереживая главному герою в исполнении Полковникова. "Мне очень повезло, эта партия легла на меня. Мне удобно, легко, я сам такой, поэтому огромных трудностей не испытываю, когда ее исполняю, просто из себя все достаю. Публика очень теплая. Мне все очень понравилось. Мне кажется, мы здорово открыли гастроли", - поделился своими впечатлениями после спектакля в беседе с корреспондентом ТАСС Роман Полковников. Примы-балерины НОВАТа Анна Одинцова и Ольга Гришенкова исполнили роли Эгины и Фригии. "Такие персонажи, как Гамзатти ("Баядерка"), Одиллия ("Лебединое озеро"), Эгина - коварные женщины, которые более интересны в...

title: Flames hear doubters but enter season with confidence
creator: Michael Ranger
content: A rebuild is afoot, expectations are low, and the onus is on a handful of veterans to show youngsters the only path to success is through hard work and self-belief. Sound familiar, Flames fans? “I’ve been here before when we were underdogs and a young team,” begins Calgary Flames captain Mikael Backlund before breaking into a smile, “and that year we made the second round. So that’s my goal.” It was a full decade ago a young Backlund suited up for a Flames team pegged by many to finish at the bottom of the division and amongst the league’s worst. Despite the intrigue of a few young prospects like Sean Monahan and rookies Johnny Gaudreau and Sam Bennett, few had much faith that the 2014-15 Flames could make any noise. Well, they did, clinching third in the Pacific with a late-season win to knock the defending champion Kings out of a playoff spot, before beating the Canucks in Round 1. You can understand why Backlund has repeatedly cited the shocking success of that upstart team as a motivator when asked about being counted out this year by so many. “That year, we had a really tough road trip to start, but we went in head-first and decided that even though we played some really good teams, we wanted to make it hard on them,” said Backlund. “That’s our mindset again. “We got off to a great start, and then it just kind of kept rolling. We kept pushing each other in practice and games and we never gave up.” Proof of that came via a club record for third-period comeback wins, as...

title: Astronomers race to capture image of exoplanet near star
content: October 9, 2024 This article has been reviewed according to Science X's editorial process and policies . Editors have highlightedthe following attributes while ensuring the content's credibility: fact-checked peer-reviewed publication trusted source proofread by University of Texas at Austin Planet AF Lep b is a world of firsts. In 2023 , it was the lowest-mass planet outside our solar system to be directly observed and have its mass measured using astrometry. This is a technique that charts the subtle movements of a host star over many years to gain insights about orbiting companions, including planets. Now, AF Lep b is the lowest-mass planet with the smallest angular separation—that is, how close it is to its host star as seen from Earth—that has been directly observed by the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST). Results were published recently in The Astrophysical Journal Letters . At 23 million years old, AF Lep b is a relatively young gas giant. (For comparison, Jupiter is 4.6 billion years old.) This makes it bright, and therefore, a great candidate to observe. However, the team that wished to learn more about the planet—led by graduate students Kyle Franson at The University of Texas at Austin and William Balmer at Johns Hopkins University—had to race against the clock to capture it. That's because it's moving closer to its host star in its orbit. The closer it gets, the harder it will be to observe. "AF Lep b is right at the inner edge of being detectable. Even though...

title: Γερμανία: Τα «φάντασμα» της ύφεσης στοιχειώνει την οικονομία για δεύτερη συνεχή χρονιά
content: Η οικονομία της Γερμανίας αναμένεται κατά 0,2% το 2024, ανακοίνωσε σήμερα το υπουργείο Οικονομίας, γεγονός που είναι πιθανό να καταστήσει τη για δεύτερη συνεχή χρονιά το μοναδικό μέλος της Ομάδας των Επτά μεγάλων βιομηχανικών δημοκρατιών που θα καταγράψει συρρίκνωση της παραγωγής. Η κυβέρνηση μειώνει την πρόβλεψή της από προηγούμενη πρόβλεψη για ανάπτυξη 0,3% για φέτος, καθώς η αναμενόμενη ανάκαμψη κατά το δεύτερο εξάμηνο του έτους δεν υλοποιήθηκε, αναφέρει το Reuters. Η οικονομία της Γερμανίας ήταν ήδη η ασθενέστερη μεταξύ των μεγάλων ομολόγων της στη ζώνη του ευρώ και των άλλων χωρών της G7 πέρυσι, με μείωση του ακαθάριστου εγχώριου προϊόντος κατά 0,3%. Τα οικονομικά προβλήματα της Γερμανίας συνεχίζονται, με τη χώρα να αντιμετωπίζει πλέον το φάσμα του να κλείσει το 2024 σε ύφεση Εάν η οικονομική παραγωγή συρρικνωθεί για δεύτερο συνεχόμενο έτος, κάτι που συνέβη για τελευταία φορά το 2002-2003, όταν οι εξαγωγικές και μεταποιητικές βιομηχανίες αντιμετώπισαν δυσκολίες, η Γερμανία θα είναι η μόνη οικονομία της G7 με συρρίκνωση, σύμφωνα με τις τελευταίες προβλέψεις του Διεθνούς Νομισματικού Ταμείου. Η οικονομία συρρικνώθηκε το δεύτερο τρίμηνο, προκαλώντας φόβους για πιθανή ύφεση, η οποία ορίζεται ως δύο διαδοχικά τρίμηνα συρρίκνωσης. Οι πρώιμοι δείκτες, όπως η βιομηχανική παραγωγή και το επιχειρηματικό κλίμα, υποδηλώνουν ότι η οικονομική ύφεση συνεχίστηκε...

title: Poseta italijanske delegacije iz Milana Naučno-tehnološkom parku Novi Sad
creator: Anđelija Grujić
content: Danas je Naučno-tehnološki park Novi Sad ugostio delegaciju iz Milana, predvođenu Albertom Minom , direktorom Fondacije za inovaciju i transfer tehnologije (FITT). Delegaciju su činili i Mercedes Lućini, menadžer za međunarodnu saradnju, kao i Lućijano Katani ataše u italijanskoj ambasadi u Republici Srbiji. Ova poseta predstavlja nastavak uspešne saradnje, koja je započeta 2023. godine potpisivanjem Memoranduma o saradnji između Naučno-tehnološkog parka Novi Sad i Arexpo-a, italijanske kompanije zadužene za razvoj Milanskog inovacionog distrikta (MIND), jednog od vodećih evropskih centara za inovacije, nauku i tehnologiju, nastalog na prostoru bivšeg Expo Milano 2015. Prof. dr Srđan Kolaković, direktor Naučno-tehnološkog parka Novi Sad, izjavio je: "Danas imamo izuzetnu priliku da ugostimo delegaciju iz Lombardije, predvođenu gospodinom Albertom Minom, u Naučno-tehnološkom parku Novi Sad. Ova poseta je nastavak naše uspešne saradnje, koja je započela prošle godine potpisivanjem Memoranduma između Arexpo-a i Naučno-tehnološkog parka Novi Sad. Memorandum je postavio temelje za strateško partnerstvo u oblasti biomedicine i biotehnologije, koje sada krećemo da realizujemo. Saradnja koju razvijamo pruža našim startapovima i kompanijama priliku da se povežu sa vodećim italijanskim institucijama i firmama, kako bismo zajedno ubrzali razvoj i primenu novih tehnologija." Alberto Mina, direktor FITT-a, osvrnuo se na važnost posete i potencijalne...

title: Anatel apreende TV box de consumidor após interferência no 4G da Claro
creator: Lucas Braga
content: Uma das atribuições da Anatel é fiscalizar o uso indevido do espectro, pois a emissão de radiofrequências de forma indiscriminada pode prejudicar outros serviços sem fio. Uma inspeção trouxe uma situação inusitada: uma TV box não-homologada estava gerando interferências no 4G da Claro. O aparelho foi apreendido pela agência, segundo documentos visualizados pelo . O caso aconteceu no município de Poá (SP). Uma fiscalização efetuada pela Anatel em maio de 2024, após a Claro relatar interferências prejudiciais em uma estação rádio-base localizada em um município vizinho. Os técnicos da agência constataram a interferência utilizando um equipamento que faz a análise do espectro em tempo real. O dispositivo identificou sinais constantes na frequência de 742 MHz, que ficavam ainda mais evidentes quando aproximado de um prédio residencial. O sinal em questão gerou interferências no espectro utilizado pelo 4G da Claro. A operadora detém uma licença que compreende o intervalo de 738 a 742 MHz, e se refere à banda de subida da frequência de 700 MHz. Com autorização do zelador do prédio, os técnicos da Anatel conseguiram localizar o apartamento que gerava interferência. O proprietário permitiu o acesso da equipe, e o analisador de espectro identificou sinal ainda mais intenso quando aproximado de uma TV Box ligada. A TV Box em questão tinha o modelo MXQ Pro 4K, e equipamento não era . Ao desligar o produto, a fiscalização identificou que a...

title: Gold eases for sixth session as dollar marches upward
content: By Anushree Mukherjee (Reuters) - Gold retreated for the sixth straight day on Wednesday on an advancing dollar and diminished expectations for a larger rate cut from the Federal Reserve in November. Spot gold fell 0.5% to $2,607.93 per ounce by 02:39 p.m. ET (1839 GMT). U.S. gold futures for December delivery settled 0.4% lower at $2,626. "The markets aren't moving because the extraordinary payrolls report may require a recalibration by the FOMC. It's why gold hasn't budged and looks to be down for the sixth straight session though the pullback has been modest," said Tai Wong, a New York-based independent metals trader. "The dollar has surged over the past few sessions that's adding downward pressure to gold," he added. The dollar index hit a near two-month high, making bullion more expensive for holders of other currencies.[USD/] The minutes of the Sept. 17-18 session, at which the Fed lowered the benchmark policy rate by half a percentage point, noted the future pace of cuts will not be determined by large initial reduction. Markets now see a 76% likelihood of a 25-basis-point cut from the Fed next month, according to the CME FedWatch tool. Zero-yield bullion is a preferred investment amid lower interest rates. Dallas Fed Bank President Lorie Logan said she wants smaller reductions ahead, given the "still real" upside risks to inflation and "meaningful uncertainties" over the economic outlook. Investors now await U.S. Consumer Price Index (CPI) and Producer Price Index...

title: „Odbija sve, pa prihvati i kaže da nije statusno pitanje“: Sagovornici Danasa o Vučićevoj izjavi da je srećan što Srbi na KiM koriste kosovske lične karte
content: Odgovarajući na pitanja crnogorskih novinara, predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić izjavio je da je srećan što ljudi na Kosovu koriste kosovske lične karte i tablice, ali dodao da to nije pitanje državno-pravnog statusa Kosova. Iako kosovske isprave omogućavaju Srbima svakodnevno funkcionisanje, naši sagovornici tvrde da ova izjava oslikava politiku srpskih vlasti da najpre odbije sve, pa prihvati i tvrdi da to nije statusno pitanje. Na pitanje da li Srbija možda menja pravac u pogledu prihvatanja institucija Republike Kosovo, s obzirom da je od 2013. godine priznala kosovske lične karte, tablice i da su srpski poslanici ustajali na kosovsku himnu u parlamentu, Vučić je najpre istakao da ne postoji nešto kao što je Republika Kosovo. „Ne postoji nikakva Republika Kosovo, ni po međunarodnom javnom pravu, ni po povelji Ujedinjenih nacija, niti “, rekao je Vučić. On je dodao i da je Kosovo deo teritorije Republike Srbije, te da se takvim pitanjem podržava cepanje teritorije Srbije. „Što se tiče ličnih karti i svega drugog, pa da, ja sam srećan zbog toga. Mi smo uvek bili za slobodnu trgovinu, slobodan protok roba, kapitala, ljudi i svega drugog, ali to nema veze sa državno-pravnim statusom“, rekao je predsednik Srbije. Potpredsednik Pokreta slobodnih građana, Aris Movsesijan kaže za Danas da ljudi na Kosovu svakako treba da koriste kosovske lčne karte jer im to omogućava svakodnevno funkcionisanje. „Zbog toga ne treba biti ni srećan ni tužan, problem je...

title: India News | .NEWDELHI/MUMBAI DEL1 RATAN TATA-DEATH Veteran Industrialist Ratan Tata Dies at 86
content: New Delhi/Mumbai, Oct 9 (PTI) Ratan Naval Tata, the former Tata Group chairman who transformed a staid group into India's largest and most influential conglomerate with a string of eye-catching deals, has died. He was 86. Tata, who was chairman of the salt to software group for more than two decades, breathed his last at south Mumbai's Breach Candy Hospital at 11.30 pm on Wednesday. Also Read | Ratan Tata Dies: Chairman Emeritus of Tata Sons Passes Away at 86 in Mumbai Following Age-Related Health Conditions. A Padma Vibhushan recipient, Tata, had been in intensive care at the hospital since Monday. A top official of the Mumbai police was the first to inform of his death, followed by a confirmation by Tata Group chairman Natarajan Chandrasekaran who called Tata "a truly uncommon leader whose immeasurable contributions have shaped not only the Tata Group but also the very fabric of our nation". Also Read | Skill Impact Bond Milestone: Over 29,000 Youths Enabled Since 2021 Under NDSC With Skills Training and Jobs; 60% Women Beneficiaries (See Pics and Video). Educated at Cornell University, Ithaca, New York, the veteran industrialist worked on the shop floor at the family-run group after returning to India in 1962. He gained experience in several Tata Group firms before being named director in charge of one of them, the National Radio and Electronics Co. in 1971. He became chairman of Tata Industries a decade later and in 1991 took over as the chairman of the Tata Group from...

title: بدون مساعدة أمريكية.. هل تستهدف إسرائيل المنشآت النووية الإيرانية؟
content: استبعد مسؤولون أمريكيون وإسرائيليون أن تضرب إسرائيل المنشآت النووية الإيرانية بدون مساعدة أمريكية، وذلك في ردها المحتمل على الهجوم الصاروخي الإيراني عليها أخيرا، بحسب «نيويورك تايمز». وقالت الصحيفة إن التدريبات التي أجرتها عشرات المقاتلات الإسرائيلية فوق البحر الأبيض المتوسط قبل عامين، لمحاكاة ضربة ضد منشآت نووية إيرانية، لم تهدف فقط إلى الترهيب، بل توصيل رسالة للرئيس جو بايدن، مفادها أن القوات الإسرائيلية كانت تتدرب على تنفيذ العملية بمفردها، حتى وإن كانت فرص نجاحها ستكون أعلى بكثير إذا انضمت الولايات المتحدة للهجوم بـ«قنابلها المضادة للمخابئ المحصنة تحت الأرض» التي تزن 30 ألف رطل . وشكك مسؤولون إسرائيليون سابقون وحاليون في ما إذا كانت إسرائيل تمتلك القدرة على إلحاق ضرر كبير بالمنشآت النووية الإيرانية، إلا أن مسؤولين في «البنتاغون»، تساءلوا سراً خلال الأيام القليلة الماضية عما إذا كان الإسرائيليون يستعدون لتنفيذ الهجوم بمفردهم، بعد أن توصلوا إلى استنتاج بأنهم قد «لا يحظون بلحظة مثل هذه مرة أخرى». ورجح مسؤولون أن يركز رد إسرائيل على قواعد عسكرية إيرانية، وربما مواقع استخباراتية أو قيادية، مستبعدين، على الأقل في البداية، أن تسعى إسرائيل إلى استهداف أهم المنشآت النووية. ووفق الصحيفة، فقد بدا أنه وبعد مناقشات مطولة، فإن ضرب هذه الأهداف قد تأجل لوقت لاحق؛ إذا صعد الإيرانيون من وتيرة هجماتهم المضادة. وأطلق مسؤولون أمريكيون وعلى رأسهم بايدن، حملة لاستبعاد فكرة تنفيذ هذه الضربات، مرجحين أن تكون غير فعالة وقد تغرق المنطقة في حرب شاملة. ولفتت الصحيفة إلى أن الجدل المفاجئ بشأن توجيه ضربة عسكرية تثير تساؤلات...

title: Rochester woman to pay $80K in restitution after financially exploiting elderly man
creator: Olivia Estright
content: ROCHESTER — A Rochester woman was sentenced to pay nearly $80,000 in restitution after pleading guilty to financially exploiting an elderly man, according to a sentencing order filed on Tuesday. Colleen Marie Siverling, formerly Siverling-Keigher, 36, was charged with two counts of aiding and abetting the financial exploitation of a vulnerable adult with her now-ex-husband, Corey Jonathon Keigher, 35. The couple was charged separately, and Siverling entered a guilty plea in February. ADVERTISEMENT In exchange for her guilty plea, one count was dismissed. Siverling was sentenced to five years of supervised probation and pay $79,718 in restitution. Olmsted County District Judge Pamela King ordered her to pay a monthly minimum payment of $50. According to the criminal complaint, the pair wrote themselves checks totaling $125,025.25 from the bank account of a man over whom Siverling had a power of attorney order. The investigation into the couple began in January 2022 after the Olmsted County Sheriff's Office received a vulnerable adult maltreatment report. The couple told an investigator with OCSO that they had been working to improve the man's home after he went into a hospital in February 2019 for his fourth stroke. The man, who is in his 80s, resides in a memory care facility in Olmsted County. Siverling told the investigator that a lawyer told her to charge $25 an hour while serving as the man's power of attorney. The couple provided no invoices or proof of any home...

title: Prime Minister to press Chinese Premier on lifting Australian lobster ban
creator: 9News
content: Tweet Facebook Mail P﻿rime Minister Anthony Albanese will push China to lift the remaining trade sanctions on Australian exports when he meets the economic giant's Premier on the sidelines of the ASEAN summit. title: Two charged after illicit drugs, weapons found in car: RCMP
creator: Cole Fortner
content: Alberta RCMP has charged two people after illicit drugs and imitation firearms were found in a vehicle during a traffic stop. Mounties say around 12:47 a.m. on Oct. 5, patrol officers from Strathcona County conducted a traffic stop on a suspicious vehicle near Pembina Road. During the stop, officers noticed the occupants trying to hide a small bag. This led to both being taken into custody. While in custody, police searched the vehicle, where they found and seized several imitation firearms, prohibited weapons and a small quantity of illicit drugs As a result, 48-year-old Leigh-Anne Grace McKay of Edmonton and 61-year-old Dean Kelly Tracey of Tofield, Alta. were charged with 11 combined charges including possession of methamphetamine, unauthorized possession of a prohibited weapon, unauthorized possession in a motor vehicle, and possession of a weapon for a dangerous purpose. Both are expected to appear in court on Oct. 23 in Sherwood Park.

title: Study: DOCK8 mutation disrupts helper T cell differentiation via glycolytic pathway regulation
content: A study, published in the journal MedComm and led by Dr. Panpan Jiang and collaborators at Tongji Medical College, explores the critical role of the dedicator of cytokinesis 8 (DOCK8) gene in the differentiation of helper T cells, which are vital for the immune response. The researchers discovered that mutations in DOCK8 significantly disrupt the glycolytic pathway, a crucial metabolic process that provides the energy necessary for the activation and proliferation of CD4 + T cells. Using a combination of in vitro experiments and metabolic assays, the team demonstrated that DOCK8-deficient T cells exhibit impaired glucose uptake and decreased lactate production, indicating a shift away from optimal glycolytic metabolism. This metabolic alteration was directly correlated with reduced differentiation of helper T cells, which are essential for coordinating immune responses. "Our findings reveal that DOCK8 mutations not only affect the structural functions of immune cells but also critically impair their metabolic programming," stated Dr. Jiang. The research highlights the importance of metabolic flexibility in immune cell function and suggests that restoring glycolytic activity could enhance the immune response in individuals with DOCK8 mutations. The study also delves into the downstream effects of disrupted glycolysis on signaling pathways that influence T cell fate decisions. By analyzing gene expression profiles , the researchers identified key transcription factors that are...

title: Gobierno de Ucrania evacúa a ciudadanos mexicanos de Líbano
content: México / miércoles 9 de octubre de 2024 Gobierno de Ucrania evacúa a ciudadanos mexicanos de Líbano La Embajada de Ucrania también informó que logró evacuar a ciudadanos de cinco países más La Embajada de Ucrania en México informó que fueron evacuados ciudadanos mexicanos. | Foto: X @UKRinMEX El Sol de México Este miércoles, el Gobierno de Ucrania evacuó de Líbano a seis personas de nacionalidad mexicana para salvaguardar su integridad tras la escalada del conflicto en el país árabe, donde Israel continúa bombardeando para terminar con el grupo paramilitar Hezbolá . Mediante un comunicado, la Embajada ucraniana informó que llevó a cabo una operación humanitaria para evacuar del Líbano a ciudadanos de más de cinco países. Respecto a los connacionales, la Embajada de Ucrania señaló que son seis ciudadanos mexicanos que ya son atendidos por las autoridades correspondientes. Aunque no se informó su estado de salud o cuándo podrían regresar a México. Mundo Israel seguirá adelante con la guerra hasta recuperar a los rehenes tomados por Hamas Asimismo, compartió fotografías del rescate en el que se observa a ciudadanos de otros países, como Argentina, Moldavia, Rumania, República Checa, Colombia, Líbano, así como parte de los 28 ucranianos (19 adultos y 9 niños, junto a dos mascotas) que la embajada evacuó con éxito. title: بلایی که با جنگ غزه بر سر اقتصاد رژیم اسرائیل آمد + فیلم
creator: info@yjc.ir

title: Rang Manch: India's Premier Platform for Fashion, Handicrafts, and Culture Celebrates Vibrant Indian Creativity
creator: ABNewswire
content: Rang Manch: India's Premier Platform for Fashion, Handicrafts, and Culture Celebrates Vibrant Indian Creativity 10-09-2024 10:40 PM CET | Leisure, Entertainment, Miscellaneous Press release from: ABNewswire Rang Manch, India's premier festival, celebrates fashion, handicrafts, and cultural performances. It provides a global platform for artisans, promoting sustainability, cultural heritage, and innovation in the creative industries. Image: https://www.abnewswire.com/uploads/c2a0fb7d1daf9d96512bdfa4c582529d.png Rang Manch [ https://rangmanch.org/ ], India's most dynamic and culturally rich festival, is set to captivate audiences once again with its celebration of Indian creativity. Founded in 2021 in the historic city of Gwalior, Rang Manch is a one-of-a-kind event that showcases the vibrant diversity of Indian fashion, handicrafts, and cultural performances. Over the past three years, the event has become a sought-after stage for designers, artisans, and performers, both established and emerging, providing them with a global platform to shine. A Stage for Indian Creativity Translating to "Stage of Colors," Rang Manch represents the essence of India's creative spirit. What began as a humble gathering of fashion enthusiasts and artisans has blossomed into a premier festival that bridges traditional Indian artistry with contemporary design. By celebrating the intersection of craftsmanship, culture, and fashion, Rang Manch has created a space where creativity and heritage...

title: Severe solar storm could stress power grids even more as US deals with major back-to-back hurricanes
content: October 9, 2024 This article has been reviewed according to Science X's editorial process and policies . Editors have highlightedthe following attributes while ensuring the content's credibility: fact-checked reputable news agency proofread by Marcia Dunn A severe solar storm is headed to Earth that could stress power grids even more as the U.S. deals with major back-to-back hurricanes, space weather forecasters said Wednesday. The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration issued a severe geomagnetic storm watch for Thursday into Friday after an outburst from the sun was detected earlier this week. Such a storm could temporarily disrupt power and radio signals. NOAA has notified operators of power plants and orbiting spacecraft to take precautions. It also alerted the Federal Emergency Management Agency about possible power disruptions, as the organization copes with the devastating aftermath of Hurricane Helene and gears up for Hurricane Milton barreling across the Gulf of Mexico toward Florida. Forecasters do not expect the latest solar storm to surpass the one that slammed Earth in May, the strongest in more than two decades. But they won't know for sure until it's just 1 million miles (1.6 million kilometers) away, where spacecraft can measure it. Florida is far enough south to avoid any power disruptions from the solar surge unless it gets a lot bigger, said scientist Rob Steenburgh of NOAA's Space Weather Prediction Center. title: Матч «Аль-Насра» Роналду с «Эстеглялем» в азиатской ЛЧ перенесут из Тегерана – в Дубай, скорее всего. Саудовцы не хотели лететь в Иран
Užas iz Grčke: U bazenu se utopio suigrač Tina Jedvaja, pored su pronašli polupraznu bocu
content: Nogometaš Panathinaikosa (31) pronađen je mrtav u bazenu svoje kuće u Grčkoj. Kako pišu grčki mediji, Baldock se navodno utopio, a pored njega je pronađena poluprazna boca votke. Bio je grčki reprezentativac i suigrač u velikanu Panathinaikosu. George Baldock nogometno ime je izgradio u Engleskoj. U redovima Sheffield Uniteda igrao je čak sedam sezona i upisao 205 nastupa. U elitnom rangu engleskog nogometa skupio je 83 nastupa. Baldocka je tražila njegova supruga, koja živi u Engleskoj s njihovim djetetom, no nije ga mogla pronaći i zabrinula se. Tako je obavijestila zajedničkog prijatelja da ode u njihovu kuću, a kada je došao, pronašao ga je u bazenu. Kako Grci javljaju, na mjesto tragedije odmah je izašla policija i liječnici koji će utvrditi od čega je točno preminuo. U ljeto ove godine potpisao je za grčki klub, a državljanstvo je stekao po svojoj baki Grkinji. Za Grčku je upisao 12 nastupa.

title: “La judeofobia vive y lucha en nuestro Uruguay”: Mizrahi por monumento vandalizado
content: Montevideo Portal El director de Grupo Radar, Alain Mizrahi, criticó estemiércoles la vandalización del monumento “Abrazo de los Pueblos”, ubicado en elbarrio Reus . “Hoy una vez más siento vergüenza de mi propio país”,comenzó diciendo en un video publicado en la red social X. “Estoy en la esquina de Arenal Grande e Isla Gorriti, en elbarrio Reus, donde alguna vez vivieron muchos inmigrantes judíos que llegaron aUruguay expulsados de Europa por el hambre y las persecuciones”, prosiguió. El economista luego aludió a la obra vandalizada y dijo que“es un homenaje a esos inmigrantes”. “Encontraron en Uruguay una patria quenunca habían tenido, entre ellos mis abuelos y mi mamá, que fueron apátridashasta que Uruguay les dio una nacionalidad”, expresó. “Hoy este monumento fue profanado con pintadas antiisraelíescomo para que no queden dudas si aún las había que la judeofobia vive y luchaen nuestro Uruguay, que supo ser inclusivo”, criticó Mizrahi. Asimismo, aseguró que “esta agresión no está dirigida únicamenteal Estado de Israel”, sino que es “una agresión a toda la comunidad judíauruguaya, y por extensión, a todos los ciudadanos uruguayos de bien”. “Me da muchísima tristeza”, concluyó. Más tarde, Mizrahi publicó una foto con efectivospoliciales en el lugar. “Ya está la policía técnica trabajando allí. No todoestá perdido. Gracias a quien sacó esta foto que me reenviaron recién”, escribióen X. Ya está la policía técnica trabajando allí. No...

title: Mayaniquel inicia arbitraje internacional contra el Estado de Guatemala
creator: Luis Gonzalez
content: Mayaniquel decidió iniciar un reclamo internacional contra el Estado de Guatemala luego de no poder reanudar operaciones en Panzós, Alta Verapaz. El Estado le concedió una licencia de explotación minera que está vigente, pero las autoridades actuales han negado las licencias de exportación que permitirían retomar su actividad. La empresa agotó todas las instancias para volver a generar bienestar económico con trabajo y sus programas de apoyo social en las comunidades donde opera, pero no fue posible. Los diálogos fracasaron, así como los llamados públicos de la empresa hacia el Gobierno. No hubo respuesta. Lejos de ello, las autoridades anunciaron una ley para frenar la minería y, de hecho, aplicaron una moratoria que no deja a las empresas desarrollarse. Por qué importa . La compañía minera generaba empleo para unas 1,500 familias en el Valle del Polochic, en especial en Panzós, pero estas fuentes de trabajo se perdieron en noviembre de 2022. En ese mes, la Oficina de Control de Activos (OFAC) del Departamento del Tesoro de Estados Unidos, colocó a Mayaniquel, por un error, en un listado de empresa que presuntamente operaban cometiendo acciones al margen de la ley. Meses después el gobierno estadounidense reconoció la "imprecisión", pero el daño ya había dejado huella. Una investigación reciente de The Washington Post, menciona cómo varios exfuncionarios estadounidenses expresaron su preocupación por la “imprecisión” de las sanciones impuestas....

title: כטב"ם ששוגר לעבר אילת יורט מחוץ לשטחי ישראל
Арина Аверина: «Российский спорт остается на высшем уровне, о деградации не может идти речь»
content: Российская гимнастка Арина Аверина считает, что отстранение от международных турниров не сказалось на уровне отечественных спортсменов. «Российский спорт все равно остается на высшем уровне. У нас есть новые правила, которые ввела Ирина Александровна [Винер], а также есть правила Алины Кабаевой — наши гимнастки выступают не по правилам FIG. То есть спорт в стране развивается. Также есть клубная система соревнований, сейчас выступает очень много детей из разных клубов. Мне кажется, количество выступающих детей сейчас увеличилось в два раза, поэтому ни о какой деградации спорта не может идти речь», — цитирует Арину Аверину Sport24. На данный момент большинство российских спортсменов отстранены международными федерациями от участия в турнирах. В марте 2023 года МОК рекомендовал допускать к соревнованиям в нейтральном статусе тех россиян, которые не выражали публичную поддержку СВО, а также не связаны с военными структурами. При этом рекомендации не распространяются на командные виды спорта.

title: ФОТО. Знакомьтесь, это новая девушка Жоау Феликса и она чертовски хороша!

title: Two dead after head-on crash near Seeley Lake
content: Two women were killed in a head-on crash near Seeley Lake on Sunday evening, according to the Montana Highway Patrol. The crash occurred on Montana Highway 83, about 6 miles north of Seeley Lake. The two women were headed southbound around a curve to the left when their SUV drove off the road and traveled along the ditch for more than 300 feet, according to the MHP crash report. Their SUV then drove back onto the road and went into the northbound lane, the report states, hitting another vehicle head-on. The driver of the SUV, a 30-year-old from Washington, and the passenger, a 34-year-old from Kalispell, were both wearing their seat belts. There were no other passengers. The two occupants of the northbound vehicle were injured in the crash and transported to Providence St. Patrick's Hospital in Missoula, according to MHP. Both were Seeley Lake residents. The Missoula County Sheriff's Office didn't immediately respond Wednesday to a request for the names of the victims. There have been 152 highway fatalities in Montana in 2024, according to the Montana Department of Transportation. Get local news delivered to your inbox! Subscribe to our Daily Headlines newsletter. title: Elon Musk's 'We, Robot' event is on the horizon. Here's what you need to know
creator: William Gavin
content: Tesla ( TSLA ) CEO Elon Musk is primed to unveil his company’s efforts to produce a self-driving “robotaxi,” either delivering a massive win for investors that justifies sacrificing a widely anticipated car — or a major disappointment. Musk has been talking about developing a robotaxi network since at least April 2019 , when he spoke about a fleet of autonomous Teslas that could drive customers around whenever their owners didn’t need them. The next major update came in 2020 when the CEO said a robotaxi would be unveiled in 2023 and enter production in 2024, which didn’t happen. But on Thursday, after another set of delays , Tesla seems prepared for what Musk has called a “product launch” of the robotaxi. Whether or not it’s a successful launch akin to the 2012 unveiling of the Model X or falls flat like the infamous 2021 debut of Tesla’s Optimus robot, which showed off a person dancing in a costume , is unknown to anyone without insider knowledge. The “We, Robot” event is scheduled to start at 10:00 p.m. ET/7:00 p.m. PT on Thursday at Warner Bros. Discovery’s ( WBD ) movie studio near Los Angeles. While the studio floors will be flooded with Wall Street analysts, Tesla influencers, and investors, it will also be livestreamed on X, Musk’s social media platform. Here’s what you need to know. The product(s) The robotaxi, nicknamed the Cybercab, is expected to be Tesla’s first car that doesn’t require a driver. The Austin, Texas-based company’s electric vehicles offer some...

title: Conheça o resort do Brasil que está no Top 10 dos melhores do mundo, segundo ranking internacional
creator: Tiago Robles
content: Conceituada revista internacional divulgou recentemente o ranking do seu prêmio anual Readers’ Choice Awards, que elege os melhores resorts do mundo segundo os seus leitores. Veja o único do Brasil que está na lista. A conceituada revista internacional de viagens ‘ Condé Nast Traveler ’ divulgou recentemente a sua lista oficial dos melhores resorts do mundo em 2024 . O ranking do prêmio anual ‘ Readers’ Choice Awards ’ , que é definido a partir dos votos dos seus leitores, reúne empreendimentos hoteleiros famosos pelo mundo todo, e apenas um resort do Brasil conseguiu entrar para a lista . Confira a seguir que local é este. O resort brasileiro na lista do prêmio ‘ Readers’ Choice Awards ’ Estamos falando do Uxua Casa Hotel & Spa , localizado em Trancoso , na Bahia . O resort ficou em 6o lugar no ranking . O resort é cercado pela densa floresta tropical, com vista para o oceano Atlântico , e fica praticamente ao lado da praia . Inclusive, tem um caminho coberto que atravessa o manguezal até a praia. Chegando na areia, há grandes espreguiçadeiras para você descansar e também um bar construído a partir de um antigo barco de pesca. O resort é rodeado por jardins e plantas , e possui uma piscina central revestida com quartzo aventurina verde, um tipo de cristal considerado muito terapêutico. É uma “ coleção de casas rústicas reformadas, chalés, uma casa na árvore íntima e um spa com inspiração tribal ”, como comenta a revista em seu site. O local...

title: Valkoposkihanhet muuttavat
content: Valkoposkihanhien päämuutto on nyt käynnissä. Asiasta kertoo Pohjois-Karjalan ely-keskus, joka seuraa muuttoa yhteistyössä BirdLife Suomen kanssa. Valkoposkihanhien ensimmäinen päämuutto tapahtui torstaina ja toinen tiistaina. Myös näiden päivien välillä havaittiin kymmeniätuhansia muuttavia hanhia. Torstaina koillisesta saapui puolet Barentsinmeren noin 1,4 miljoonasta valkoposkihanhesta Itä- ja Etelä-Suomeen. Tiistaina Barentsinmereltä saapuneiden hanhien lisäksi Suomessa levähtäneitä hanhia lähti suurin joukoin kohti talvialueitaan Luoteis-Eurooppaan. Valkoposkihanhien muutto on ollut tänä syksynä varsin poikkeuksellinen myöhäisyyden ja nopeuden takia, ely-keskus kertoo. Gps-lähetinhanhien mukaan lähes koko Barentsinmeren populaatio on muuttanut Suomen kautta. Suomessa hanhet ovat siirtyneet Pohjois-Karjalan pelloilta Kaakkois-Suomen pelloille. Arviolta neljäsosa valkoposkihanhikannasta on jo jatkanut matkaa Suomesta pois.

title: Acidente gravíssimo de moto deixa dois feridos na Avenida do Contorno, em Cabo Frio
creator: renata.cristiane@rc24h.com.br (Renata Cristiane )
content: Cabo Frio - Um acidente gravíssimo de moto foi registrado na tarde desta quarta-feira (9), em Cabo Frio, no bairro Vila Nova. Segundo relatos, dois homens, ainda não identificados, estavam em alta velocidade pela Avenida do Contorno quando, em frente ao Hotel Sesc, perderam o controle da motocicleta e colidiram frontalmente contra uma palmeira. A ocorrência foi registrada por volta das 15h10 e foi atendida pelo quartel de bombeiros da cidade. Conforme informações oficiais, o acidente envolveu a colisão da motocicleta contra uma árvore. Testemunhas afirmam que a dupla estava cortando veículos no momento do acidente. As autoridades foram acionadas e a Polícia Militar prestou auxílio na ocorrência. Populares também ajudaram durante o resgate. Segundo informações, a dupla já foi encaminhada para o Hospital Central de Emergências (HCE).

title: Mystery as TikTok star Shawn J dies after sudden hospitalization
content: Mystery as TikTok star Shawn J dies after sudden hospitalization By Emma Richter For Dailymail.Com Published: 16:39 EDT, 9 October 2024 | Updated: 17:00 EDT, 9 October 2024 e-mail View comments TikTok star Shawn J died unexpectedly just days after being rushed to the hospital for a thyroid-related health scare. title: Informe de DD.HH. cuestiona progresos en derechos humanos en los dos primeros años de Petro
creator: David Echavez
content: Un nuevo informe reveló que a pesar de los esfuerzos en materia de derechos humanos durante los dos años que lleva en el poder el actual Gobierno, los resultados son insatisfactorios. El documento titulado “El camino del cambio: avances y tropiezos de la paz, los Derechos Humanos y la Democracia”, elaborado por más de 500 organizaciones sociales, destaca la centralidad de los derechos en el Plan Nacional de Desarrollo (PND), aunque su implementación sigue siendo deficiente. A pesar de una reducción en la tasa de pobreza monetaria de 6.7 puntos porcentuales entre 2021 y 2023, las organizaciones afirman que “los niveles de pobreza y desigualdad en Colombia siguen siendo altos”. Un dato destacado es que, sin las transferencias monetarias del gobierno, la pobreza hubiera sido aún más pronunciada. En el ámbito de la salud, se intentó una reforma al Sistema de Seguridad Social, pero fue archivada en el Congreso. Aún así, las acciones del Gobierno han contribuido a una disminución en la mortalidad materna. Sin embargo, el informe subraya que la violencia contra la comunidad LGBTIQ+ persiste, con un aumento en homicidios y feminicidios. Por otra parte, el estancamiento en los diálogos de paz también se menciona como un punto crítico, a pesar de la intención del Gobierno de mantener activos espacios de negociación con grupos armados, la falta de un marco jurídico claro y la resistencia política han obstaculizado avances en la política de paz total. En el ámbito...

title: Annual Hockey Inside/Out Fan Summit set for this weekend in Montreal
creator: Montreal Gazette
content: Article content The annual Hockey Inside/Out Fan Summit will be held this weekend, bringing together Canadiens fans from across North America and beyond who follow the Canadiens on The Gazette’s website. This year, the HI/O Fan Summit will include two games at the Bell Centre, with the Canadiens playing the Ottawa Senators on Saturday (7 p.m., SNE, Citytv, TVA Sports) and the Pittsburgh Penguins on Monday (7:30 p.m., Amazon Prime Video, RDS). There will be a meet-and-greet on Friday, starting around 7 p.m., at Hurley’s Irish Pub (1225 Crescent St.) , and a charity prize raffle will also be held at Hurley’s starting at 2 p.m. Saturday with money raised going to the Montreal Canadiens Children’s Foundation. Gazette sports columnist Stu Cowan will hold a question-and-answer session with fans at Hurley’s ahead of Saturday’s game and former Canadiens player and GM Réjean Houle, who is now head of the team’s alumni, is also expected to make an appearance. All Canadiens fans are invited to attend both events at Hurley’s. Ian Cobb, an 80-year-old retired businessman who grew up in Montreal and lives in Belleville, Ont., organized the first HI/O Summit in 2007. Cobb is a lifelong Canadiens fan. He didn’t let the fact he’s dyslexic — leading to illiteracy — stop him from becoming successful in business and, with help from a friend, says he learned how to read and write in the comments section of the HI/O website after it was launched in 2006. Cobb only revealed his illiteracy after...

title: TCU vê descontrole na fiscalização de CACs, mas poupa generais que ignoraram determinações
content: BRASÍLIA - O Tribunal de Contas da União (TCU) decidiu, nesta quarta-feira, 9, poupar os generais do setor responsável pela fiscalização de armas de fogo nas mãos de civis. A decisão foi tomada mesmo após auditoria do tribunal detectar descontrole no serviço e um descumprimento reiterado de determinações da própria Corte de Contas, proferidas ao longo dos últimos sete anos, para aprimoramento das vistorias. O relator do caso, ministro Marcos Bemquerer Costa, descartou a proposta de apuração de responsabilidades dos generais por entender que o tempo decorrido desde as primeiras determinações, em 2017, “dilui as responsabilidades” em virtude da “sucessão de comandos ao longo desse período”. Exército não se manifestou. A área técnica do tribunal havia sugerido a colheita de depoimentos do atual e dos últimos quatro generais do Comando Logístico do Exército para que eles explicassem o “não cumprimento integral das determinações de criar sistema informatizado para a gestão de todos os processos de trabalho relativos à fiscalização de produtos controlados pelo Exército”. title: Étude sur l’état de la Terre | « Nous sommes au bord d’une catastrophe climatique irréversible »
content: (Montréal) Un rapport publié mardi par une quinzaine d’éminents climatologues indique que 25 des 35 indicateurs utilisés pour suivre les risques climatiques de la planète, de la température des océans à la perte de la couverture forestière, atteignent des niveaux records. Les scientifiques qui ont écrit le rapport publié dans la revue ne se sont visiblement pas donné le mandat de donner de l’espoir aux gens qui souffrent d’écoanxiété. Leur constat, brutal, se résume dans les quatre premières phrases du rapport. « Nous sommes au bord d’une catastrophe climatique irréversible. Il ne fait aucun doute qu’il s’agit d’une urgence mondiale. Une grande partie du tissu même de la vie sur Terre est en péril. Nous entrons dans une nouvelle phase critique et imprévisible de la crise climatique. » « L’urgence », dans le ton et les mots utilisés par les auteurs, « m’a étonné un peu », mais « c’est justifié », a réagi le professeur de l’Université McGill Eric Galbraith après avoir lu l’article. « Lorsqu’on regarde les données, on est vraiment dans un état d’urgence et la société globale n’est pas du tout en train de réagir comme il le faut pour éviter un futur vraiment problématique », a résumé celui qui enseigne au Département des sciences atmosphériques et océaniques et au Département des sciences de la Terre et des planètes. Des indicateurs au rouge Le rapport intitulé « The 2024 state of the climate report : Perilous times on planet Earth »,...

title: L’uragano Milton fa tremare la Florida: «È la tempesta del secolo»
content: Il messaggio agli americani nelle zone più a rischio è chiaro: «Ascoltate la autorità e se dovete evacuare fatelo ora. È una questione di vita o di morte». Lo ha detto oggi il presidente degli Stati Uniti Joe Biden , ribadendo l'invito che le autorità locali ripetono da giorni. La fuga dalle aree costiere e più esposte è già iniziata fra lunghe code in autostrada e distributori di benzina a secco. Stando ai dati, sono ben 5,9 milioni le persone che dovranno obbligatoriamente lasciare le proprie case . Ma quanti effettivamente lo hanno già fatto non è chiaro. Ed è proprio ai reticenti che si è rivolto il presidente americano: « Milton è la tempesta del secolo », ha detto. »Può essere catastrofico», gli ha fatto eco Kamala Harris . Il sindaco di Tampa Jane Castor è stata ancora più esplicita: coloro che restano nelle loro case a «un piano» sono «fondamentalmente in delle bare». Il problema maggiore sono infatti le mareggiate che potrebbero raggiungere i 4,7 metri, il doppio di quelle causate da Helene due settimana fa. Nonostante l'allerta elevata, molti però temono che evacuare voglia dire non poter tornare nelle proprie abitazioni per lungo tempo. A questo si aggiunge la dilagante convinzione che tutto l'allarme in corso sia un'esagerazione. La Florida, è la loro idea, è abituata agli uragani e Milton non può essere tanto diverso dagli altri. Le autorità però non hanno dubbi: Milton non è come gli altri . L'uragano toccherà terra probabilmente come...

title: Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ: Σε πένθος η Εθνική Ελλάδας, με μαύρες φωτογραφίες στα social media
creator: Βαιος Τασουλας
content: Σοκ έχει προκαλέσει η είδηση του θανάτου του Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ και στην Εθνική Ελλάδας , με τους λογαριασμούς της στα social media να έχουν πλέον μία μαύρη φωτογραφία. Ο Τζορτζ Μπάλντοκ ήταν ενεργό στέλεχος της Εθνικής Ελλάδας, αλλά δεν κλήθηκε από τον Ιβάν Γιοβάνοβιτς για το παιχνίδι με την Αγγλία στο Nations League και ο θάνατός του έγινε γνωστός μέσα από τα ΜΜΕ στους ανθρώπους της ομάδας. Ο διεθνής μπακ έφυγε λίγες μόνο ώρες πριν την αναμέτρηση της “γαλανόλευκης” στο Γουέμπλεϊ και βύθισε στο πένθος τους συμπαίκτες του και ολόκληρη την Εθνική Ομάδα. Μαύρη φωτογραφία εξωφύλλου ανέβασε και ο Παναθηναϊκός στα social media, με τους “πράσινους” να θρηνούν έναν από τους νέους παίκτες της ομάδας, ο οποίος και είχε αρχίσει πλέον να αγωνίζεται ως βασικός στην ομάδα του Ντιέγκο Αλόνσο.

title: Michael de Adder, renowned cartoonist, let go by Postmedia-owned N.S. newspaper
creator: Rebecca Lau
content: Renowned editorial cartoonist Michael de Adder may have lost his job, but he promises he hasn’t lost his voice. The author and illustrator, who is a member of the Order of Canada and has won multiple national newspaper awards, says he was let go by The Chronicle-Herald newspaper this week after nearly 30 years with the publication. “I’ve seen this coming for a long time, but I thought I had more time. I knew newspapers are in trouble all around the world. It’s not just Halifax. So I’ve been preparing for this,” he said Wednesday, one day after getting “the call.” “They told me they no longer required my contribution, I guess you could say. And they were reducing the cartoon section to twice a week.” The paper was recently sold as part of a $1-million deal. Toronto-based media company, Postmedia Network Inc., purchased the insolvent SaltWire Network Inc. and the Halifax Herald Ltd., and about 60 SaltWire staff were laid off in August. De Adder has been one of Canada’s top political cartoonists for years, skewering celebrities and politicians with biting humour or capturing the mood of a moment. He said the industry has shrunk over time, and there is little job security. “The better you are in editorial cartooning, the more the powers that be are scared of you,” he said. “They’re scared I’m going to give my opinion.” Accolades and controversy Over the years, his cartoons have moved the nation and at other times, prompted backlash. His 2018 editorial cartoon in the wake of the...

title: UCLA QBs Garbers and Martin preparing for Minnesota
content: LOS ANGELES — The race for UCLA’s starting quarterback position is still ongoing, according to head coach DeShaun Foster. Foster did not indicate whether he was leaning toward Ethan Garbers or Justyn Martin for UCLA’s home game against Minnesota on Saturday. He declined to say when he will make a decision or what he will be evaluating in each of them. “Minnesota’s looking at everything that (reporters) post,” Foster said during media availability Wednesday. “If I wanted to give them a leg up on us so they could figure out who to get ready for, then I would (say). It’s just that I have an opponent that’s for sure looking at what (reporters) post.” Garbers’ right foot was heavily wrapped in athletic tape for Wednesday morning’s practice, 11 days after suffering an injury in a loss to Oregon . The redshirt senior has thrown an average of 202 yards per game this season with three touchdowns. He was first in line for individual drills Wednesday after not being an active participant in practice the previous week. Martin earned his first career start as a Bruin against Penn State in Garbers’ absence. The redshirt sophomore completed 22 of 30 passes for 167 yards and one touchdown with no interceptions in a 27-11 loss to the Nittany Lions . He ran the ball seven times for a gain of 21 yards but could use his legs more; Foster, who was among those praising Martin’s performance against a tough Nittany Lions defense, said Wednesday that Martin can run up to 21 miles per hour. “He’s one...

title: Sentencing handed to Holly man who recorded his years-long sexual abuse of kids, including infant
Obrero salió de su casa y desapareció en La Bolivariana
creator: edgar perez
content: La preocupación se apoderó de una familia en Santa Marta debido a la desaparición repentina de uno de sus integrantes, identificado como Larry José Illidge Ortiz, de 47 años, quien salió de su vivienda, ubicada en el barrio La Bolivariana, y desde entonces no se ha tenido noticias de él. De acuerdo con la información proporcionada por su esposa, Luz Castro, el hombre, que se dedica a trabajos de oficios varios, salió de su casa al mediodía del pasado sábado 5 de octubre hacia la esquina del barrio mencionado y se subió a un vehículo tipo taxi con placas TZU 235. Desde allí, le perdieron el rastro. “Él salió y no dijo con quién se iba a ver, ni indicó hacia dónde iba. José Illidge trabaja en oficios varios y lo que le pongan a hacer, él lo hace. Es raro que desaparezca, ya que no suele ausentarse tanto tiempo”, expresó su esposa, Luz Castro. Ante la ausencia de ‘Tayron’, sus familiares han difundido diferentes carteles en las redes sociales con información detallada, solicitando que cualquier persona que tenga información se comunique con ellos o, en su defecto, con los números 3045918151 y 3015245095. NOTICIA EN DESARROLLO...

Police asking for public's help after DNC office in Tempe shot at for third time
creator: abc15.com staff
content: TEMPE, AZ — Police are asking for the public's help finding the person(s) responsible for shooting at a DNC office in Tempe. Tempe police say early Sunday morning, the office near Priest Drive and Southern Avenue was struck by what appears to be gunfire. Fortunately, no one was in the building at the time. Do you have a concern in your community or a news tip? We want to hear from you! Connect with us: share@abc15.com Facebook | Instagram | YouTube This is the third time that the office has been shot at in the last month. The first two incidents happened in September , and at the time, police said the incidents were "being investigated as a property crime as no one was in the office at the time of the occurrence." Now, Silent Witness is offering a $1,000 reward for any information that leads to the arrest or indictment of the suspect(s) involved. The photo below shows a vehicle police believe may be involved in the shootings. Police describe the vehicle as a 2008-2013 Silver Toyota Highlander with a sunroof, roof rack, and 5-spoke rims. All three incidents happened between midnight and 1 a.m. If you have any information regarding any of the shootings, you are asked to call Silent Witness at 480-WITNESS, or 480-TESTIGO for Spanish-speaking. You can also leave anonymous tips online by clicking here . title: Can you get rid of your lawn without offending the neighbors?
content: What will the neighbors think? It didn’t take long for that question to become front of mind when Sara Weaner Cooper and her husband, Evan Cooper, bought their first home, in Blue Bell, Pennsylvania, in the spring of 2022. One question that answered itself right away: From the first pass with the mower over their 5,000 square feet of turfgrass, the couple knew that mowing a big lawn every week was not for them. But neither was the possibility of being seen as inconsiderate neighbors in their new community. How could they reinvent their front yard without making an unwelcome impression? This would be their first attempt at making a garden, but Sara Cooper was no stranger to the subject of lawn alternatives. She has vivid memories from childhood of a backyard with “all these fun nooks in which to play, get lost in and explore.” That yard was the work of her father, Larry Weaner, a landscape designer in Glenside, Pennsylvania, for more than 40 years and a leader in the ecological landscape design movement in the United States. Since 2019, Sara Cooper, 34, has been the executive director of New Directions in the American Landscape, an organization Weaner founded in 1990 to promote ecology-based landscape design and practice. There, she develops and coordinates educational programs, many for a professional audience. But in response to increasing inquiries from lay people, she had an idea that will come to fruition in December, when the organization kicks off a multisession online...

title: De ce s-a prăbușit asfaltul pe o stradă din Sectorul 6 al Capitalei. Soluția propusă de Nicușor Dan
content: Primarul Capitalei, Nicuşor Dan, a declarat că, potrivit specialiştilor, prăbuşirea asfaltului de pe str. Orhideelor din Sectorul 6 s-ar fi produs din cauza unei acumulări de apă. Edilul şi-a exprimat regretul în urma acestui incident și a anunţat că Poliţia şi autorităţile locale investighează acest caz. "Legat de incidentul de azi, bineînţeles că îmi pare rău. Nu trebuie să se întâmple niciodată o chestiune ca aceasta, mai ales că e vorba de o mamă şi un copil. Investighează poliţia, investigăm şi noi ce a dus la asta. Este o bucată de stradă sub care erau nişte reţele - şi de termoficare, şi de apă. Termoficarea e la Termoenergetica, apa este la Apa Nova. O să vedem. Toţi specialiştii spun că probabil chestiunea aceasta s-a produs din cauza unor acumulări de apă. Deci, s-a scurs apă fie dintr-o reţea, fie din alta. În momentul în care noi să fim la sută la sută cu reţeaua de termoficare, această reţea de termoficare nouă, pe care noi o punem, are un fir detector, care instant spune unde este avaria şi unde se scurge apa. Dar pentru asta trebuie să mai cheltuim nişte bani şi să mai treacă nişte timp", a afirmat edilul general, citat de Agerpres. Miercuri, 9 octombrie, în jurul orei 7:35 o mașină a căzut într-o groapă formată în asfalt pe un teren privat din Sectorul 6. Incidentul a avut loc după ce, prin zonă, a trecut un utilaj de salubrizare. Copilul, în vârstă de 5 ani, a căzut în groapă, la...

title: Рамзан Кадыров пригрозил нарушителям порядка отправкой в зону СВО
content: Кадыров уточнил, что большинство жителей Чечни – прогрессивное общество. Люди занимаются спортом, учатся, пробуют себя в разных сферах жизни. При этом, находится меньшинство, которое наплевательски относится к законам. "Молодежь, относящаяся к этому меньшинству, ведет праздный, аморальный образ жизни. Может позволить себе припарковаться где угодно, сесть за руль, находясь под влиянием запрещенных препаратов, нарушать ПДД, гордясь этим, провоцировать конфликты", - отметил Рамзан Кадыров. Людей из такой категории глава республики предлагает наказывать сурово: либо отправлять в тюрьму по максимальному возможному сроку, либо дать показать свою храбрость и лихачество в зоне СВО. Он также уточнил, что в Чечне сейчас создают новый полк численностью 2500 человек, для которого будет уместно принимать правонарушителей в свои ряды. Ранее сообщалось, что 18-летний сын Рамзана Кадырова Ахмат Кадыров, который занимает пост министра спорта Чеченской Республики, выступил против участия чеченцев в боях поп-ММА. Свое обращение к ним он назвал последним предупреждением и пригрозил серьезными последствиями тем, кто не прислушается. Учредитель ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты» Главный редактор В.А.
