title: نظر ویژه ایلان ماسک درباره بیگانگان | آدم فضایی وجود دارد؟
content: به گزارش ، او در گفت‌وگویی ادعا کرد که این اشیاء پرنده ناشناس که مردم ادعا می‌کنند دیده‌اند، احتمالاً فقط برنامه‌های تسلیحاتی بسیار محرمانه دولت آمریکا هستند. ماسک گفت که به‌عنوان مسئول یک شرکت فضایی، «هرگز شواهدی از بیگانگان» ندیده است. در مورد بشریت و جهان، او اعتراف کرد که «چیزهای زیادی وجود دارد که ما نمی‌دانیم». مدیرعامل اسپیس‌ایکس گفت: «از کجا آمده‌ایم؟ بیگانگان کجا هستند؟» ماسک به ماهواره‌های موجود در فضا اشاره کرد تا توضیح دهد که بیگانگان نمی‌توانند وجود داشته باشند. او گفت: «ما بیش از 6هزار ماهواره در مدار داریم، اما حتی یک بار هم مجبور به مانور دادن برای جلوگیری از برخورد با سفینه فضایی بیگانگان نشده‌ایم.» ماسک افزود: «خُب، اشیاء پرنده ناشناس یک چیز هستند، اما همیشه تعداد زیادی برنامه‌های محرمانه در حال اجرا هستند.» او باور دارد که دولت آمریکا به‌طور منظم در حال آزمایش هواپیماهای جدید، موشک‌های جدید و چیزهای است که همه آنها محرمانه هستند؛ به همین دلیل این موضوعات به‌طور کامل بررسی نمی‌شوند. او ادعا کرد که این برنامه‌ها آنقدر محرمانه هستند که حتی افراد رده بالا در زنجیره فرماندهی نظامی ایالات متحده نیز از آنها خبر ندارند. ماسک وعده داد که اگر شواهدی از بیگانگان پیدا کند، فوراً آن را به اطلاع عموم خواهد رساند. او گفت: «در لحظه‌ای که شواهدی از بیگانگان ببینم، فوراً آن را در پلتفرم ایکس منتشر خواهم کرد.» او افزود: «احتمالاً آن پست، پربازدیدترین پست ما در تمام دوران خواهد بود.» در اوایل سال ۲۰۲۳، ماسک گفت که فکر نمی‌کند دولت وجود بیگانگان را پنهان کرده باشد. او اعتراف کرده بود که امیدوار است بیگانگان واقعی و دوستانه باشند. ماسک همچنین ادعا کرد که اگر بیگانگان...

title: Dos dominicanos detenidos con un alijo de cocaína valorado en 1,3 millones en Puerto Rico
creator: EFE
content: Según detallaron las autoridades estadounidenses en un comunicado, el pasado 6 de octubre agentes de Operaciones Aéreas y Marinas (AMO, en inglés) de la CBP realizaban una vigilancia cerca de la isla-municipio de Culebra, cuando avistaron una embarcación de unos 20 pies (6 metros) que navegaba hacia el oeste sin iluminación. Ante ello, los oficiales de la AMO lograron interceptar la embarcación sospechosa, en la que viajaban dos hombres que afirmaron ser presuntamente ciudadanos de la República Dominicana, y tres bolsas con 59 ladrillos de cocaína. En total, estos contrabandistas cargaban 156 libras (70,75 kilogramos) de cocaína. El valor estimado de los narcóticos incautados es de 1,3 millones de dólares. Este operativo fue el segundo que la AMO produjo en una semana en Puerto Rico, pues el 2 de octubre agentes suyos interceptaron otra embarcación en la que un grupo de personas intentó introducir 1.321 libras (599 kilos) de cocaína por la costa occidental de la isla. EFE También puede leer: La ONU reclama el cumplimiento pleno del embargo de armas a bandas criminales en Haití

title: Concordia: detuvieron a una mujer por intentar vender a su hija de 16 años
creator: Raquel Marconi
content: La División Antidrogas Concordia de Gendarmería Nacional detuvo a una mujer de 47 años en Concordia , Entre Ríos , acusada de vender a su hija de 16 años a un hombre de 57 años . La operación se llevó a cabo tras una denuncia anónima que destapó un caso de trata de personas y resultó en el rescate de la adolescente. La captura se llevó a cabo en la intersección de las calles Paula Albarracín de Sarmiento y Lieberman , en cumplimiento de un oficio de arresto emitido por el Juzgado Federal de Paso de Los Libres, en la provincia de Corrientes . La mujer está acusada de haber vendido a su hija de 16 años a un hombre de 57 años, oriundo de Mercedes, Corrientes . Se cree que el acuerdo implicó un pago en efectivo a la madre a cambio de la adolescente , con el supuesto objetivo de adquirir una casilla en Concordia. El caso fue revelado gracias a una denuncia anónima que permitió a las autoridades dar inicio a una exhaustiva investigación. El youtuber Yao Cabrera fue condenado a cuatro años de prisión por trata de personas y explotación sexual En un operativo simultáneo, las fuerzas de seguridad arrestaron al hombre que presuntamente compró a la menor en Mercedes. Durante el procedimiento, la adolescente fue encontrada con él y rescatada, asegurando su protección. El Juzgado Federal de Concordia , bajo la dirección de Analia Ramponi , está gestionando el traslado y alojamiento de la mujer detenida, quien permanecerá a disposición de la justicia...

title: Business Buzz: Local food stand wins $25K grant; Guy Fieri films show in Missoula
content: Here's some business news in the Missoula area: A Missoula entrepreneur has won a big grant from the Montana Department of Agriculture to expand her food business. Linzie Norman, the owner and operator of Pelz MT, received a $25,000 Growth Through Agriculture award earlier this year. The money allowed her to purchase a high-volume dumpling-making machine. Linzie Norman makes her pelmeni. "The machine is going to allow me to expand my business in whatever direction I want to go," she said. Norman makes pelmeni, which are bite-sized dumplings of Russian cuisine that consist of a filling wrapped in thin, unleavened dough. Originally from Juneau, Alaska, Norman makes her pelmeni "Alaska-style" because she was inspired by a small hole-in-the-wall pelmeni shop there that serves specific toppings that she now uses. Her food stand can be found at the Clark Fork River Market on Saturdays through October. The Montana Department of Agriculture awarded her the grant because she uses Montana-made products, such as Mannix Family Ranch beef from Helmville, Farm to Market Pork from Kalispell, mushrooms from Blood Veil Fungi in Ronan and Wheat Montana rye bread and flour, thereby making her pelmeni a "value-added" product. Recently, she used the machine to make 6,000 of the dumplings at the Mission Mountain Food Enterprise Center in Ronan. She hopes to eventually move production to Missoula to utilize the machine more frequently and perhaps begin selling packaged pelmeni. Montana Department...

title: کراچی: پورٹ قاسم کے قریب فائرنگ سے نوجوان زخمی
creator: اسٹاف رپورٹر
content: (فوٹو: فائل) پورٹ قاسم مری گوٹھ کے قریب فائرنگ کے واقعہ میں نوجوان زخمی ہوگیا جسے ایدھی کے رضا کاروں نے فوری طبی امداد کے لیے جناح اسپتال پہنچایا۔ ریسکیو حکام کا کہنا ہے کہ نوجوان کی شناخت 22 سالہ ثناء اللہ کے نام سے کی گئی جبکہ واقعہ ڈکیتی کے دوران مزاحمت پر پیش آنے کا بتایا گیا ہے۔ جبکہ بن قاسم پولیس کا کہنا ہے کہ واقعہ نامعلوم سمت سے آنے والی گولی لگنے کے باعث پیش آیا ہے جس کی مزید تحقیقات کی جا رہی ہے۔ ایکسپریس میڈیا گروپ اور اس کی پالیسی کا کمنٹس سے متفق ہونا ضروری نہیں۔

title: Justiça Eleitoral confirma vitória do ex-governador Pezão para prefeito de Piraí (RJ)
creator: Fábio Matos
content: Publicidade A Justiça Eleitoral confirmou a eleição do ex-governador do Rio de Janeiro para a prefeitura de Piraí (RJ). No último domingo (6), Pezão recebeu 58,58% (10.714) dos votos no primeiro turno, mas a candidatura estava sub judice devido a uma condenação por improbidade administrativa. A confirmação da eleição de Pezão para comandar a prefeitura de Piraí foi registrada, na terça-feira (8), no sistema do Tribunal Superior Eleitoral (TSE) que divulga a totalização dos votos. Continua depois da publicidade O ex-governador se tornou elegível após uma liminar para suspender a condenação por improbidade. A liminar foi proferida na quinta-feira (3) pelo ministro do Supremo Tribunal Federal (STF) André Mendonça. Com a decisão do ministro, o Tribunal Regional Eleitoral do Rio de Janeiro (TRE-RJ) derrubou a decisão de primeira instância que barrou a candidatura de Pezão. Continua depois da publicidade Com anulação dos votos do candidato Professor Joziel (DC), quinto colocado na disputa pela prefeitura de São João de Meriti (RJ), Léo Vieira (Republicanos) superou 50% dos votos válidos e foi eleito no 1o turno No dia 2 de setembro, o juiz Kyle Marcos Santos Menezes acatou o pedido de impugnação do Ministério Público Estadual, proposto pelo partido Agir e pelo candidato Arthur Tutuca (PRD), que também disputou a prefeitura. Após a decisão, Pezão se manifestou pelas redes sociais e afirmou que sempre confiou na Justiça. “Eu sempre disse a...

title: PET ROMANA U KONKURENCIJI ZA NAGRADU 'MEŠA SELIMOVIĆ': Žiri u sastavu...
content: Književni susreti Cum grano salis, njihovo 23. izdanje, otvoreni su danas u Tuzli i trajaće do prekosutra. Na njima će tradicionalno biti dodijeljena i nagrada “Meša Selimović” za najbolji roman objavljen u 2023. na govornom prostoru Bosne i Hercegovine, Hrvatske, Crne Gore i Srbije. Žiri u sastavu Semezdin Mehmedinović, predsjednik, Julijana Matanović, Emir Imamović, Igor Štiks i Pavle Goranović odabrao je pet romana koji su ušli u uži izbor za dodjelu nagrade “Meša Selimović”, koji će tokom održavanja susreta biti i promovisani. U pitanju su djela “Škriptaji kože” autorice Amile Kahrović Posavljak (Buybook), “Šušanj” Almina Kaplana (Buybook), “Vila Fazanka” Bojana Krivokapića (Arete), “Poslije zabave” Steve Grabovca (Imprimatur) i “Slučaj vlastite pogibelji” Kristiana Novaka (Oceanmore).

title: ‘I’m not a spy’ – Seanad erupts into laughter as string of senators declare they’re not Russian spy code-named ‘Cobalt’
creator: Brynmor Pattison
content: THE Seanad erupted into laughter today as a string of senators declared they are not Russian spies. Just days ago, the Sunday Times reported that Russian intelligence may have used a "honeytrap" to recruit a sitting Irish politician from one of the houses of the Oireachtas as an agent during the Brexit talks. One of the aims of such a move is to undermine relations between Ireland, Britain and the EU . A “honeytrap” is where an agent makes their target fall for them romantically. It was also reported that while the Irish military and security services identified the potential agent - codenamed 'Cobalt' - they remain a member of the Dail or Seanad. No arrest has been made as no crime was committed and there is no evidence of payment. Today, Senator Timmy Dooley stood up in the Seanad chamber to declare that he was not a Russian agent. The Fianna Fail man said: "There have been some rumours circulating that members of the upper house have been involved with Russia and that there may or may not be a spy in our midst." After being told to be "careful now", he continued: "No, I'm around a while, I think I can manage this one. "I think it's important that, in order to avoid any potential stain on this house, that members would voluntarily make a statement that they are not the subject of any investigation or that they have never been in the clutches of Russia. "And before I sit down, I can declare that I'm not such a person. "I hope everybody will use the opportunity to ensure...

title: Christchurch mansion’s seagull deterrence sound upsets locals and beachgoers
content: A device designed to deter seagulls from one of Christchurch’s most expensive homes has been the source of noise complaints from locals. The high-frequency sound is coming from a “bird imitator” at a Scarborough hillside mansion dubbed “The Rocks” which was reportedly bought earlier this year for more than $9 million. Locals have described the high-pitched sound as being like a “dog whistle” and “horrible sounding”. A post on a community Facebook page asked if anyone knew what the “screeching... ear-piercing sound” was. Responders quickly identified it was a seagull deterrent coming from The Rocks house which neighbours a seagull colony.

title: رجل يرفض قص شاربه مقابل 10 آلاف يورو (فيديو)
creator: العين الإخبارية
content: تم تحديثه الخميس 2024/10/10 12:35 ص بتوقيت أبوظبي في واقعة غريبة تعكس ارتباط بعض الأشخاص بشعورهم بالهوية، رفض رجل يدعى بيرم أصلانهان، قص شاربه الذي يبلغ طوله 84 سنتيمترًا، رغم تلقيه عرضًا ماليًا مغريًا بقيمة 10 آلاف يورو. يُظهر بيرم تمسكًا قويًا بشاربه، حيث أكد أن قصه يعني فقدان سمعته وهويته. بيرم، الذي يعيش في إحدى المدن، عبّر عن اعتزازه بشاربه، مشيرًا إلى أنه يعتبره جزءًا من شخصيته ولا يمكنه التخلي عنه مهما كانت الإغراءات المالية. وأوضح أنه لن يحلقه إلا عند وفاته، مما يبرز التزامه القوي بهذا العنصر المميز في مظهره. الحادثة أثارت اهتمامًا كبيرًا على وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي، حيث تبادل الكثيرون الآراء حول أهمية الهوية الشخصية والعادات الثقافية. يعتبر الشارب الطويل في بعض الثقافات رمزًا للفخر والقوة، وقد تكون قصة بيرم مثالاً على كيف يمكن أن يعبر الأفراد عن أنفسهم من خلال تفاصيل بسيطة في مظهرهم. بينما يتابع الجميع قصته باهتمام، يبقى السؤال: إلى أي مدى يمكن أن يرتبط الشخص بهويته من خلال مظهره؟ بيرم يؤكد أن شاربه ليس مجرد شعر ينمو، بل هو رمز لشخصيته، مما يعكس أهمية القيم والتقاليد في حياتنا اليومية. aXA6IDE1OS42NS4xNzYuMTQ2IA== جزيرة ام اند امز US

title: Turris, Boli presto in campo. Scaccabarozzi si ferma in attesa di accertamenti
content: Oggi seduta di allenamento mattutina per i corallini. Sessione video e tattica per il gruppo, dopodiché i ragazzi di mister Conte hanno svolto una prima fase dedicata ad esercizi di attivazione muscolare e mobilità, seguita da esercitazioni volte al miglioramento della forza. In chiusura partitella a campo ridotto. Buone notizie per Boli che da domani tornerá a lavorare sul campo. Si é fermato invece Scaccabarozzi in attesa di accertamenti. Un post condiviso da S.S. title: Pobuna zbog ukrajinskih izbjeglica: ‘Pa pogledajte kakve kuće imaju, pravite nas budalama!‘
content: Neke irske obitelji pobunile su se što je ta država izbjeglicama iz Ukrajine osigurala domove vrijedne i do 400.000 eura dok u zemlji traje velika kriza sa stambenim prostorom, piše Daily Mail . Modularne kućice, opremljene svim kućanskim aparatima, posteljinom pa čak i proizvodima za čišćenje, sastoje se od kuhinje i dnevnog prostora, spavaće sobe i sobe za djecu. Izgradnju kućica je financirala irska vlada i isprva su trebale koštati oko 189.000 eura, no njihova izgradnja se na kraju popela do skoro 500.000 eura. Prošli su mjesec izgrađene 572 kućice, no izgradnja još 82 objekta u Haywoodu, u Clonmelu, odgođena je do travnja 2025. zbog prosvjeda na mjestu gradnje. Jednom kad radovi budu završeni, naselje će postati privremeni dom za 2.640 Ukrajinaca. U lipnju ove godine je grupa pod nazivom Zabrinuti stanari Clonmela pozvala građane da se priključe prosvjedu zbog toga što, kako su rekli, irska vlada daje prioritet ukrajinskim izbjeglicama, a ne mari za građane Irske koji također muku muče sa stambenim prostorom. ‘Naša nas vlada pravi budalama‘, rekao je jedan prosvjednik. ‘Ukrajinci ne trebaju kuće za pola milijuna eura već neki privremeni smještaj.‘ Modularna kućica; ilustracija ‘Već su im dali im silan novac, a mi još sad plaćamo i za modularne kućice u Ukrajini. A s druge strane, Irci ne mogu staviti modularnu kućicu u svoje vlastito dvorište kako bi se smanjila kriza stanovanja‘, rekao je drugi prosvjednik. ‘Imam srednja primanja i...

title: Bønfalder Vingegaard på tv: - Jeg har et inderligt håb
creator: Anders Junge Ernst (anders.j.ernst@eb.dk)
content: Det blev heller ikke i år, at Jonas Vingegaard trak i landsholdstrøjen og meldte sig klar til VM. Den dobbelte Tour-vinder indstillede sæsonen tidligt og prioriterede familien, der i september voksede fra tre til fire, da hustruen Trine fødte en dreng. Vanen tro er der dog en ny chance allerede næste år, hvor VM afholdes i Rwanda, og her er ruten som skræddersyet til den klatrestærke dansker. Ikke færre end 5475 højdemeter skal bestiges, når det afrikanske kontinent for første gang nogensinde lægger veje til verdensmesterskabet i landevejscykling. Bøn i tv-studiet Der bliver med andre ord skrevet cykelsportshistorie i Kigali, og den imødesete begivenhed bør blive med deltagelse af Vingegaard. Det er i hvert fald den klare forhåbning hos den tidligere VM-sølvvinder Matti Breschel, som kommer med en direkte bøn til Visma-stjernen. Det sker i seneste afsnit af cykelprogrammet 'Radio Tour - i udbrud' på streamingtjenesten Max. - Jeg har et inderligt håb om, at Jonas kigger med, lyder det først fra Breschel, før budskabet kort efter brager igennem. - Jonas, stil til start! - Han er den eneste, der kan følge Pogacar. I’m Sorry! Han kan vinde VM, men det er der eddermame ikke ret mange andre, der kan på den rute. Vi snakker over 5000 højdemeter, forklarer Breschel. Perfekt rute Den nuværende sportsdirektør hos EF Education-EasyPost står ikke alene med det synspunkt. Så langtfra. Allerede i forbindelse med offentliggørelsen af ruten, der breder sig over godt 267 kilometer,...

title: Jürgen Klopp es nombrado director de fútbol en el grupo Red Bull
content: 15:34 | Berlín, oct. 9. El exentrenador del Liverpool Jürgen Klopp fue nombrado director de actividades de fútbol en Red Bull, anunció el miércoles la multinacional austríaca de bebidas energéticas, muy implicada en el fútbol de alto nivel y que posee tres clubes, en Leipzig, Salzburgo y Nueva York. El alemán de 57 años, que abandonó el Liverpool al término de la pasada temporada, asumirá sus funciones a partir del 1 de enero de 2025, según el comunicado de la empresa de bebidas energéticas. Según la misma fuente, Klopp, que devolvió a sus años de gloria a los 'Reds' durante sus nueve años en el banquillo de Anfield ganando la Premier League y la Champions League, "no se implicará en el día a día de la vida de los clubes" de la galaxia Red Bull, sino que estará más bien al cargo de la visión "estratégica". "Después de 25 años en el borde del terreno, solo podría haberme motivado tanto un proyecto así", reaccionó Klopp, citado en el comunicado. "Sobre todo veo mi rol como un consejero para los entrenadores y la directiva de los clubes Red Bull". Lee también:[ Jürgen Klopp explica las razones de su alejamiento del Liverpool ] Rechazó entrenar El pasado verano boreal el alemán rechazó entrenar de nuevo en un futuro próximo. Según la cadena Sky Alemania, el contrato de Klopp con Red Bull contiene una cláusula de rescisión si tiene la oportunidad de convertirse en seleccionador de Alemania. En Europa, sin haberse instalado todavía entre...

title: الجبهة الداخلية الإسرائيلية: صفارات الإنذار تدوي في بلدة مجدل شمس بالجولان إثر الاشتباه بتسلل طائرة مسيرة
Governo diz ao STF que ação contra uso de dinheiro esquecido ameaça R$ 14,3 bi em 2024
creator: redacao@odia.com.br (Estadão Conteúdo)
content: Brasília- O governo disse ao Supremo Tribunal Federal (STF) que a ação ajuizada pelo PP contra a incorporação de valores esquecidos em contas bancárias para fins de cumprimento da meta fiscal ameaça uma perda de arrecadação de R$ 14,3 bilhões em 2024. Segundo nota técnica do Ministério do Planejamento, eventual declaração de inconstitucionalidade da norma pode gerar a "necessidade de novos contingenciamentos para tornar possível cumprir a meta de resultado primário". O valor já constou no último relatório Receitas e Despesas, que contabilizou o ingresso de depósitos judiciais de processos já encerrados (R$ 8 bilhões) e de recursos empossados na Caixa Econômica Federal (R$ 6,3 bilhões). A manifestação atende ao ministro Edson Fachin, relator da ação, que pediu informações à Advocacia-Geral da União (AGU) e ao Congresso. Ele também pediu um parecer da Procuradoria-Geral da República (PGR), que vai se manifestar em seguida. Fachin decidiu adotar o chamado "rito abreviado" de tramitação, o que remete o processo diretamente ao plenário, sem análise do pedido de liminar para suspensão imediata da lei. O uso desse dinheiro faz parte das medidas articuladas entre Executivo e Congresso para compensar a desoneração da folha de pagamentos de 17 setores da economia e dos municípios com até 156 mil habitantes. A lei que prevê essa e outras compensações foi sancionada pelo presidente Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) no mês passado. Para o PP,...

title: Patriots tout new QB1 Drake Maye's ability to make 'plays you see on TV'
content: Rookie quarterback Drake Maye became the best option at the position for the Patriots due to modest gains made by New England during a 1-4 start with Jacoby Brissett as QB1. The No. 3 pick in the 2024 draft, Maye was informed he would make his first career start after the Patriots lost a fourth consecutive game and failed to score 14 points for the third straight week. New England has five total touchdowns and 62 points in five games to open Jerod Mayo's first season as head coach. "Something you dream of, getting your first start in the NFL," Maye said Wednesday. "So excited to get out there with the guys, take advantage of having the full week to get prepared and try to put my best foot forward and help the team win." The Patriots welcome the Houston Texans (4-1), who have won back-to-back games by scoring on the final possession. New England is looking to avoid losing five consecutive games for the second season in a row. Houston leads the NFL in QB pressure rate at 42 percent and limited Bills quarterback Josh Allen to nine completions in 30 attempts last week. In his five starts in 2024, Brissett was sacked 17 times but threw only one interception. "Going forward, I think now Drake gives us the best chance to win now and going forward," Mayo said Wednesday. "He's been getting better every single week as I said before. At the end of training camp, he actually was trending at a very high rate, and that has continued through the early part of the season. "Physically, look,...

title: Teen Mom star Ryan Edwards’ pregnant girlfriend Amanda Conner is ‘banned’ from seeing his kids with ex Mackenzie
creator: Teresa Roca
content: TEEN Mom star Ryan Edwards’ pregnant girlfriend, Amanda Conner, has been “banned” from seeing his children with his estranged wife, Mackenzie. Amanda, 33, announced her pregnancy over TikTok after weeks of speculation. The U.S. Sun can exclusively reveal that though the star will be welcoming a child with Ryan, 36, she cannot be present during his visitation with children Jagger, 6, and Stella, 4. “Amanda is not allowed to be around the kids. If they don’t follow it, it will dismantle Ryan’s custody,” an insider exclusively claimed to The U.S. Sun. “He gets the kids every other Saturday at 12pm to Sunday at 6pm at his mom Jen’s house.” The source claimed Ryan “made it a huge deal in court that he be allowed to come with Jen to pick kids up” from Mackenzie, but he allegedly “hasn't done it a single time.” Read more on Teen Mom Ryan has posted photos of Jagger and Stella on social media at his mother's Tennessee home, as his girlfriend Amanda hasn't been present. Ryan and Mackenzie are still married, as the insider claimed Ryan is the one who has been postponing their divorce . “He has done nothing to move it forward," the source claimed. “He either fires a lawyer or doesn't show up." Most read in Celebrity According to their divorce case, a hearing to adopt a temporary parenting plan has been postponed at least four times. Ryan’s lawyer withdrew from the case on July 2022, as a new attorney filed to represent the Teen Mom: The Next Chapter star. The next court hearing will...

title: Opnieuw onrustig in Sneek, meerdere jongeren aangehouden
content: CAMJO media De politie hield jongeren aan in de wijk Noorderhoek In samenwerking met Omrop Fryslân NOS Nieuws • vandaag, 22:34 Opnieuw onrustig in Sneek, meerdere jongeren aangehouden Bij ongeregeldheden in de wijk Noorderhoek in Sneek zijn vanavond meerdere aanhoudingen verricht, meldt de politie. Het is al een paar avonden op rij onrustig in de wijk. Een groep van tientallen jongeren steekt onder meer zwaar illegaal vuurwerk af en richt vernielingen aan. Hoeveel personen er precies zijn opgepakt, kon de politie nog niet zeggen. Volgens Omrop Fryslân zijn er jongeren aangehouden omdat ze professioneel vuurwerk en softdrugs bij zich hadden. Onder hen zijn ook minderjarigen. De politie zegt de afgelopen dagen tientallen meldingen te hebben gekregen van omwonenden. De meldingen gaan over het afsteken van illegaal vuurwerk en over vernielingen. Er zijn onder meer containers in brand gestoken. Ook keerden groepen jongeren zich tegen de politie. Op sociale media werd opgeroepen vanavond opnieuw naar de wijk te komen. De politie riep op haar beurt op om daar geen gehoor aan te geven. Groot onderzoek Vanwege de ongeregeldheden is de politie een groot onderzoek gestart naar een groep van dertig tot veertig mensen. Daarvoor worden getuigen gehoord en camerabeelden bekeken. De politie benadrukt dat ook de ouders van de daders aansprakelijk kunnen worden gehouden als ze weten dat hun kinderen illegaal vuurwerk in bezit hebben. In samenwerking met Omrop Fryslân Regionaal nieuws...

title: KAC gewinnt bei CHL-Titelverteidiger Genf
content: Im ersten Drittel hielt der KAC dem spielerischen Übergewicht von Genf auch dank einiger starker Paraden von Goalie Sebastian Dahm erfolgreich stand. Gleich zu Beginn des Mittelabschnitts nützten die Schweizer aber eine Überzahl mit einem Treffer von Michael Spacek (21.) und erhöhten einige Minuten später durch Alessio Bertaggia auf 2:0 (29.). Danach wurde Genf jedoch nachlässig, dem KAC gelang dank Daniel Obersteiner vor der zweiten Pause das Anschlusstor (39.). Simeon Schwinger (46.) gelang schließlich der Ausgleich für den KAC. In der Schlussphase des letzten Drittels hatten die Kärntner mehrere Chancen auf den mittlerweile verdienten Siegestreffer. Dieser gelang Matt Fraser letztlich erst in der vierten Minute der Verlängerung. Zum Abschluss der Ligaphase bekommen es die Klagenfurter nächsten Mittwoch (20.20 Uhr, live in ORF Sport +) daheim mit den ZSC Lions Zürich zu tun, die wie Red Bull Salzburg bereits fix im Play-off sind. Champions Hockey League Dienstag: Servette – KAC 2:3 n. V. (0:0 2:1 1:2/0:1) Neuchatel, 1.400 Zuschauer Tore: Spacek (21./PP), Bertaggia (29.) bzw. Obersteiner 39., Schwinger 45., Fraser 63. Strafminuten: 2 bzw. 6

title: Man dies after utes collide head-on in Sydney
creator: 9News
content: Tweet Facebook Mail A man is dead after two utes collided head-on in Sydney's south-west this morning. Emergency services were called to Burragorang Road at Glenmore at about 4.50am, where they found a man driving one of the utes had died at the scene. A man and a boy in the other ute suffered non life threatening injuries and were taken to hospital. Ratan Tata Fell In Love 'Four Times', But Never Got Married: 'I Backed Off in Fear...'
content: Ratan Tata, the legendary industrialist and philanthropist, passed away at the age of 86 on Wednesday. He had been admitted to Mumbai’s Breach Candy Hospital after experiencing a sudden drop in blood pressure. Tata, who was in critical condition in the ICU, leaves behind an unmatched legacy in the world of business and philanthropy. Beyond his professional achievements, Tata’s personal life has also intrigued many, especially his choice to remain unmarried. Ratan Tata Fell In Love ‘Four Times’ In an old interview with CNN, Ratan Tata candidly revealed that he fell in love four times and came close to marrying on each occasion. However, circumstances always led him to step back. He reflected on the time he almost married someone while living in the U.S., but the 1962 Indo-China conflict changed everything. “One was probably the most serious when I was working in the U.S. The only reason we didn’t get married was that I came back to India, and she was supposed to follow me. But that was the year of the Indo-Chinese conflict, and in true American fashion, this conflict in the snowy Himalayas was seen as a major war. She didn’t come, and she eventually married someone else in the U.S.,” Tata shared. Why Ratan Tata Never Got Married When asked why he never married despite falling in love, Tata confessed that fear played a role in his decisions. “I came seriously close to getting married four times. And each time, it got close to that stage, and I guess I backed off in fear for...

title: CME lean hog, cattle futures lower on profit-taking
content: By P.J. Huffstutter CHICAGO, Oct 9 (Reuters) - Chicago Mercantile Exchange lean hog and cattle futures fell on Wednesday on signs of profit-taking, as wholesale prices continued to say firm and strength in the financial markets gave grain futures a boost, analysts said. Benchmark CME December lean hog futures ended down 1.600 cents at 75.575 cents per pound. CME December live cattle futures settled down 0.65 cent at 187.225 cents per pound. CME November feeder cattle futures ended down 1.625 cent at 248.675 cents per pound. Though livestock futures ended the day lower, there is little sign that management money players are stepping away from cattle and hog markets, traders said. Instead, hedge funds have been expanding net long positions in cattle — and are taking aggressive moves to stay long in hog — as consumer demand for meat appears to be staying firm, particularly for beef, said Dan Norcini, an independent livestock trader. Pork wholesale carcass prices turned higher on Wednesday morning, driven by a jump in pork belly prices, according to U.S. Department of Agriculture data. Boxed beef prices also firmed, with choice cutout values up $1.61 per hundredweight (cwt) and select cutout values up 87 cents at $289.48 per cwt. At the same time, U.S. meatpackers have continued to buy cattle to meet consumer demand, with the heavier weighted animals helping to bolster total meat volume, he said. Cash cattle market prices are expected steady to firm this week, with one trade...

title: Trepça pëson humbje në Francë
content: Kampionia e Kosovës, Trepça ka zhvilluar ndeshjen e parë në këtë edicion të grupeve në FIBA Europe Cup. Mitrovicasit pësuan nga JDA Bourgogne Dijon me rezultat 118:73 (34:27, 28:12, 28:15, 28:19), përballje që u zhvillua në Francë. Vendasit e nisën ndeshjen më mirë dhe fituan çerekun e parë 34:27, derisa me lojë të mirë vazhduan edhe në periudhën e dytë, për të shkuar në pushim me shifrat 62:39. Skuadra franceze ishte më e mirë edhe në pjesën e dytë, për të fituar në fund 118:73. Mikaile Tmusiq shënoi 22 pikë për ‘Xehetarët’. Tani mitrovicasit do të kenë tri ndeshje si vendas: MHP Riesen Ludwigsburg më 16 tetor, Caledonia Gladiators 23 tetor dhe JDA Bourgogne Dijon më 30 tetor.

title: Prohra ve Valencii. Basketbalistkám USK se vstup do Euroligy nepovedl
content: Hráčky USK se v úvodu ujaly vedení 4:0 díky košům Harrisonové a Valériane Ayayiové, která pak trojkou zvýšila už na 12:6. Během první čtvrtiny se obhájkyně bronzu dostaly i na devítibodový rozdíl, stejně jako dvakrát i ve druhé desetiminutovce. Deseti body se na tom podílela Ayayiová a osmi Harrisonová. Valencie ale dokázala krátce před poločasem snížit na 32:34. Ještě před pauzou sice María Condeová zvýšila na čtyřbodový rozdíl, jenže španělský celek hned po přestávce vyrovnal na 36:36. Přestože české šampionky ve 26. minutě díky trojce a dvěma proměněnými trestným hodům Mariany Přibylové odskočily na 47:42, Valencie dokázala otočit stav. Poprvé ji dostala do vedení 113 sekund před koncem třetí čtvrtiny trojkou Alba Torrensová a Stephanie Mavungaová ještě zvýšila na 54:50. V úvodu závěrečné desetiminutovky rozhodla Valencie desetibodovou šňůrou, z které byl náskok 66:54. Harrisonová s Veronikou Voráčkovou sice ještě stáhly ztrátu pod dvouciferný rozdíl, ale v závěru vládly domácí basketbalistky a slavily jednoznačnou výhru.

title: Öğretmenlik Mesleği Kanunu Teklifi'nin 6 maddesi daha kabul edildi
content: Kabul edilen maddelere göre, öğretmen adaylarının mesleğe hazırlanması, öğretmen, yönetici ve diğer personelin mesleki gelişimi, kariyer basamaklarında ilerlemeleri ve görevde yükselmeleri için eğitim programları hazırlamak, uygulamak ve değerlendirmek üzere Bakanlığa bağlı Milli Eğitim Akademisi kurulacak. Gerekli görülen yerlerde Akademi bünyesinde eğitim ve uygulama merkezleri açılabilecek. Akademinin personel, denetim, bakım ve onarım, koruma ve güvenlik, taşınır ve taşınmaz, araç, gereç, malzeme, demirbaş ve taşıtlar ile benzeri ihtiyaçları için gerekli iş ve işlemler Bakanlığın ilgili birimleri tarafından yerine getirilecek. Akademinin giderleri için öngörülen ödenekler Bakanlık bütçesinde yer alacak. Teklifle, Akademinin görevleri de hüküm altına alınıyor. Buna göre, Akademi, öğretmenlik mesleğine hazırlık eğitimi programları, yönetici yetiştirme programları ile öğretmen, yönetici ve diğer personelin kariyer basamaklarında ilerlemeleri ve görevde yükselmelerine yönelik eğitim programlarını hazırlayıp uygulayacak. Akademi, öğretmen, yönetici ve diğer personelin sahip olması gereken yeterliklerini belirleyecek ve gelişen şartlara göre güncelleyecek. Öğretmenlere; öğretmenlik mesleğinin gerektirdiği bilgi, beceri, tutum ve değerler ile dijital yeterlikleri kazandıracak eğitim faaliyetleri planlayıp uygulayacak. title: Real poručio svojoj velikoj legendi - ovdje te više ne trebamo, u Madridu sada imaju novi plan
creator: goran.cicin.masansker@sportskenovosti.hr (Goran Čičin-Mašansker)
content: R aul Gonzales je legendarni napadač Real Madrida, strijelac 323 pogotka u 741 nastupu za kraljevski klub. Po završetku bogate igračke karijere (2015.) Raul se uhvatio trenerskog posla u mlađim uzrastima Reala, a trenutačno vodi drugu momčad Real Madrid Castilla. Ugovor mu traje do ljeta sljedeće godine, a tada će Raul napustiti klupu te će njegov posao preuzeti Alvaro Arbeloa. Stekao je Raul dosta iskustva vodeći mlade nogometaše, no na kraju sezone vjerojatno neće otići iz kluba. Čelnici ga žele zadržati te je moguće da bude priključen stručnom stožeru prve momčadi sljedeće sezone, s obzirom na to da je u odličnim odnosima s trenerom Carlom Ancelottijem i njegovim suradnicima. Druga je opcija Raulov odlazak u upravu klupske akademije, gdje već rade Santiago Solari i Manu Fernandez , piše Marca. Naravno, nešto će se pitati i samog Raula, koji je u posljednje vrijeme odbio nekoliko ponuda drugih klubova za samostalan trenerski angažman. On sam navodno nema ništa protiv ostanka u Realu, kako kaže, klubu njegova života...

content: SNIMCI na društvenim mrežama prikazuju jezive prizore nevremena i jake kiše na Floridi. Po ulici leti krš, krhotine, drveće se savija, a stubovi i lampioni padaju. Mesto sa snimka, Matloh, kao da je zbrisano sa lica zemlje! Lokalno stanovništvo, koje se još uvek oporavlja od posledica uragana Helene, koji je prošao kroz ovo područje samo nekoliko nedelja ranije, sada se priprema za ono što bi moglo biti još jedan razoran udarac. title: "Nowy poziom rosyjskiej dyplomacji": Ławrow porusza temat quadrobusów podczas rozmów z ormiańską delegacją i staje się pośmiewiskiem. Wideo
content: Podczas spotkania ze swoim ormiańskim odpowiednikiem, rosyjski minister spraw zagranicznych Siergiej Ławrow postanowił omówić z nim temat quadrobotów. Rosyjski urzędnik stał się pośmiewiskiem w Internecie, ponieważ użytkownicy zauważyli niezdolność rosyjskiego rządu do radzenia sobie z prawdziwymi wyzwaniami. Dziwne zachowanie urzędnika podczas międzynarodowego spotkania zwróciło uwagę sieci społecznościowej X. Na opublikowanym filmie słychać, jak Ławrow zwraca się do swojego kolegi i pyta: "Czy masz quadrobers?". Następnie zaczął wyjaśniać, kim oni są. Użytkownik o pseudonimie "Messenger of Peace" zauważył, że sytuacja ta pokazuje, jak bardzo zdegradowało się rosyjskie MSZ. "Podczas gdy Rosja stara się zachować swoją "suwerenność" w obliczu presji sankcji i wewnętrznych zawirowań, rosyjska dyplomacja wydaje się być całkowicie oderwana od rzeczywistości . Zamiast omawiać kwestie o strategicznym znaczeniu, Ławrow porusza tematy, które nie mają nic wspólnego z bezpieczeństwem lub polityką międzynarodową" - oburzył się Rosjanin. "Kiedy minister spraw zagranicznych kraju o globalnych wpływach zaczyna rozmawiać z ministrem spraw zagranicznych Armenii o strojach dla dzieci, podkreśla to kryzys całego systemu" - dodał. Użytkownik dodał, że Armenia najwyraźniej również zauważyła tę pustkę i wyciągnęła wnioski: Wpływy Rosji topnieją, a jej sojusznicy tracą zaufanie. "To nowy poziom rosyjskiej dyplomacji. Putin ograł...

Кровавый удар: израильские ВВС атаковали по центру спасения в Ливане
content: Ливанский полевой источник сообщил РИА Новости, что центр службы спасения в поселении Даргайя на юге Ливана подвергся атаке израильских ВВС. В результате авиаудара погибли семь спасателей. По данным источника, удар пришелся по зданию, в котором располагались спасатели. Это здание, расположенное в округе Тира, использовалось в качестве центра гражданской обороны. Авиаудар стал очередным эпизодом эскалации конфликта между Израилем и Ливаном. В последние дни израильские ВВС неоднократно наносили удары по различным объектам на территории Ливана, что привело к значительным человеческим жертвам и разрушениям. Ливанские власти осудили действия Израиля, назвав их агрессией против мирного населения. Международное сообщество призвало стороны конфликта к сдержанности и немедленному прекращению огня. А́рмия оборо́ны Изра́иля — вооружённые силы Государства Израиль и главный орган его безопасности.

title: Soccer-Saudi League edge is good for Senegal team, Mane says
content: (Reuters) - The presence of many Senegal players in the Saudi Pro League benefits the national team due to the competition's high competitive level, Al-Nassr forward Sadio Mane said on Wednesday. Mane, twice African player of the year, started the season with Al-Nassr strongly, scoring two goals and making five assists in six matches playing alongside all-time great Cristiano Ronaldo. "We’re all in the Senegalese national team,‮"‬ Mane told the Saudi Pro League. "Of course, we sometimes talk about the league and many other things. "It's a competitive league, so all the big players want to come, like Kalidou (Koulibaly), Habib (Diallo). They're all important players for our (national team) selection, so the fact that they're here is also beneficial for the national team‮"‬. Mane is still close to Al-Ettifaq midfielder Georginio Wijnaldum, his former Liverpool team mate. "Ginni is one of my very good friends,‮"‬ Mane says. "And (with) Ginni, it’s more than football, because our relationship came naturally.‮"‬ A Champions League and Premier League winner with Liverpool, Mane has his sights set on more trophies with Al-Nassr. ‮"‬It's going to be early to talk about winning the league,‮"‬ he said. "We know what our objective is, it's to be champions... our objective is to win everything." Mane said the standard of competition in the Saudi league had increased. "Every team has strengthened in level. It's what football fans expect, so it's beneficial for the championship."...

title: Captan momento del choque entre dos unidades del transporte público en San Manuel
content: Cámaras de vigilancia captaron el instante en el que dos unidades del transporte público chocaron en calles de la colonia Jardines de San Manuel , donde más de una decena de pasajeros resultaron policontundidos. Una grabación de cámaras de vigilancia de la zona muestra el instante de la colisión entre una Van de la ruta 21 y la unidad 84 de la ruta 25 Nueva Visión. ➡️ Únete al canal de El Sol de Puebla en WhatsApp para no perderte la información más importante Lo anterior en Circuito Juan Pablo II y calle Río Cazones. Ahí, el chofer de la ruta 21, según las autoridades viales del municipio de Puebla, se detuvo de manera intempestiva y con falta de precaución ocasionando que el chofer se la línea Nueva Visió n chocara por alcance. El hecho de tránsito ocurrido la tarde del 30 de Septiembre, dejó a 14 pasajeros con diversas contusiones por lo que fueron atendidos por Técnicos en Urgencias Médicas (TUM’s) . Una grabación de cámaras de vigilancia de la colonia Jardines de San Manuel muestra el instante de la colisión entre una Van de la ruta 21 y la unidad 84 de la ruta 25 Nueva Visión. pic.twitter.com/qjR5nkMeuz — El Sol de Puebla (@elsoldepuebla1) October 9, 2024 Al lugar acudieron peritos de la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana (SSC) para hacer las anotaciones correspondientes , asegurar los vehículos y a los conductores involucrados.

title: Jennifer Lopez opens up about Ben Affleck divorce in first comments since split
content: Jennifer Lopez is “excited” to be single following her high-profile divorce from Ben Affleck . The Love Don’t Cost a Thing singer, 55, opened up about her new singledom in a profile for Interview magazine - the first interview she has given about the divorce. Lopez filed for divorce from Affleck , 52, on August 20 - the two-year anniversary of their lavish wedding . The couple first tied the knot in Las Vegas on July 16, 2022, but held a more traditional ceremony in Georgia on August 20 that year .

title: Koliko je samo Sferopulosu značila ova pobeda: Pogledajte kako je slavio kad je izašao iz hale
creator: Mario Marić (Telegraf.rs)
content: Trener Crvene zvezde Janisu Sferopulosu i te kako je značila ova pobeda protiv Baskonije u 2. kolu Evrolige , samo nekoliko dana nakon udara koji je istrpeo zbog kiksa u ABA ligi! Naime, dok je izlazio iz Arene i kretao se ka tunelu, Janis je visoko podigao obe ruke, stisnuo pesnice i pokazao ih ka navijačima od kojih je, u međuvremenu, dobio veliku podršku. Nedugo nakon izlaska iz dvorane, Grk je dao i izjavu pred kamerama: - Još je rano da bih bio ponosan, srećni smo što smo dobili ovu utakmicu pred našim navijačima, prva kod kuće, kontrolisali smo je do kraja, imali smo dvocifrenu prednost, Baskonija je dobar tim, nisu odustajali od ove utakmice, borili se do kraja, ali na kraju smo pravili prave odluke, čuvali loptu u rukama, odigrali dobru pobedu, bitnu i čestitke na tome - rekao je Sferopulos i dodao: - Veoma smo srećni, navijači su nam mnogo pomogli, ispunili dvoranu i drago mi je da smo im doneli sreću zbog ovog rezultata. Okrećemo se sledećim utakmicama u Evroligi i ABA ligi. Podsetimo, Zvezda u EL ima skor 2:0, dok je u ABA ligi malo posrnula na startu i ima neočekivanih 1:2. (Telegraf.rs)

title: أمازون تعتزم تسريع خدمة التوصيل باستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي
creator: العين الإخبارية
content: طورت شركة أمازون أنظمة جديدة توفر بضع ثوانٍ في كل عملية توصيل، ضمن مساعيها لتعزيز الكفاءة. الأنظمة ستساعد العملاء على اتخاذ خيارات شراء أسرع بما يشمل فئات جديدة من المنتجات قد لا يعرفون الكثير عنها. فقد أعلنت الشركة، الأربعاء، أنها أضافت أضواء كاشفة إلى شاحناتها لإرشاد العاملين بالتوصيل إلى الطرود المتوقع تسليمها في كل توقف على طول الطريق. كيف تعمل التكنولوجيا؟ تعمل عبر تسليط ضوء أخضر اللون على الطرود حتى لا يضطر عامل التوصيل إلى إهدار أي وقت في قراءة بطاقات بيانات العملاء عليها. ستجهز أمازون في أوائل العام المقبل ألف شاحنة توصيل تستخدم التكنولوجيا الجديدة مقدمة من شركة ريفيان لصناعة السيارات الكهربائية. وصعد سهما أمازون وريفيان بنحو 1% لكل منهما في التداولات المبكرة. مذبحة مديرين في أمازون.. الاستغناء عن 14 ألف موظف كبير أمازون تطلق «مساعدا بالذكاء الاصطناعي» لخدمة التجار تقنية مستودعات أمازون يشابه النظام الجديد تقنية منتشرة على نطاق واسع في مستودعات أمازون إذ يتم تسليط الضوء على الأغراض الموجودة على الأرفف ذات العجلات الآلية ليتمكن العمال من اختيارها ووضعها في صناديق. حل هذا النظام محل نظام كان بعض العمال يقطعون بموجبه مسافة تصل إلى نحو 16 كيلومترا في اليوم دافعين عربات عبر ممرات ضيقة للعثور على الأغراض المخزنة المطلوبة للتسليم. يعتبر تقصير الوقت الذي يستغرقه تسليم كل غرض ببضع ثوان يعني أن بإمكان أمازون زيادة عدد عمليات التسليم التي يقوم بها كل عامل في نوبة عمله. تقول أمازون إن عمال التوصيل يصلون اليوم إلى نحو 100 عميل كل يوم. ذكاء اصطناعي قالت أمازون أيضا في فعالية أُقيمت بمستودع قرب ناشفيل بولاية تنيسي، إنها تستخدم برامج ذكاء...

title: تازة ..توفير حافلة لنقل تلاميذ بجماعة مكناسة الشرقية
creator: ع.عياش
content: هبة بريس _ مكتب فاس تفاعل عامل عمالة إقليم تازة مصطفى المعزة مع وقفة احتجاجية لمجموعة من تلميذات وتلاميذ دوار اخلافة التابع لجماعة مكناسة الشرقية ضواحي تازة مؤخرا، ووفر لهم حافلة نقل مدرسي تابعة للمجلس الإقليمي ، بعد معاناتهم لمدة أسابيع من بعد المسافة التي تربط مقرات سكناهم بالمدرسة التي يدرسون بها والتي تبعد بحوالي 8 كلم. وانطلاقا من شكايات أباء وأولياء التلاميذ، وتصريحاتهم ،والوقفة الاحتجاجية المنظمة يوم الجمعة 4 أكتوبر الجاري أمام عمالة تازة، مفادها أن أبناءهم يتخبطون في وضعية مأسوية عند متابعة مسارهم الدراسي بفرعية بعيدة عن محل سكناهم بعد أن تم إغلاق فرعية اخلالقة التابعة لمجموعة مدارس بوقلال، حيث يضطر التلاميذ، في غياب النقل المدرسي، إلى قطع مسافة تفوق 8 كيلومترات يوميا مشيا على الأقدام ، إلا أن عامل الإقليم وبتواضعه و خصاله الحميدة وعطفه على الطبقة الفقيرة تفاعل بجدية مع مشاكلهم اليومية ووفر لهم نقل مدرسي على عجالة.

title: 'Domuz eti ithalatı yapıldı' iddiasına yalanlama
content: Dezenformasyonla Mücadele Merkezinden yapılan açıklamada, tüm dünyada ticarete konu olan malların "Armonize Sistem (GTP)" adı verilen sistemle tanımlanıp, kodlandığı belirtildi. Bu sistem çerçevesinde, sığır, koyun ve keçi sakatatlarının yanı sıra diğer hayvanların sakatatlarının "02.06 nolu GTP" altında sınıflandırıldığı ifade edilen açıklamada, ticarete konu tüm ürünlerin bir gümrük pozisyonu ile sınıflandırıldığı ve tüm anlaşmaların, ticarete konu olsun olmasın, tüm ürünlerle ilgili değerlendirmeleri içerdiği aktarıldı. Açıklamada, 24 Aralık 2017'de imzalanan ancak henüz yürürlüğe girmemiş olan Sudan ile Ticaret ve Ekonomik Ortaklık Anlaşması'nda binlerce GTP bulunduğuna dikkat çekilerek, şunlar kaydedildi: "Uluslararası sınıflandırmadan aktarılan GTP'lerin anlaşmalar içerisinde bulunması, bu ürünlerin tamamında ticaret yapılacağı anlamına gelmemektedir. Ülkemizin geçmiş yıllar ithalat verileri incelendiğinde, Sudan'dan 02.06 GTP'de sayılan hayvanların yenilen sakatatlarını ithal etmediği görülecektir. Diğer taraftan, uluslararası ticaret istatistikleri incelendiğinde Sudan'ın dünyadaki herhangi bir ülkeye domuz eti veya sakatatı ihracatının da bulunmadığı görülmektedir. Sudan, yüzölçümü bakımından dünyanın 15'inci, Afrika'nın ise üçüncü büyük ülkesi olup, 'hem Afrika hem Arap ülkesi' olarak nitelendirilmektedir. Aynı zamanda COMESA (Doğu ve Güney Afrika Ortak Pazarı) ve Arap Ligi üyeliği sayesinde...

title: Totalni haos na Floridi: Avion se srušio u more tokom evakuacije, spasioci izvlačili ljude iz vode
creator: Milan Prelić
content: Četvoro ljudi i pas spaseni su nakon što se njihov privatni avion srušio dok su se pokušavali evakuisati iz područja koje će udariti uragan Milton, saopštila je američka Obalska straža. Avion je pao u vodu u blizini aerodroma Albert Vited u gradu St. Petersburgu u zapadnoj Floridi, prema američkoj obalnoj straži. Lokalna vatrogasna ekipa i prolaznik izvukli su ljude iz vode. Troje ih je prebačeno u bolnicu bez povreda opasnih po život. (Telegraf.rs)

Oyunculuk Kariyeri de Varmış: Discord Kriziyle Gündeme Oturan Ecrin Su Çoban, Serenay Sarıkaya'yla Rol Almış!
content: Discord'da dolandırıcılık ve şantaj iddialarıyla son günlerde gündemden düşmeyen ve soruşturmaya dahil edilen Ecrin Su Çoban'ın, Serenay Sarıkaya 'yla Alice Müzikali'nde birlikte rol aldığı ortaya çıktı. Son günlerde ülke gündeminde iç açıcı hiçbir haber yok ne yazık ki... Kadın cinayetleri, küçücük bedenlerin katledilmesi, siber zorbalıklar derken iç karartıcı günler yaşıyoruz. O haberlerden birinin gündeminde de sosyal medya fenomeni Ecrin Su Çoban var. Çünkü Discord'da dolandırıcılık ve şantaj iddialarıyla soruşturmaya dahil edilen Çoban'la ilgili söylentiler ağızları açık bırakacak cinsten. Her ne kadar hakkındaki iddiaları reddetse de son olarak evindeki dijital materyallere el konulacağı ve evinde arama yapılacağı haberi gelmişti. Peki biz nereden tanıyoruz Ecrin Su Çoban'ı? Öncelikle kendisini ekranlarda ilk olarak O Ses Çocuklar'da görmüştük. Detaylar: Ekranlarla O Ses Çocuklar aracılığıyla tanışsa da bu onun için son olmadı ve kendisi Masal Şatosu serisinde başrolü kapmayı başardı! Üstüne bir de İyi Aile Babası (Babam Çok Değişti) dizisinde rol alan Çoban, çocuk oyuncu olarak epey tanınır hale gelmişti. Bu sayede döneminin en sevilen dizilerinden biri olan Menajerimi Ara'da da rol almayı başarmıştı. Oyunculuk ve sahne kariyeri açısından en görünür olduğu yer ise Alice Müzikali olmuştu. Ünlü oyuncu Serenay Sarıkaya ile birlikte rol alan Çoban, yine onunla birlikte müzikalin sembol şarkısını...

title: Supreme Court seems likely to give Oklahoma death row inmate a new day in court
creator: AP via Scripps News
content: The Supreme Court appeared likely Wednesday to give Oklahoma death row inmate Richard Glossip at least another day in court in his long quest to throw out his murder conviction and death sentence. The justices heard arguments in a case that has produced a rare alliance in which lawyers for Glossip and the state argued that the high court should overturn Glossip’s conviction and death sentence because he did not get a fair trial. The victim’s relatives have told the high court that they want to see Glossip executed. Oklahoma's top criminal appeals court has repeatedly upheld the conviction and sentence, even after the state sided with Glossip. The justices seemed unlikely to affirm the Oklahoma court, after arguments that lasted nearly two hours. But precisely what the court would do was less clear. The justices could throw out the conviction, which would take Glossip off of death row. Attorney General Gentner Drummond, who attended Wednesday's session, has conceded the trial was unfair. Drummond, a Republican, has said Glossip could face a new trial in the 1997 killing in Oklahoma City of his former boss, motel owner Barry Van Treese, in what prosecutors have alleged was a murder-for-hire scheme. The justices also could, as Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson suggested, order state courts to conduct a new hearing to weigh claims that prosecutors suppressed evidence. Only eight justices are hearing the case and a 4-4 tie would affirm the Oklahoma court ruling. Justice Neil Gorsuch...

title: Joe Biden îl acuză pe Trump că a declanșat „o avalanşă de minciuni” înainte ca uraganul Milton să ajungă în Florida
content: Preşedintele american Joe Biden a declarat că „ are loc o propagare iresponsabilă, periculoasă şi continuă a unei dezinformări”, acuzându-l pe Donald Trump de faptul că a declanșat „o avalanșă de minciuni” despre gestionarea de către Guvern a uraganelor Helene şi Milton, relatează AFP, citată de Agerpres. Președintele Statelor Unite ale Americii, după o reuniune la Casa Albă pe tema puternicului uragan Milton, a declarat că „are loc o propagare iresponsabilă, periculoasă şi continuă a unei dezinformări şi a unor minciuni pur şi simplu” și totodată îl acuză pe candidatul republican la președinție de faptul că a declanşat o „avalanşă de minciuni” înainte ca uraganul Milton să ajungă în Florida. „Fostul preşedinte Trump conduce această avalanşă de minciuni”, a declarat Joe Biden. Susținătorii lui Trump au lansat atacuri dure asupra lui Joe Biden şi Kamala Harris, acuzându-i pe aceștia că nu au mobilizat resursele necesare pentru a face față uraganului Helen, care a făcut ravagii în Florida, Georgia și Carolina de Nord. Subiectul catastrofelor naturale a căpătat o importanță deosebită în dezbaterile politice, cu mai puțin de o lună înainte de alegerile prezidențiale din SUA, în care fostul președinte republican Donald Trump se va confrunta cu actuala vicepreședintă Kamala Harris. title: Gas prices up $2.94, diesel up by $3.06
content: KINGSTON, Jamaica — Motorists should see an increase at the pumps in the price of gasoline effective Thursday, October 10, according to the latest ex-refinery costs from Petrojam. With both grades of gasoline up by $2.94, 90-octane will be sold for $175.86 per litre, while 87-octane will be sold for $166.84 per litre. Automotive diesel fuel will be sold for $165.93 per litre after an increase of $3.06 and ultra-low sulphur diesel will be sold for $174.03 per litre also up by $3.06. Kerosene increased by $3.06 and will be sold for $155.83 per litre. Propane liquid petroleum will be sold for $73.97 per litre up by $3.06 and butane liquid petroleum will be sold for $84.29 per litre after an increase of $3.06. Marketing companies and retailers will add their respective mark-up to these prices.

Setor de beleza atrai mulheres empreendedoras
creator: EdiCase
content: O setor de beleza está entre os preferidos das mulheres que buscam empreender no Brasil. De acordo com uma pesquisa realizada pelo Instituto Rede Mulher Empreendedora, essa área, junto ao segmento de moda e alimentação, tem uma representatividade feminina em torno de 70%. Cintya Batista, CEO da Magic Color, acredita que, por ser um mercado majoritariamente voltado às mulheres, existe uma identificação maior pelo assunto, o que acaba as atraindo para o setor. “Nós compreendemos melhor as necessidades, os desejos e os desafios do público feminino, e isso nos permite atender às demandas de forma mais empática e precisa”, conta. Como hairstylist , Cintya via de perto as reais necessidades de suas clientes e identificou uma carência do mercado por um produto que auxiliasse seu trabalho e deixasse as mulheres mais satisfeitas com seus cabelos . Foi a partir dessa constatação que ela criou a Magic Color, empresa de produtos capilares especializada em matizadores para a manutenção de colorações. A empresária acredita ainda que muito do sucesso de sua empresa e do mercado de beleza como um todo está na conquista das mulheres por cargos de liderança. “Ter mulheres representando, criando e liderando empresas traz autenticidade. E a consumidora se identifica com isso”, explica. Esses exemplos de sucesso também criam uma cadeia de empoderamento, estimulando um movimento cada vez mais crescente de mulheres empreendedoras, quebrando barreiras de gênero e incentivando...

title: John Stones named England captain for Greece, Harry Kane set to miss out through injury
content: John Stones will lead England out for the first time at Wembley on Thursday, as he captains England in the absence of Harry Kane . With Kane struggling with an injury and unlikely to face Greece , interim manager Lee Carsley hopes that England’s top scorer will be fit for the game in Helsinki on Sunday, with Stones given the responsibility of wearing the armband tomorrow. Advertisement “Harry’s nursing an injury, a small knock,” said Carsley at a press conference on Wednesday evening. “It’s something that we won’t take a chance with. We’re not ruling him out yet of the game, but he won’t start. “Hopefully he will be in contention for Sunday, but again, time will tell. It’s not something we should be rushing.” Kane, 31, has not trained this week since joining up with England on Monday. Carsley broke the news to Stones on Tuesday night that he will captaining England against Greece. “It was a great conversation that i was able to have with John last night,” Carsley said. “To ask him to captain the team, it’s a brilliant achievement for John, something that he deserves. “With the amount of caps that he’s got, the experience that he’s got, the level of professionalism that he shows within the squad, the example he is to the younger players, it was a great conversation to have.” Stones said he was “speechless” when Carsley told him at St George’s Park on Tuesday. “It’s everything that i could have dreamed of as a kid, and more for my family, to be able to see me walk out as...

title: На время аудита критических предприятий бронирование работников приостанавливать не будут, - Минобороны
content: До 15 ноября в Украине должны провести аудит критических предприятий, получивших такой статус от органов местного самоуправления. Бронирование работников на это время приостанавливаться не будет. Об этом сообщает РБК-Украина со ссылкой на комментарий первого замминистра обороны Украины Ивана Гаврилюка Суспильному . В комиссию, которая будет проводить аудит, должны быть включены военные. Если предприятие окажется "не критичным для государства", то бронирование будет пересмотрено. Он отрицает приостановку бронирования, о которой сообщали СМИ. Также, по его словам, в Украине сейчас более миллиона забронированных мужчин. Решение о проведении проверки было принято, по словам чиновника, после резкого увеличения количества забронированных. "Решение было принято, потому что резко пошло увеличение количества забронированных людей. В течение двух лет было 540 тысяч человек, а здесь за пару месяцев — рост вдвое", — сказал Гаврилюк. Напомним, в среду, 9 октября, агентство The Page опубликовало выписку из протокола правительственного заседания, которое состоялось 8 октября. В нем говорится, что Минобороны хочет провести аудит по бронированию от мобилизации , и с этой идеей согласилось правительство. Кроме того, правительство поручило Минобороны и Минэкономики до следующего заседания разработать проект решения, предусматривающего остановку до 15 ноября 2024 года действия положений критериев, определяющих, какие предприятия, учреждения или организации являются критически...

title: На час аудиту критичних підприємств бронювання працівників не призупинятимуть, - Міноборони
content: До 15 листопада в Україні мають провести аудит критичних підприємств, які отримали такий статус від органів місцевого самоврядування. Призупинятися бронювання працівників на цей час не буде. Про це повідомляє РБК-Україна з посиланням на коментар першого заступника міністра оборони України Івана Гаврилюка Суспільному . До комісії, яка проводитиме аудит, мають включити військових. Якщо підприємство виявиться "не критичним для держави", то бронювання переглянуть. Він заперечує призупинення бронювання, про яке повідомляли ЗМІ. Також, за його словами, в Україні наразі понад мільйон заброньованих чоловіків. Рішення про проведення перевірки ухвалили, за словами чиновника, після різкого збільшення кількості заброньованих. "Рішення ухвалили, бо різко пішло збільшення кількості заброньованих людей. Протягом двох років було 540 тисяч людей, а тут за пару місяців — зростання вдвічі", — сказав Гаврилюк. Нагадаємо, у середу, 9 жовтня, агентство The Page опублікувало витяг з протоколу урядового засідання, яке відбулося 8 жовтня. В ньому йдеться про те, що Міноборони хоче провести аудит щодо бронювання від мобілізації , і з цією ідеєю погодився уряд. Окрім цього, уряд доручив Міноборони та Мінекономіки до наступного засідання розробити проект рішення, яке б передбачало зупинення до 15 листопада 2024 року дії положень критеріїв, які визначають, які підприємства, установи чи організації є критично важливими. Поки ці критерії не будуть діяти, бронювання проводитись не буде,...

title: Jind News: एलएन हिंदू और जाट काॅलेज ने जीता मैच
MeiraGTx Announces Poster Presentation on a Potential Treatment for MC4R Genetic Deficiency at ...
content: LONDON and NEW YORK, Oct. 09, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MeiraGTx Holdings plc (Nasdaq: MGTX), a vertically integrated, clinical stage genetic medicine company, today announced a poster presentation at the 2024 Society for Neuroscience Conference (SfN), which is being held from October 5-9, 2024, in Chicago, IL. “We are pleased to share data at this year’s Society for Neuroscience Conference on the remarkable efficacy of our AAV-BDNF treatment in diet-induced obesity animal models,” said Alexandria Forbes, Ph.D., president and chief executive officer of MeiraGTx. “We leveraged our proprietary vector design platform to create a highly potent construct with the potential to treat children with severe early-onset obesity caused by MC4R genetic deficiency via the local delivery of a small dose of AAV-BDNF to a specific site in the ventromedial hypothalamus. This represents a powerful mechanism to treat these severely affected patients with no current treatment options available.” The poster is available on the Posters and Publications page of the Company’s website on October 9, 2024. The details of the poster presentation are as follows: Poster Number: 5090 Abstract Title: A CNS-targeted gene therapy for the treatment of severe pediatric obesity Date: October 9, 2024 Time: 1pm CT In the ventromedial hypothalamus, the leptin-proopiomelanocortin pathway interprets energy signals from the periphery to initiate feeding or fasting through two opposing neuronal populations. In a fed...

title: NVIDIA to launch GeForce RTX 5090, RTX 5080 later this year: RTX 5070 at CES 2025
creator: Anthony Garreffa
content: NVIDIA will reportedly unveil its new GeForce RTX 5070 graphics card with 12GB of GDDR7 memory on a 192-bit memory bus at CES 2025 in just a few month's time. According to our friends over at Wccftech, the upcoming GeForce RTX 5070 will feature the GB205 "Blackwell" GPU with 12GB of GDDR7 memory clocked at 28Gbps on a 192-bit memory bus that will push out up to 672GB/sec of memory bandwidth. This means the new RTX 5070 has 33% more memory bandwidth than the current-gen RTX 4070 and RTX 4070 SUPER graphics cards. We're expecting to see the RTX 5070 with a 250W TBP, which is a 14% increase in power over the RTX 4070 SUPER with a 220W TBP. 12GB of GDDR7 @ 28Gbps : NVIDIA is expected to debut its GeForce RTX 5070 with 12GB of GDDR7 memory clocked at 28Gbps of bandwidth, which provides the RTX 5070 with a 33% increase in memory bandwidth over the RTX 4070 and RTX 4070 SUPER graphics cards. Up to 672GB/sec memory bandwidth : The 12GB of new ultra-fast GDDR7 memory at 28Gbps on a 192-bit memory bus will provide up to 672GB/sec of memory bandwidth on the Blackwell-based GeForce RTX 5070. This will increase performance in higher resolutions like 1440p and 4K for the RTX 5070 in 2025. 250W of power : NVIDIA is expected to hit a 250W TBP with the GeForce RTX 5070, but we should have 30-50% or more performance over the RTX 4070 and RTX 4070 SUPER with their 220W TBP. We'll see custom overclocked RTX 5070 graphics cards in 2025, so expect these numbers to rise a little bit. 1440p + 4K...

title: Experience the legend of Sleepy Hollow at Rockefeller Center’s immersive experience
content: A post shared by HERO (@hero__nyc) Rockefeller Center’s HERO events venue is transforming its event space into a haunted Halloween wonderland with “Sleepy Hollow: Autumn’s Harvest,” an immersive experience based on Washington Irving’s classic “The Legend of Sleepy Hollow.” From Oct. 12 to Nov. 10, the autumn exhibit invites visitors of all ages to explore a multi-sensory journey through the spooky and enchanting world of Sleepy Hollow. HERO is locatd at Rockefeller Center’s rink level, at 610 Fifth Ave. For those unfamiliar, HERO is an immersive 13,000-square-foot events and arts venue located in Rockefeller Center, equipped with cutting-edge video, spatial audio, and 360-degree scenic design, and rotating installations that aims to deliver rich storytelling and experienti events. “Sleepy Hollow: Autumn’s Harvest” includes appearances by iconic characters like Ichabod Crane and the Headless Horseman, set against a backdrop of misty hollows and the sound of galloping hooves. Guests will saunter through a series of themed rooms and explore the rich history and folklore of Sleepy Hollow while enjoying seasonal treats and hands-on activities. Tickets range form $29.90 to $44.90, depending on the experience. Order tix here. A full schedule of events for “Sleepy Hollow: Autumn’s Harvest” is available on the HERO website . title: Maltempo, la mareggiata "si mangia" la spiaggia di Jesolo
content: Le immagini viste dal drone delle violente ondate sospinte dal forte vento che si infrangono sulla costa veneta, erodendo la sabbia e danneggiando le costruzioni in pietra lungo il litorale Una violenta mareggiata si porta via una parte della spiaggia di Jesolo (Venezia), erodendo la costa. In alcuni punti l'urto delle onde danneggia il lastricato in pietra della passeggiata e si porta via diversi centimetri di sabbia.

title: Soccer-Depleted Brazil brace for must-win World Cup qualifiers
content: SAO PAULO (Reuters) - Brazil are in unfamiliar territory, grappling with mounting pressure and uncertainty as they prepare for crucial World Cup qualifiers against Chile and Peru, without the help of key players sidelined by injuries. After losing four of their last five qualifiers with a series of poor performances, the record five-times World Cup winners are fifth in the standings on 10 points, ahead of Venezuela on goal difference in sixth. Only the top six are guaranteed a berth at the 2026 finals. Paraguay and Bolivia are one point behind and another slip-up by Brazil could leave them out of the qualification places and at risk of missing out on the World Cup for the first time in their history. Manager Dorival Jr, who was appointed in January after the team spent a year under two caretaker coaches as the Brazilian FA tried and failed to lure Italian Carlo Ancelotti from Real Madrid, has won only two competitive games. Following a lacklustre Copa America campaign, when they were knocked out in the quarter finals by Uruguay, Brazil snatched a narrow home win over Ecuador last month. Yet they came crashing back to earth days later with another poor performance, losing 1-0 to a Paraguay side who had only scored once in their previous seven qualifiers. The inconsistency that has plagued Brazil since they let coach Tite go following a penalty shootout defeat to Croatia in the Qatar World Cup quarter-finals has continued with the side winning only four of their last 14 games....

Перш ніж забронювати наступну поїздку, ось 11 туристичних хаків, яких слід уникати у 2024 році, на думку експертів, пише GOBankingRates. title: Javier Milei puso en marcha la privatización de otra empresa clave
content: Tres meses después de haberlo anunciado, el Gobierno de Javier Milei puso en marcha el mecanismo para otorgar la primera concesión de la era libertaria destinada a operar y mantener las instalaciones y los servicios vinculados con la logística y el transporte de cargas y pasajeros en un paso fronterizo. Por medio de la resolución 112/24 de la Vicejefatura de Gabinete del Interior que conduce Lisandro Catalán; la administración mileísta lanzó una convocatoria para recibir proyectos de "iniciativas privadas" para "la concesión del uso, explotación, operación, administración y funcionamientodel Centro de Fronteras 'Paso de los Libres' Complejo Terminal de Cargas (COTECAR) y el Área de Control Integrado (ACI)" que funcionan en la localidad correntina de Paso de los Libres. Las empresas interesadas en el negocio -que se concesionará por el término de 25 años- tendrán 45 días de plazo para presentar sus propuestas que, bajo el esquema de "iniciativa privada", deberán incluir un paquete de "inversiones básicas e innovadoras" en obras nuevas, de ampliación, remodelación, mejoras y puesta en valor destinadas a la explotación, operación, administración y funcionamiento de los servicios públicos del Centro de Fronteras. Tras la presentación de los proyectos de iniciativa privada, el Gobierno elegirá el que considere más conveniente y procederá a llamar a licitación para adjudicar las obras y los servicios en juego. En esa licitación, la empresa que...

title: הותר לפרסום: רויטל יהוד ודביר שרביט הם בני הזוג שנרצחו במטח שירה חיזבאללה לקריית שמונה

creator: West Central Tribune staff report
content: Kandiyohi County Historical Society Willmar, 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. weekdays, closed holidays, $5 for adults, ages 12 and under and Kandiyohi County Historical Society members admitted for free, 320-235-1881, located at the train engine on North Business Highway 71 across from Robbins Island. The museum has a number of featured exhibits. Along with the museum there is a one-room school, a log shed and a Great Northern locomotive. Maps of county historical sites are available at the museum. More information available online at www.kandiyohicountyhistory.com. Renville County Historical Society Morton, 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Monday through Friday, research library by appointment only; adults $5, ages 6-12 $3, children 5 and under free. For more information or for a library appointment call 507-697-6147, or email info@renvillecountyhistory.com , website www.renvillecountyhistory.com . Tim Kojetin: Oct. 13, 2 p.m., St. Mary's Church, Bechyn. Tim Kojetin will present "Discover the MAGIC of the Czech Lands." Admission is a freewill donation and an item for the Renville County Food Shelf. Refreshments will be served after the presentation.

title: Adam DeVine recalls confusing Sofia Vergara with improv on 'Modern Family'
content: Adam DeVine recalls confusing Sofia Vergara with improv on 'Modern Family' Adam Devine joined 'Modern Family' during season 5 as Andy Bailey, Sarah Hyland's on-screen love interest Sofia Vergara wasn’t too impressed by Adam DeVine’s improv on Modern Family . In a recent interview with People Magazine , the Pitch Perfect alum recalled when he first joined the cast in season 5, the creators encouraged him to improvise to keep things fresh. But his attempt to go off-script with Sofia Vergara didn’t quite go as planned. "It was the first scene, I go in and I improv a little something with Sofia Vergara,” DeVine, 40, recalled. “I remember she just had a blank [expression] and looked over to the producer village where all the producers sit and she just goes, ‘What?’ She was so confused by what the hell I was doing because it wasn’t part of the script.” After that, he was kindly asked to stick to the script. "Steve Levitan, one of the creators, came over and said, ‘Remember when we said you could improv? Let’s not do that anymore,’" he added with a grin. Despite the mishap, DeVine cherished his time on the show, especially his close friendship with co-star Sarah Hyland, who played his on-screen love interest. “She’s a good friend,” DeVine shared, noting they frequently stay in touch. “I’ll throw a party every fourth of July, and she comes to those, and we go to each other’s birthday parties when we’re in town,” he revealed. The actor also worked with Hyland on Pitch Perfect: Bumper...

title: DODIKOVA ODBRANA TRAŽI IZUZEĆE SUDIJE UZUNOVIĆ: Svi detalji današnjeg ročišta predsedniku RS
content: ROČIŠTE predsedniku Republike Srpske Miloradu Dodiku i v. d. direktora "Službenog glasnika Srpske" Milošu Lukiću pred Sudom BiH, a zbog nepoštovanja odluka Kristijana Šmita kojeg RS ne priznaje, prekinuto je dok se Sudsko veće ne izjasni o zahtevu odbrane Dodika za izuzeće sudije Sene Uzunović. Inače, ročište je obeležila i žestoka rasprava Uzunovićeve sa advokatom Goranom Bubićem i prvooptuženim Dodikom. Rečima "moje je pravo da galamim" i pretnjom da će fizički udaljiti iz sudnice predsednika Srpske, Uzunovićeva je pokušala da prekine raspravu sa advokatom Bubićem. Uzunovićeva je tad čak zapretila i Dodiku da će ga udaljiti iz sudnice i da, kako je rekla, "neće biti u mogućnosti da napusti Sud BiH". Milorad Dodik, predsednik RS, poručio je da je tokom ročišta bio relaksiran. - Čak u jednom trenutku nemoći sudija reče da će me zadržati. A ja sam rekao da napiše nalog za to, pa je odustala - dodao je Dodik. Poručio je da je Sud BiH podvaljen građanima BiH. - Postavio ga je Volfgang Petrič, a prvobitna namera je bila da sudi političarima. A onda su kroz nekoliko dopuna proširili njegovo delovanje. Oni brane strance, a ne građane BiH - naveo je Dodik. Odbrana predsednika RS tražila je izuzeće sudije Sene Uzunović, jer Tužilaštvo BiH želi da provuče dokaze koji to ne bi mogli da budu ni na jednom sudu, rekao je Dodikov advokat Goran Bubić. Dodaje da je vidljiv pritisak u ovom krivičnom postupku koji je posledica toga što...

title: Presunto cerrón lo hace perder el control y se va directo al arroyo en Saltillo; cuneta ‘lo salva’
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: A punto de irse al fondo del arroyo del Pituchin terminó una automovilista en el camellón central del inicio del bulevar procedente de Paseo de la Reforma con dirección a Arteaga . Se trata de Carlos Eduardo, quien circulaba a bordo del vehículo Chevrolet Optra sin placas de circulación, el cual dijo que un automovilista le cerró el paso. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Enfurecido conductor atropella a lavacoches tras sostener discusión en Saltillo Debido a esto, perdió el control del auto y se subió a la banqueta del camellón central, el cual, por fortuna, la cuneta evitó que el vehículo avanzara más metros; si no hubiera sido por esto, el auto hubiera caído cerca de dos metros adelante. Pasó por encima de la cuneta y se detuvo, ocasionando golpes en el rostro de Carlos Eduardo, quien fue atendido por los paramédicos de una ambulancia privada que pasaba por el lugar. Tras su revisión y al no presentar lesiones de consideración, el conductor se quedó en el lugar, mientras que el personal de la Policía Municipal que tomó conocimiento del mismo pidió la grúa para llevar el auto a un corralón, en lo que se pagan los daños y multas correspondientes al no contar el auto con placas.

title: ”Jag hoppas att hon är besviken”
creator: frida.olsson@expressen.se (Frida Olsson)
content: Sedan Cathinka Tandberg värvades till Hammarby under sommaren har Ellen Wangerheim fått kliva ner ett steg i planen. Men när Hammarby ställdes mot St. Pölten i den första matchen i gruppspelet av Champions League var hon tillbaka. Något hon kände på sig tidigare under veckan när Cathinka Tandberg legat sjuk. – Det var väldigt skönt. Jag trivs ju bättre på den positionen och känner väl att mina att mina spetsegenskaper kommer fram mer där. Sen spelar jag där det är bäst för laget och det har varit tia fram till nu, säger Ellen Wangerheim och fortsätter: – Jag tycker om bra insats. Jag får fast bollen där uppe. Involverad mycket offensivt och känner att jag ligger ner ett hårt arbete. ”Det var surt, besviket” Men i den 58:e minuten blev hon utbytt, mot just Cathinka Tandberg. – Det var surt, det var besviket. Det är klart att man vill spela längre och speciellt när man känner att man ändå har gjort en bra match och är involverad mycket. Sen så har vi väldigt duktiga spelare på sidan och kan komma in och göra avgörande mål. Huvudsaken är att vi vinner matchen och tar tre poäng. Tandberg, som gjorde avgörande 2–0, har öst in mål i damallsvenskan sedan flytten. Men Wangerheim tar konkurrensen med ro. – Hon har gjort mycket många mål, men jag har gjort nästan lika många mål som henne i Bajen. Båda är två målskyttar och båda är två spelare som gillar att vara nia. Jag kanske är lite mer djupledsgående och hon är mer target...

title: Bright Osayi-Samuel'den Transfer İddialarına Cevap Veren Paylaşım: Sarı-Lacivert Kalpli Story Attı!
content: Fenerbahçe 'de son dönemlerde transfer iddialarıyla gündeme gelen Bright Osayi-Samuel, Instagram hesabından bir story paylaştı. Bu paylaşım , sosyal medyada kısa sürede çok konuşulanlar arasında yerini aldı. Fenerbahçe'nin Nijeryalı futbolcusu Osayi-Samuel bir türlü gündemden düşmüyor. Sözleşme görüşmeleri adeta yılan hikayesine dönen Osayi'nin adı bugüne kadar birden fazla kulüple anıldı. İddialara göre, Batshuayi'den sonra Fenerbahçe'den bir futbolcuyu daha bonservissiz bir şekilde kadrosuna katmak isteyen Galatasaray, Osayi ile ilgileniyor. title: Felony charges filed against Grand Forks man for alleged sexual contact with young girl in early 2010s
creator: Sav Kelly
content: GRAND FORKS — A Grand Forks man was recently charged with two Class A felony counts of gross sexual imposition for alleged sexual contact he initiated with a young girl in 2011 and 2013. Allen Timothy Dunn, 39, faces up to 20 years in prison if convicted of either count. ADVERTISEMENT Charges were filed Oct. 4; a warrant was issued for Dunn's arrest Monday, Oct. 7. He was taken into custody Tuesday, Oct. 8, and had an initial appearance. During the hearing, Dunn was granted a $15,000 cash or surety bond, which he posted before being released that afternoon. In 2011, Dunn — then 25 years old — was a volunteer at Grace Baptist Church. Sometime between February and May of that year, he asked a 4-year-old girl if she was OK in the restroom and, though she said yes, he entered and assisted her, according to an affidavit of probable cause filed in the case. Dunn became a friend of the girl and her family over time; they came to his home for a Superbowl gathering Feb. 3, 2013, during which the girl's parents went to the store and left her with Dunn, the affidavit said. He allegedly committed the same act to the now 6-year-old child. An investigation began in July of this year after the girl disclosed these incidents. Dunn was interviewed by law enforcement Aug. 21. He allegedly admitted to seeing the girl enter the bathroom the night of Feb. 3, 2013, entering and assisting her "while experiencing sexual excitement," the affidavit said. Dunn's preliminary hearing and arraignment are...
